papers.title: New Multiparty Computational Model: From Nakamoto to YOSO
papers.authors: Tal Rabin
papers.abstract: Nakamoto introduced a mechanism for leader election via proof of work, and allowed this dealer to speak once. In this setting parties do not have inputs and they output a value which they calculated. Jing and Micali took this idea a step further and showed that Byzantine agreement, a function where parties have inputs but no private information, can be reached in a setting where each party speaks only once. This was achieved by introducing the notion of player replaceability. In our recent works we have shown that any function, including those where parties have secret inputs, can be computed in the YOSO (you only speak once) model. This is joint works with: Fabrice Benhamouda, Craig Gentry, Sergey Gorbunov, Shai Halevi, Hugo Krawczyk, Chengyu Lin, Bernardo Magri, Jesper Buus Nielsen, Leonid Reyzin, Sophia Yakoubov
papers.abstract_zh: 中本聪引入了通过工作证明进行领袖选举的机制，并允许这位经销商发言一次。在这种情况下，各方没有输入，他们输出自己计算的值。Jing和Micali将这一想法推进了一步，并表明在各方仅发言一次的情况下，可以达成拜占庭协议，即各方有投入但没有私人信息的函数。这是通过引入球员可替换性的概念实现的。在我们最近的工作中，我们已经表明，任何函数，包括各方有秘密输入的函数，都可以在YOSO(你只能说一次)模型中计算。这是与Fabrice Benhamouda，Craig Gentry，，Shai Halevi，Hugo，Chengyu Lin，Bernardo Magri，Jesper Buus Nielsen，Leonid Reyzin，Sophia Yakoubov
papers.title_zh: 新的多党计算模型：从中心到Yoso

papers.title: SMS OTP Security (SOS): Hardening SMS-Based Two Factor Authentication
papers.authors: Christian Peeters, Christopher Patton, Imani N. S. Munyaka, Daniel Olszewski, Thomas Shrimpton, Patrick Traynor
papers.abstract: SMS-based two-factor authentication (2FA) is the most widely deployed 2FA mechanism, despite the fact that SMS messages are known to be vulnerable to rerouting attacks, and despite the availability of alternatives that may be more secure. This is for two reasons. First, it is very effective in practice, as evidenced by reports from Google and Microsoft. Second, users prefer SMS over alternatives, because text messaging is already part of their daily communication. Accepting this practical reality, we developed a new SMS-based protocol that makes rerouting attacks useless to adversaries who aim to take over user accounts. Our protocol delivers one-time passwords (OTP) via text message in a manner that adds minimal overhead (to both the user and the server) over existing SMS-based methods, and is implemented with only small changes to the stock text-message applications that already ship on mobile phones. The security of our protocol rests upon a provably secure authenticated key exchange protocol that, crucially, does not place significant new burdens upon the user. Indeed, we carry out a user study that demonstrates no statistically significant difference between traditional SMS and our protocol, in terms of usability.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于SMS的双因素身份验证(2FA)是部署最广泛的2FA机制，尽管已知SMS消息容易受到重新路由攻击，并且尽管存在可能更安全的替代方案。这有两个原因。首先，它在实践中非常有效，谷歌和微软的报告证明了这一点。第二，用户更喜欢短信，因为短信已经是他们日常交流的一部分。接受这一现实，我们开发了一种新的基于SMS的协议，使重新路由攻击对那些旨在接管用户帐户的对手毫无用处。我们的协议通过文本消息提供一次性密码(OTP ),与现有的基于SMS的方法相比，增加了最小的开销(对用户和服务器),并且只需对移动电话上已有的文本消息应用程序做很小的改变即可实现。我们协议的安全性基于一个可证明安全的认证密钥交换协议，关键是，它不会给用户带来新的负担。事实上，我们进行的一项用户研究表明，就可用性而言，传统短信和我们的协议之间没有统计上的显著差异。
papers.title_zh: SMS OTP安全性（SOS）：基于SMS的两个因素身份验证

papers.title: Multi-Key Homomorphic MACs with Efficient Verification for Quadratic Arithmetic Circuits
papers.authors: Shuai Feng, Shuaijianni Xu, Liang Feng Zhang
papers.abstract: Multi-key homomorphic MACs (MKHomMACs) allow multiple clients to authenticate data with their own secret keys and outsource their data together with the tags to an untrusted server. Upon receiving any user 's request of computing a function on the data, the server is able to generate both the computation result and a short tag that vouches for the correctness of the result. MKHomMACs provide a solution with minimal communication and interaction to the problem of delegating computations over outsourced data. Fiore, Mitrokotsa, Nizzardo, and Pagnin (Asiacrypt 2016) constructed a PRF-based MKHomMAC where the result verification could be as costly as the delegated computation. In this paper, we show a PRF-based MKHomMAC for quadratic arithmetic circuits such that the verification can be substantially faster than the delegated computation in an amortized setting. The efficiency improvement is achieved by using PRFs with multi-key amortized closed-form efficiency.
papers.abstract_zh: 多密钥同态MAC(MKHomMACs)允许多个客户端使用它们自己的秘密密钥来认证数据，并且将它们的数据连同标签一起外包给不可信的服务器。在接收到任何用户对数据计算函数的请求时，服务器能够生成计算结果和证明结果正确性的短标签。MKHomMACs以最少的通信和交互为外包数据上的委托计算问题提供了一个解决方案。Fiore、Mitrokotsa、Nizzardo和Pagnin (Asiacrypt 2016)构建了一个基于PRF的MKHomMAC，其中结果验证可能与委托计算一样昂贵。在这篇文章中，我们展示了一个基于PRF的MKHomMAC，用于二次算术电路，使得验证可以大大快于摊销设置中的委托计算。通过使用具有多键摊销闭式效率的PRF来实现效率提高。
papers.title_zh: 具有有效验证二次算术电路的多键同型MACS

papers.title: Iterative Oblivious Pseudo-Random Functions and Applications
papers.authors: Erik-Oliver Blass, Florian Kerschbaum, Travis Mayberry
papers.abstract: We consider the problem of a client querying an encrypted binary tree structure, outsourced to an untrusted server. While the server must not learn the contents of the binary tree, we also prevent the client from maliciously crafting a query that traverses the tree out-of-order. That is, the client should not be able to retrieve nodes outside one contiguous path from the root to a leaf. Finally, the server should not learn which path the client accesses, but is guaranteed that the access corresponds to one valid path in the tree. This is an extension of protocols such as structured encryption, where it is only guaranteed that the tree's encrypted data remains hidden from the server. To this end, we initiate the study of Iterative Oblivious Pseudorandom Functions (iOPRFs), new primitives providing two-sided, fully malicious security for these types of applications. We present a first, efficient iOPRF construction secure against both malicious clients and servers in the standard model, based on the DDH assumption. We demonstrate that iOPRFs are useful to implement different interesting applications, including an RFID authentication protocol and a protocol for private evaluation of outsourced decision trees. Finally, we implement and evaluate our full iOPRF construction and show that it is efficient in practice.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们考虑客户查询一个加密的二叉树结构的问题，外包给一个不可信的服务器。虽然服务器不能知道二叉树的内容，但是我们也可以防止客户端恶意创建一个无序遍历树的查询。也就是说，客户端不应该能够检索从根到叶的连续路径之外的节点。最后，服务器不应该知道客户端访问的是哪条路径，但是可以保证该访问对应于树中的一条有效路径。这是结构化加密等协议的扩展，在结构化加密中，只能保证树的加密数据对服务器保持隐藏。为此，我们启动了迭代不经意伪随机函数(iOPRFs)的研究，这是一种为这些类型的应用程序提供双向完全恶意安全性的新原语。我们基于DDH假设，在标准模型中提出了第一个有效的防恶意客户端和服务器的iOPRF构造。我们证明了iOPRFs对于实现不同的有趣应用是有用的，包括RFID认证协议和外包决策树的私有评估协议。最后，我们实现并评估了完整的iOPRF结构，并表明它在实践中是有效的。
papers.title_zh: 迭代遗忘的伪随机功能和应用

papers.title: Tight Leakage-Resilient Identity-based Encryption under Multi-challenge Setting
papers.authors: Cailing Cai, Xianrui Qin, Tsz Hon Yuen, Siu-Ming Yiu
papers.abstract: In this work, we present the first leakage-resilient identity-based encryption (LR-IBE) scheme that features (almost) tight security under the multi-challenge setting, in which the adversary could receive multiple challenging ciphertexts from multiple users. Meanwhile, our construction enjoys security against chosen-ciphertext attack (CCA) under the Matrix Decisional Diffie-Hellman (MDDH) assumption. Apart from admitting the continual leakage of secret key, we provide strong security via additionally allowing the continual leakage of the master secret key. In particular, albeit in the single-challenge setting, our LR-IBE is also the first tight and CCA-secure scheme that withstands continual leakage of the master secret key and identity secret key. Furthermore, our ciphertext is constant-size when we instantiate the scheme by the Symmetric external Diffie-Hellman (SXDH) assumption. Concretely, there are only 6 group elements with security against chosen-plaintext attack (CPA) and extra 14 group elements for the CCA security.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这篇论文中，我们提出了第一个抗泄漏的基于身份的加密(LR-IBE)方案，该方案在多重挑战环境下具有(几乎)严格的安全性，在多重挑战环境下，对手可以从多个用户接收多重挑战密文。同时，在矩阵判决Diffie-Hellman (MDDH)假设下，我们的构造具有抵抗选择密文攻击的安全性。除了允许密钥的持续泄漏，我们还通过允许主密钥的持续泄漏来提供强大的安全性。特别是，尽管是在单一挑战环境中，我们的LR-IBE也是第一个能够抵抗主密钥和身份密钥持续泄漏的紧密的CCA安全方案。此外，当我们通过对称外部Diffie-Hellman (SXDH)假设实例化该方案时，我们的密文是恒定长度的。具体来说，只有6个群元素具有抗选择明文攻击(CPA)的安全性，另外14个群元素具有CCA安全性。
papers.title_zh: 在多挑战环境下，基于泄漏的泄漏效能较高的加密

papers.title: Duplicates also Matter! Towards Secure Deletion on Flash-based Storage Media by Removing Duplicates
papers.authors: Niusen Chen, Bo Chen
papers.abstract: Flash memory has been used extensively as external storage of smartphones, tablets, IoT devices, laptops, etc. Therefore, more and more sensitive or even mission critical data are stored in flash and, once the data turn obsolete, securely deleting them is necessary for both regulation compliance and privacy protection. Traditional secure deletion on flash memory mainly focuses on sanitizing data. However, unique nature of flash memory may cause various data ''remnants'' and, even though the data are removed, the remnants may be utilized by the adversary to recover the deleted data, compromising the secure deletion guarantee. Based on both theoretic analysis and experiments using real-world workloads, we have identified one common type of remnants in the flash memory, namely duplicates, which are caused by unique internal functions of flash storage media including garbage collection, wear leveling, bad block management. We propose RedFlash, a novel secure deletion scheme which can efficiently Remove both the data and the corresponding duplicates towards secure deletion on Flash memory. Security analysis and experimental evaluation show that RedFlash can ensure the secure deletion guarantee, at the cost of a small performance degradation, compared to a regular (non-secure) flash controller.
papers.abstract_zh: 闪存已被广泛用作智能手机、平板电脑、物联网设备、笔记本电脑等的外部存储。因此，越来越多的敏感甚至任务关键型数据存储在闪存中，一旦这些数据过时，出于法规遵从性和隐私保护的考虑，必须安全地删除它们。传统的闪存安全删除主要集中在净化数据上。然而，闪存的独特性质可能导致各种数据“残留”,并且即使数据被移除，这些残留也可能被对手利用来恢复被删除的数据，从而危及安全删除保证。基于理论分析和使用真实工作负载的实验，我们确定了闪存中一种常见的残余类型，即副本，这是由闪存存储介质的独特内部功能引起的，包括垃圾收集、损耗均衡、坏块管理。我们提出了一种新的安全删除方案RedFlash，它可以有效地删除闪存上的数据和相应的副本，从而实现安全删除。安全性分析和实验评估表明，与常规(非安全)闪存控制器相比，RedFlash能够以较小的性能下降为代价确保安全删除保证。
papers.title_zh: 重复也很重要！ 通过删除重复项来对基于闪光的存储媒体进行安全删除

papers.title: Hearing Check Failed: Using Laser Vibrometry to Analyze the Potential for Hard Disk Drives to Eavesdrop Speech Vibrations
papers.authors: Payton Walker, Shalini Saini, S. Abhishek Anand, Tzipora Halevi, Nitesh Saxena
papers.abstract: Sound waves from speech can potentially induce vibrations, proportional to the speech signal, on nearby objects. Each of these objects introduces the risk for a malicious attacker to exploit the induced vibrations to eavesdrop on the speech. Such an eavesdropping attack is critical when we consider the potential for induced vibrations in standard magnetic hard disk drives (HDDs). As an instance of this threat, prior research has demonstrated that speech in certain scenarios can induce vibrations on the read/write head of an HDD in order to eavesdrop on the speech (Kwong et al.; Oakland'19). In this paper, we revisit this line of research and aim to provide a closer investigation into whether HDDs can in fact be used as a source for eavesdropping on speech vibrations. As a foundation for our study, we utilize an effective, and robust methodology using laser vibrometry to measure the subtle speech vibrations induced on the read/write head. The prior study tested only a single HDD and only machine-rendered speech in a single setting with very loud speech. Our work broadens the scope of this research in many significant ways. First, we test multiple popular HDDs of different models and sizes to evaluate the generalizability of the overall threat. Second, we evaluate the threat from live human speech spoken near an HDD, expanding the scope of the attack to include most real-world speech settings involving normal human conversations. Third, we define machine-rendered speech scenarios to explore different propagation media and degrees of speech loudness. Our findings are two-fold. First, we observed that live human speech traveling through the air is not generally strong enough to impact HDDs such that intelligible speech information is leaked. Second, most tested HDDs did not seem capable of eavesdropping on machine-rendered speech unless the speech is loud enough, or the HDD shares a surface or is in direct contact with the speaker device. This implies HDDs cannot eavesdrop live human speech.
papers.abstract_zh: 来自语音的声波可能会在附近的物体上感应出与语音信号成比例的振动。这些物体中的每一个都引入了恶意攻击者利用诱发的振动来窃听语音的风险。当我们考虑标准磁性硬盘驱动器(HDD)中诱发振动的可能性时，这种窃听攻击是至关重要的。作为这种威胁的一个例子，先前的研究已经证明，在某些情况下，语音可以在HDD的读/写头上引起振动，以便窃听语音(Kwong等人；奥克兰' 19)。在本文中，我们重新回顾了这条研究路线，并旨在提供一个更密切的调查，看看硬盘驱动器实际上是否可以用作窃听语音振动的来源。作为我们研究的基础，我们利用激光振动测量法来测量读/写磁头上引起的细微语音振动。之前的研究只测试了一个硬盘，并且只测试了机器在一个环境下的声音非常大的语音。我们的工作在许多重要方面拓宽了这项研究的范围。首先，我们测试了多种不同型号和大小的流行硬盘，以评估整体威胁的普遍性。其次，我们评估了来自硬盘附近的真人讲话的威胁，将攻击范围扩大到包括大多数涉及正常人类对话的真实世界的讲话设置。第三，我们定义机器呈现的语音场景，以探索不同的传播媒体和语音响度。我们的发现是双重的。首先，我们观察到在空气中传播的真人语音通常不足以影响硬盘驱动器，从而泄漏可理解的语音信息。第二，大多数测试的硬盘似乎无法窃听机器渲染的语音，除非语音足够响亮，或者硬盘共享一个表面或直接与扬声器设备接触。这意味着硬盘无法窃听真人讲话。
papers.title_zh: 听力检查失败：使用激光振动法分析硬盘驱动器窃听语音振动的潜力

papers.title: GraphTrack: A Graph-based Cross-Device Tracking Framework
papers.authors: Binghui Wang, Tianchen Zhou, Song Li, Yinzhi Cao, Neil Zhenqiang Gong
papers.abstract: Cross-device tracking has drawn growing attention from both commercial companies and the general public because of its privacy implications and applications for user profiling, personalized services, etc. One particular, wide-used type of cross-device tracking is to leverage browsing histories of user devices, e.g., characterized by a list of IP addresses used by the devices and domains visited by the devices. However, existing browsing history based methods have three drawbacks. First, they cannot capture latent correlations among IPs and domains. Second, their performance degrades significantly when labeled device pairs are unavailable. Lastly, they are not robust to uncertainties in linking browsing histories to devices. We propose GraphTrack, a graph-based cross-device tracking framework, to track users across different devices by correlating their browsing histories. Specifically, we propose to model the complex interplays among IPs, domains, and devices as graphs and capture the latent correlations between IPs and between domains. We construct graphs that are robust to uncertainties in linking browsing histories to devices. Moreover, we adapt random walk with restart to compute similarity scores between devices based on the graphs. GraphTrack leverages the similarity scores to perform cross-device tracking. GraphTrack does not require labeled device pairs and can incorporate them if available. We evaluate GraphTrack on two real-world datasets, i.e., a publicly available mobile-desktop tracking dataset (around 100 users) and a multiple-device tracking dataset (154K users) we collected. Our results show that GraphTrack substantially outperforms the state-of-the-art on both datasets.
papers.abstract_zh: 跨设备跟踪已经吸引了商业公司和普通公众越来越多的关注，因为其隐私含义和对用户简档、个性化服务等的应用。一种特定的、广泛使用的跨设备跟踪类型是利用用户设备的浏览历史，例如，由设备使用的IP地址和设备访问的域的列表来表征。然而，现有的基于浏览历史的方法有三个缺点。首先，它们无法捕捉IP和域名之间的潜在关联。其次，当标记的设备对不可用时，它们的性能会显著下降。最后，在将浏览历史与设备联系起来时，它们对不确定性不够稳健。我们提出了基于图的跨设备跟踪框架GraphTrack，通过关联用户的浏览历史来跟踪不同设备上的用户。具体来说，我们建议将IP、域和设备之间的复杂相互作用建模为图形，并捕捉IP之间和域之间的潜在相关性。我们构建的图对于链接浏览历史和设备的不确定性是鲁棒的。此外，我们采用带重启的随机行走来基于图形计算设备之间的相似性得分。GraphTrack利用相似性分数来执行跨设备跟踪。GraphTrack不需要带标签的设备对，如果可用，可以合并它们。我们在两个真实世界的数据集上评估了GraphTrack，即一个公开可用的移动桌面跟踪数据集(约100个用户)和一个我们收集的多设备跟踪数据集(154K个用户)。我们的结果表明，GraphTrack在两个数据集上都大大优于最先进的技术。
papers.title_zh: GraphTrack：基于图形的跨设备跟踪框架

papers.title: SteinerLog: Prize Collecting the Audit Logs for Threat Hunting on Enterprise Network
papers.authors: Bibek Bhattarai, H. Howie Huang
papers.abstract: Advanced cyberattacks are carried out in multiple stages, where each stage performs a specific task corresponding to the campaign. While these steps are designed to blend in with benign activities, they leave their activity footprints across multiple logs on the machines inside the victim environment. The majority of these footprints when looked at in isolation seem benign to the activity monitors. Existing threat hunting systems require a significant amount of human effort to correlate these events in order to detect and reconstruct an attack campaign. This paper introduces SteinerLog, an end-to-end system to automate the task of correlating the alerts to detect ongoing attack campaigns within an enterprise network. SteinerLog takes the alerts generated by mature intelligence-based and anomaly-based alerting systems and uses causal analysis to extract the group of events that are most likely to represent the attackers' activities. It performs hierarchical graph traversal to perform cross-host attacker activity correlation, which includes detecting the compromised entities, reconstructing the attackers' steps, and abstracting them into easy-to-understand attack graphs. The experiments show that it is able to detect APT campaigns in real-time and scale to an enterprise system with hundreds of workstations.
papers.abstract_zh: 高级网络攻击分多个阶段进行，其中每个阶段执行与战役相对应的特定任务。虽然这些步骤旨在融入良性活动，但它们会在受害者环境中的机器上的多个日志中留下活动足迹。孤立地看，这些足迹中的大多数对活动监视器来说似乎是良性的。现有的威胁搜寻系统需要大量的人力来关联这些事件，以便检测和重建攻击活动。本文介绍了SteinerLog，这是一个端到端系统，可以自动关联警报，以检测企业网络中正在进行的攻击活动。SteinerLog采用成熟的基于情报和基于异常的警报系统生成的警报，并使用因果分析来提取最有可能代表攻击者活动的事件组。它执行分层图遍历来执行跨主机的攻击者活动关联，这包括检测被破坏的实体，重构攻击者的步骤，并将其抽象为易于理解的攻击图。实验表明，它能够实时检测APT活动，并可扩展到拥有数百个工作站的企业系统。
papers.title_zh: Steinerlog：在企业网络上收集审计日志以搜寻威胁的审计日志

papers.title: Evaluating Blockchain Protocols with Abusive Modeling
papers.authors: Vishal Sharma, Pawel Szalachowski, Jianying Zhou
papers.abstract: Strategic evaluations of blockchain systems allow a better understanding of the security of the mining process. In recent years, many researchers have focused on developing optimal strategies to evaluate the impact of an adversary on the mining process using different attack situations such as selfish mining, double-spending, feather-forking, Denial of Service. These strategies rely on the use of the Markov Decision Process (MDP) to find optimal settings that an adversary can exploit to earn maximum profit in every round. However, these strategies do not consider a case where adversaries turn abusive, and their only aim is to harm the mining process without profit. Motivated by this, a self-defying adversary model is proposed that uses ZEBRA (Zero Expectation-Based Reward Abuse) strategy to cause a maximum impact on the rewards of the honest players at lower settings. With the proposed method, the adversary itself may not be profitable, but has better control over the chain growth and causes maximum damage to reward by delaying the blocks and inducing forks subject to its compliance degree. The evaluations are demonstrated to show the reward control by the adversary along with the impact on delays and forks, followed by the possibilities of attacks using the hashing powers of different mining pools.
papers.abstract_zh: 区块链系统的战略评估有助于更好地了解采矿过程的安全性。近年来，许多研究人员致力于开发最优策略来评估对手在不同攻击情况下对挖掘过程的影响，如自私挖掘、双重花费、羽毛分叉、拒绝服务等。这些策略依赖于使用马尔可夫决策过程(MDP)来寻找对手可以利用来在每一轮中赚取最大利润的最佳设置。然而，这些策略没有考虑对手滥用的情况，他们的唯一目的是损害采矿过程而没有利润。受此启发，提出了一个自我挑战对手模型，该模型使用ZEBRA(零期望奖励滥用)策略，在较低的设置下对诚实玩家的奖励产生最大的影响。利用所提出的方法，对手本身可能没有利润，但对链增长有更好的控制，并通过延迟阻塞和根据其顺从程度诱导分叉来对奖励造成最大损害。评估被演示以显示对手的奖励控制以及对延迟和分叉的影响，随后是使用不同挖掘池的散列能力的攻击的可能性。
papers.title_zh: 用滥用建模评估区块链协议

papers.title: Exploring Unfairness on Proof of Authority: Order Manipulation Attacks and Remedies
papers.authors: Qin Wang, Rujia Li, Qi Wang, Shiping Chen, Yang Xiang
papers.abstract: Proof of Authority (PoA) is a type of permissioned consensus algorithm with a fixed committee. PoA has been widely adopted by communities and industries due to its better performance and faster finality. In this paper, we explore the unfairness issue existing in the current PoA implementations. We have investigated 2,500+ in the wild projects and selected 10+ as our main focus (covering Ethereum, Binance smart chain, etc.). We have identified two types of order manipulation attacks to separately break the transaction-level (a.k.a. transaction ordering) and the block-level (sealer position ordering) fairness. Both of them merely rely on honest-but-profitable sealer assumption without modifying original settings. We launch these attacks on the forked branches under an isolated environment and carefully evaluate the attacking scope towards different implementations. To date (as of Nov 2021), the potentially affected PoA market cap can reach up to 681,087 million USD. Besides, we further dive into the source code of selected projects, and accordingly, propose our recommendation for the fix. To the best of knowledge, this work provides the first exploration of the unfairness issue in PoA algorithms.
papers.abstract_zh: 权威证明(PoA)是一种有固定委员会的许可共识算法。PoA因其更好的性能和更快的终结性而被社区和行业广泛采用。本文探讨了当前PoA实施中存在的不公平问题。我们在野外项目中调查了2500+，选择了10+作为我们的主要关注点(涵盖以太坊、币安智能链等。).我们已经确定了两种类型的订单操纵攻击，分别破坏事务级(也称为事务排序)和块级(密封器位置排序)的公平性。他们都仅仅依靠诚实但有利可图的密封假设，而没有修改原始设置。我们在隔离环境下对分叉的分支发起这些攻击，并仔细评估针对不同实现的攻击范围。迄今为止(截至2021年11月)，潜在受影响的PoA市值可达6810.87亿美元。此外，我们进一步深入选定项目的源代码，并相应地提出我们的修复建议。据所知，这项工作提供了PoA算法的不公平问题的首次探索。
papers.title_zh: 探索权威证明的不公平：命令操纵攻击和补救措施

papers.title: AuxChannel: Enabling Efficient Bi-Directional Channel for Scriptless Blockchains
papers.authors: Zhimei Sui, Joseph K. Liu, Jiangshan Yu, Man Ho Au, Jia Liu
papers.abstract: Payment channels have been a promising solution to blockchain scalability. While payment channels for script-empowered blockchains (such as Bitcoin and Ethereum) have been well studied, developing payment channels for scriptless blockchains (such as Monero) is considered challenging. In particular, nabling bidirectional payment on scriptless blockchains remains an open challenge. This work closes this gap by providing AuxChannel, the first bi-directional payment channel protocol for scriptless blockchains, meaning that building payment channels only requires the support of verifiably encrypted signature (aka adaptor signature) on the underlying blockchain. AuxChannel leverages verifiably encrypted signature to create a commitment for each off-chain payment and deploys a verifiable decentralised key escrow service to resolve dispute. To enable efficient construction of AuxChannel, we introduce a new cryptographic primitive, named Consecutive Verifiably Encrypted Signature (CVES), as a core building block and it can also be of independent interest for other applications. We provide and implement a provably secure instantiation on Schnorr-based CVES. We also provide a formal security analysis on the security of the AuxChannel.
papers.abstract_zh: 支付渠道是解决区块链可扩展性的一个有前途的方案。虽然已经对基于文字的区块链(如比特币和以太坊)的支付渠道进行了深入研究，但为无文字的区块链(如Monero)开发支付渠道被认为具有挑战性。特别是，在无文字的区块链上实现双向支付仍然是一个公开的挑战。这项工作通过提供AuxChannel填补了这一空白，aux channel是首个用于无脚本区块链的双向支付通道协议，这意味着构建支付通道只需要在底层区块链上支持可验证加密签名(又名适配器签名)。AuxChannel利用可验证的加密签名为每笔链外支付创建承诺，并部署可验证的分散式密钥托管服务来解决争议。为了实现AuxChannel的高效构造，我们引入了一种新的密码原语，称为连续可验证加密签名(CVES)，作为核心构建块，它也可以独立于其他应用程序。我们在基于Schnorr的CVES上提供并实现了一个可证明安全的实例化。我们还对AuxChannel的安全性进行了形式化的分析。
papers.title_zh: AuxChannel：为无脚本区块链启用有效的双向通道

papers.title: Eliminating Sandwich Attacks with the Help of Game Theory
papers.authors: Lioba Heimbach, Roger Wattenhofer
papers.abstract: Predatory trading bots lurking in Ethereum's mempool present invisible taxation of traders on automated market makers (AMMs). AMM traders specify a slippage tolerance to indicate the maximum price movement they are willing to accept. This way, traders avoid automatic transaction failure in case of small price movements before their trade request executes. However, while a too-small slippage tolerance may lead to trade failures, a too-large slippage tolerance allows predatory trading bots to profit from sandwich attacks. These bots can extract the difference between the slippage tolerance and the actual price movement as profit. In this work, we introduce the sandwich game to analyze sandwich attacks analytically from both the attacker and victim perspectives. Moreover, we provide a simple and highly effective algorithm that traders can use to set the slippage tolerance. We unveil that most broadcasted transactions can avoid sandwich attacks while simultaneously only experiencing a low risk of transaction failure. Thereby, we demonstrate that a constant auto-slippage cannot adjust to varying trade sizes and pool characteristics. Our algorithm outperforms the constant auto-slippage suggested by the biggest AMM, Uniswap, in all performed tests. Specifically, our algorithm repeatedly demonstrates a cost reduction exceeding a factor of 100.
papers.abstract_zh: 潜伏在以太坊内存池中的掠夺性交易机器人向自动做市商(AMMs)提交了交易者的隐形税收。AMM交易者指定了一个滑点允差来表示他们愿意接受的最大价格波动。这样，在交易请求执行之前，交易者可以避免价格小幅波动时的自动交易失败。然而，太小的滑点容忍度可能会导致交易失败，太大的滑点容忍度会让掠夺性交易机器人从三明治攻击中获利。这些机器人可以提取滑点公差和实际价格变动之间的差异作为利润。在这篇文章中，我们引入了三明治游戏来从攻击者和受害者两个角度分析三明治攻击。此外，我们提供了一个简单高效的算法，交易者可以用它来设置滑点容差。我们发现，大多数广播事务可以避免三明治攻击，同时只经历较低的事务失败风险。因此，我们证明了持续的自动滑点不能适应不同的交易规模和池特征。在所有执行的测试中，我们的算法优于最大的AMM unis WAP提出的恒定自动滑移。具体来说，我们的算法反复证明成本降低超过100倍。
papers.title_zh: 在游戏理论的帮助下消除三明治攻击

papers.title: TRAP: The Bait of Rational Players to Solve Byzantine Consensus
papers.authors: Alejandro Ranchal-Pedrosa, Vincent Gramoli
papers.abstract: It is impossible to solve the Byzantine consensus problem in an open network of n participants if only 2n/3 or less of them are correct. As blockchains need to solve consensus, one might think that blockchains need more than 2n/3 correct participants. But it is yet unknown whether consensus can be solved when less than 2n/3 participants are correct and k participants are rational players, which misbehave if they can gain the loot. Trading correct participants for rational players may not seem helpful to solve consensus since rational players can misbehave whereas correct participants, by definition, cannot. In this paper, we show that consensus is actually solvable in this model, even with less than 2n/3 correct participants. The key idea is a baiting strategy that lets rational players pretend to misbehave in joining a coalition but rewards them to betray this coalition before the loot gets stolen. We propose Trap, a protocol that builds upon recent advances in the theory of accountability to solve consensus as soon as n >max 〈3 over 2 (k +3t,2) 〉 where no coalition of k rational players can coordinate to increase their expected utility regardless of the arbitrary behavior of up to t Byzantine players. Finally, we show that a baiting strategy is necessary and sufficient to solve this, so-called rational agreement problem. First, we show that it is impossible to solve this rational agreement problem without implementing a baiting strategy. Second, the existence of Trap demonstrates the sufficiency of the baiting strategy. Our Trap protocol finds applications in blockchains to prevent players from disagreeing, that could otherwise lead to "double spending''.
papers.abstract_zh: 如果只有2n/3或更少的参与者是正确的，那么在n个参与者的开放网络中解决拜占庭一致性问题是不可能的。正如区块链需要解决共识一样，有人可能认为区块链需要超过2n/3的正确参与者。但是，当少于2n/3的参与者是正确的，k个参与者是理性的参与者，如果他们可以获得战利品，他们会行为不端时，共识是否可以解决还是未知的。用正确的参与者交换理性的参与者似乎无助于解决共识，因为理性的参与者可能会行为不端，而正确的参与者，顾名思义，则不会。在本文中，我们证明了在这个模型中，即使正确参与者少于2n/3，共识实际上也是可解的。关键的想法是一个诱饵策略，让理性的玩家假装在加入联盟时行为不端，但奖励他们在战利品被盗之前背叛这个联盟。我们提出了Trap协议，该协议建立在责任理论的最新进展上，在n >max 〈3超过2 (k +3t，2) 〉的情况下，不管多达t个拜占庭参与者的任意行为如何，k个理性参与者的联盟都无法协调以增加他们的预期效用。最后，我们证明了诱饵策略对于解决这个所谓的理性协议问题是必要的和充分的。首先，我们证明了不实施诱饵策略是不可能解决这个理性协议问题的。第二，陷阱的存在证明了诱饵策略的充分性。我们的陷阱协议在区块链找到应用，以防止玩家不同意，否则可能导致“双重消费”。
papers.title_zh: 陷阱：解决拜占庭共识的理性玩家的诱饵

papers.title: VWAnalyzer: A Systematic Security Analysis Framework for the Voice over WiFi Protocol
papers.authors: Hyunwoo Lee, Imtiaz Karim, Ninghui Li, Elisa Bertino
papers.abstract: In this paper, we evaluate the security of the Voice over WiFi (VoWiFi) protocol by proposing the VWAnalyzer framework. We model five critical procedures of the VoWiFi protocol and deploy a model-based testing approach to uncover potential design flaws. Since the standards of the VoWiFi protocol contain underspecifications that can lead to vulnerable scenarios, VWAnalyzer explicitly deals with them. Unlike prior approaches that do not consider the underspecifications, VWAnalyzer adopts a systematic approach that constructs diverse and viable scenarios based on the underspecifications and substantially reduces the number of possible scenarios. Then the scenarios are verified against security properties. VWAnalyzer automatically generates 960 viable scenarios to be analyzed among 10,368 scenarios (91% decrease) from the initial models. We demonstrate the effectiveness of VWAnalyzer by verifying 38 properties and uncovering 3 new attacks. Notable among our findings is the denial-of-cellular-connectivity attack, due to insecure handover that disconnects the user through both VoWiFi and VoLTE. To ensure that the exposed attacks pose real threats and are indeed realizable in practice, we have validated the attacks in a real-world testbed. We also report several implementations issues that were uncovered during the testbed evaluation.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们通过提出VWAnalyzer框架来评估WiFi语音(VoWiFi)协议的安全性。我们对VoWiFi协议的五个关键程序进行建模，并部署基于模型的测试方法来发现潜在的设计缺陷。由于VoWiFi协议的标准包含可能导致易受攻击场景的不规范，VWAnalyzer明确地处理了它们。与不考虑欠规范的现有方法不同，VWAnalyzer采用了一种系统化的方法，该方法基于欠规范构建多样且可行的场景，并大大减少了可能场景的数量。然后根据安全属性验证这些场景。VWAnalyzer从初始模型的10，368个场景(减少91%)中自动生成960个可行场景进行分析。我们通过验证38个属性和发现3个新攻击来证明VWAnalyzer的有效性。我们的发现中值得注意的是拒绝蜂窝连接攻击，这是由于不安全的切换导致用户通过VoWiFi和VoLTE断开连接。为了确保暴露的攻击构成真正的威胁，并且在实践中确实是可实现的，我们已经在真实世界的测试床上验证了这些攻击。我们还报告了在测试床评估期间发现的几个实现问题。
papers.title_zh: VWANALYZER：通过WiFi协议的语音的系统安全分析框架

papers.title: BLURtooth: Exploiting Cross-Transport Key Derivation in Bluetooth Classic and Bluetooth Low Energy
papers.authors: Daniele Antonioli, Nils Ole Tippenhauer, Kasper Rasmussen, Mathias Payer
papers.abstract: Bluetooth is a pervasive wireless technology specified in an open standard. The standard defines Bluetooth Classic (BT) for high-throughput wireless services and Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) very low-power ones. The standard also specifies security mechanisms, such as pairing, session establishment, and cross-transport key derivation (CTKD). CTKD enables devices to establish BT and BLE security keys by pairing just once. CTKD was introduced in 2014 with Bluetooth 4.2 to improve usability. However, the security implications of CTKD were not studied carefully. This work demonstrates that CTKD is a valuable and novel Bluetooth attack surface. It enables, among others, to exploit BT and BLE just by targeting one of the two (i.e., Bluetooth cross-transport exploitation). We present the design of the first cross-transport attacks on Bluetooth. Our attacks exploit issues that we identified in the specification of CTKD. For example, we find that CTKD enables an adversary to overwrite pairing keys across transports. We leverage these vulnerabilities to impersonate, machine-in-the-middle, and establish unintended sessions with any Bluetooth device supporting CTKD. Since the presented attacks blur the security boundary between BT and BLE, we name them BLUR attacks. We provide a low-cost implementation of the attacks and test it on a broad set of devices. In particular, we successfully attack 16 devices with 14 unique Bluetooth chips from popular vendors (e.g., Cypress, Intel, Qualcomm, CSR, Google, and Samsung), with Bluetooth standard versions of up to 5.2. We discuss why the countermeasures in the Bluetooth are not effective against our attacks, and we develop and evaluate practical and effective alternatives.
papers.abstract_zh: 蓝牙是一种在开放标准中规定的普及无线技术。该标准将蓝牙经典(BT)定义为高吞吐量无线服务，将蓝牙低能量(BLE)定义为极低功率服务。该标准还规定了安全机制，如配对、会话建立和跨传输密钥派生(CTKD)。CTKD使设备只需配对一次就能建立BT和BLE安全密钥。CTKD是在2014年随着蓝牙4.2推出的，旨在提高可用性。然而，没有仔细研究CTKD的安全含义。这项工作表明，CTKD是一个有价值的新的蓝牙攻击面。除了其他功能之外，它还支持仅通过将BT和BLE中的一个作为目标来利用这两者(即蓝牙跨传输利用)。我们提出了第一个蓝牙跨传输攻击的设计。我们的攻击利用了我们在CTKD规范中发现的问题。例如，我们发现CTKD使对手能够跨传输覆盖配对密钥。我们利用这些漏洞来冒充、中间人，并与任何支持CTKD的蓝牙设备建立非预期的会话。由于提出的攻击模糊了英国电信和BLE之间的安全界限，我们将它们命名为模糊攻击。我们提供了攻击的低成本实现，并在多种设备上进行了测试。特别是，我们成功地攻击了16款采用14种独特蓝牙芯片的设备，这些芯片来自热门供应商(如赛普拉斯、英特尔、高通、CSR、谷歌和三星)，蓝牙标准版本高达5.2。我们讨论了为什么蓝牙中的对抗措施对我们的攻击无效，并开发和评估了实用有效的替代方案。
papers.title_zh: 蓝牙：利用蓝牙经典和蓝牙低能的跨通道密钥推导

papers.title: Mirror, Mirror on the Wall: Wireless Environment Reconfiguration Attacks Based on Fast Software-Controlled Surfaces
papers.authors: Paul Staat, Harald Elders-Boll, Markus Heinrichs, Christian T. Zenger, Christof Paar
papers.abstract: The intelligent reflecting surface (IRS) is a promising new paradigm in wireless communications for meeting the growing connectivity demands in next-generation mobile networks. IRS, also known as software-controlled metasurfaces, consist of an array of adjustable radio wave reflectors, enabling smart radio environments, e.g., for enhancing the signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) and spatial diversity of wireless channels. Research on IRS to date has been largely focused on constructive applications. In this work, we demonstrate for the first time that the IRS provides a practical low-cost toolkit for attackers to easily perform complex signal manipulation attacks on the physical layer in real time. We introduce the environment reconfiguration attack (ERA) as a novel class of jamming attacks in wireless radio networks. Here, an adversary leverages the IRS to rapidly vary the electromagnetic propagation environment to disturb legitimate receivers. The IRS gives the adversary a key advantage over traditional jamming: It no longer has to actively emit jamming signals, instead the IRS reflects existing legitimate signals. In addition, the adversary doesn't need any knowledge about the legitimate channel. We thoroughly investigate the ERA in wireless systems based on the widely employed orthogonal frequency division multiplexing (OFDM) modulation. We present insights into the attack through analytical analysis, simulations, as well as experiments. Our results show that the ERA allows to severely degrade the available data rates even with reasonably small IRS sizes. Finally, we implement an attacker setup and demonstrate a practical ERA to slow down an entire Wi-Fi network.
papers.abstract_zh: 智能反射表面(IRS)是无线通信中一种有前途的新模式，用于满足下一代移动网络中不断增长的连接需求。IRS也称为软件控制的元表面，由一系列可调节的无线电波反射器组成，支持智能无线电环境，例如，用于提高无线信道的信噪比(SNR)和空间分集。到目前为止，对IRS的研究主要集中在建设性的应用上。在这项工作中，我们首次证明了IRS为攻击者提供了一个实用的低成本工具包，可以实时轻松地在物理层上执行复杂的信号操纵攻击。我们介绍了环境重构攻击(ERA)作为一种新型的无线网络干扰攻击。在这种情况下，对手利用IRS快速改变电磁传播环境来干扰合法接收器。与传统干扰相比，IRS给了对手一个关键优势:它不再需要主动发射干扰信号，而是IRS反射现有的合法信号。此外，对手不需要任何关于合法信道的知识。我们深入研究了基于广泛使用的正交频分复用(OFDM)调制的无线系统中的ERA。我们通过分析、模拟以及实验来展示对攻击的见解。我们的结果表明，ERA允许严重降低可用数据速率，即使IRS尺寸相当小。最后，我们实现了一个攻击者设置，并演示了一个降低整个Wi-Fi网络速度的实用时代。
papers.title_zh: 镜子，墙上的镜子：基于快速软件控制的表面的无线环境重新配置攻击

papers.title: Wireless Manipulation of Serial Communication
papers.authors: Gökçen Yilmaz Dayanikli, Abdullah Zubair Mohammed, Ryan M. Gerdes, Mani Mina
papers.abstract: Wired serial communication (e.g., UART, I2C) is widely used to exchange information between sensors, actuators, and controllers in automation, control, and cyber-physical systems. In this work, it is demonstrated that intentional electromagnetic interference (IEMI) can be utilized to not only induce spurious serial communications but to also alter legitimate communications, arbitrarily and at a distance, through attacks that cause controlled, bidirectional bit flips. To prove the efficacy of such attacks, two attack signal types, which require differing levels of attacker knowledge and resources to be effective, are proposed and evaluated against UART and I2C serial communication systems. The first attack waveform, which we call simple, is an inexpensive--to--produce narrowband waveform that has high power and tight timing constraints, but requires little attacker knowledge about the targeted system, while the second waveform, which we call complex, leverages a wideband signal that requires less power to achieve the same effect, is more tolerant of timing error in the signal processing phase, but requires a high amount of attacker knowledge of the targeted system. The simple waveform is shown to be over 98.3% effective at inducing a desired bit sequence into randomly transmitted UART frames, which indicates that an attacker could also choose to inject spurious UART frames, at will. On the I2C data streams, the complex waveform is demonstrated to be overall 75% effective in inducing random bits. Countermeasures are discussed and experimentally validated in high-IEMI scenarios.
papers.abstract_zh: 有线串行通信(例如，UART、I2C)广泛用于在自动化、控制和信息物理系统中的传感器、致动器和控制器之间交换信息。在这项工作中，证明了故意电磁干扰(IEMI)不仅可以用来诱导虚假的串行通信，而且还可以通过攻击在一定距离内任意改变合法的通信，从而导致受控的双向比特翻转。为了证明这种攻击的有效性，提出了两种攻击信号类型，并针对UART和I2C串行通信系统进行了评估，这两种攻击信号类型需要不同水平的攻击者知识和资源才能有效。我们称之为简单的第一种攻击波形是一种生产成本低廉的窄带波形，具有高功率和严格的时序限制，但要求攻击者了解目标系统的知识很少；而我们称之为复杂的第二种波形利用宽带信号，需要较少的功率来实现相同的效果，更能容忍信号处理阶段的时序误差，但要求攻击者了解目标系统的大量知识。该简单波形在将所需的位序列引入随机发送的UART帧方面的效率超过98.3%，这表明攻击者也可以随意选择注入伪UART帧。在I2C数据流上，复合波形被证明在诱导随机比特方面总体上有75%的效率。在高IEMI场景中讨论并实验验证了对策。
papers.title_zh: 无线操纵串行通信

papers.title: The 5G Key-Establishment Stack: In-Depth Formal Verification and Experimentation
papers.authors: Rhys Miller, Ioana Boureanu, Stephan Wesemeyer, Christopher J. P. Newton
papers.abstract: We formally analyse the security of each 5G authenticated key- establisment (AKE) procedures: the 5G registration, the 5G authentication and key agreement (AKA) and 5G handovers. We also study the security of their composition, which we call the 5GAKE_stack. Our security analysis focuses on aspects of multi-party AKEs that occur in the 5GAKE_stack. We also look at the consequences this AKE (in)security has over critical mobile-networks' objects such as the Protocol Data Unit (PDU) sessions, which are used to bill sub- scribers and ensure quality of service as per their contracts/plans. In our assessments, we augment the standard Dolev-Yao model with different levels of trust and threat by considering honest, honest-but-curious, as well as completely rogue radio nodes. We formally prove security in the first case, and insecurity in the latter two as well as making formal recommendations on this. We carry out our formal analysis using the Tamarin-Prover. Lastly, we also present an emulator of the 5GAKE_stack. This can be a useful "5G API"-like tool for the community to experiment with the 5GAKE_stack, since the 5G networks are not yet fully deployed and mobile networks are proprietary and closed "loops"
papers.abstract_zh: 我们形式化地分析了每个5G认证密钥建立(AKE)过程的安全性:5G注册、5G认证和密钥协商(AKA)以及5G切换。我们还研究了它们组成的安全性，我们称之为5GAKE_stack。我们的安全分析集中在发生在5GAKE_stack中的多方AKE方面。我们还研究了AKE (in)安全性对关键移动网络对象(如协议数据单元(PDU)会话)的影响，PDU会话用于根据用户的合同/计划对用户进行计费并确保服务质量。在我们的评估中，我们通过考虑诚实、诚实但好奇以及完全流氓的无线电节点，用不同的信任和威胁级别来增强标准的Dolev-Yao模型。我们正式证明了第一种情况下的安全性，后两种情况下的不安全性，并就此提出了正式建议。我们使用Tamarin-Prover进行形式分析。最后，我们给出了一个5GAKE_stack的仿真器。对于社区来说，这可能是一个有用的类似“5G API”的工具，可以用来试验5G _ stack，因为5G网络尚未完全部署，移动网络是专有的封闭“环路”
papers.title_zh: 5G密钥建筑堆栈：深入正式验证和实验

papers.title: Missed Opportunities: Measuring the Untapped TLS Support in the Industrial Internet of Things
papers.authors: Markus Dahlmanns, Johannes Lohmöller, Jan Pennekamp, Jörn Bodenhausen, Klaus Wehrle, Martin Henze
papers.abstract: The ongoing trend to move industrial appliances from previously isolated networks to the Internet requires fundamental changes in security to uphold secure and safe operation. Consequently, to ensure end-to-end secure communication and authentication, (i) traditional industrial protocols, e.g., Modbus, are retrofitted with TLS support, and (ii) modern protocols, e.g., MQTT, are directly designed to use TLS. To understand whether these changes indeed lead to secure Industrial Internet of Things deployments, i.e., using TLS-based protocols, which are configured according to security best practices, we perform an Internet-wide security assessment of ten industrial protocols covering the complete IPv4 address space. Our results show that both, retrofitted existing protocols and newly developed secure alternatives, are barely noticeable in the wild. While we find that new protocols have a higher TLS adoption rate than traditional protocols (7.2% vs. 0.4%), the overall adoption of TLS is comparably low (6.5% of hosts). Thus, most industrial deployments (934,736 hosts) are insecurely connected to the Internet. Furthermore, we identify that 42% of hosts with TLS support (26,665 hosts) show security deficits, e.g., missing access control. Finally, we show that support in configuring systems securely, e.g., via configuration templates, is promising to strengthen security.
papers.abstract_zh: 将工业设备从以前孤立的网络转移到互联网的趋势要求从根本上改变安全性，以维持安全可靠的操作。因此，为了确保端到端的安全通信和认证，(I)传统的工业协议，例如Modbus，被改造成支持TLS，以及(ii)现代协议，例如MQTT，被直接设计成使用TLS。为了了解这些变化是否真的会导致安全的工业物联网部署，即使用基于TLS的协议，这些协议是根据安全最佳实践配置的，我们对涵盖完整IPv4地址空间的10个工业协议进行了互联网范围的安全评估。我们的结果显示，无论是改进的现有协议还是新开发的安全替代方案，在野外都几乎看不到。虽然我们发现新协议的TLS采用率高于传统协议(7.2%比0.4%)，但TLS的整体采用率相对较低(主机的6.5%)。因此，大多数工业部署(934，736台主机)与互联网的连接都不安全。此外，我们发现42%支持TLS的主机(26，665台主机)存在安全缺陷，例如缺少访问控制。最后，我们表明，支持安全地配置系统，例如，通过配置模板，有希望加强安全性。
papers.title_zh: 错过的机会：测量工业互联网中未开发的TLS支持

papers.title: On the Security of the FLARM Collision Warning System
papers.authors: Boya Wang, Giorgio Tresoldi, Martin Strohmeier, Vincent Lenders
papers.abstract: In the past decade, the vulnerability of aircraft communications against low-resourced attackers has received significant attention both in the information security community and from aviation industry and regulators. Until now, research on attacks against such communications technologies has focused on larger aircraft, neglecting the technologies used in light aircraft and unmanned aerial vehicles (UAV). As such lighter aircraft make up a large and growing majority of both airspace users and casualties, this is a glaring oversight from a security and safety perspective. To alleviate this problem, we conduct a first comprehensive security analysis of the FLARM ecosystem, a collision avoidance system focusing on light aircraft and UAV with a large and increasing distribution in many countries. Besides being used in more than 40,000 aircraft, several large providers of air traffic data capture the unauthenticated FLARM data using ground receivers in order to feed crucial downstream applications. To show the vulnerability of this ecosystem, we design, implement and evaluate a practical spoofing attack, which is capable of interacting with FLARM receivers in the air and on the ground. The demonstrated attack uses low-cost hardware and open-source software and is as such accessible to a wide range of threat actors, resulting in a significant potential impact on the safety of all airspace users. Finally, in order to counter such attacks, we propose a first anomaly detection approach based on physical-layer characteristics and validate it with real-world aircraft data.
papers.abstract_zh: 在过去的十年中，飞机通信对低资源攻击者的脆弱性已经引起了信息安全界和航空业及监管机构的极大关注。到目前为止，针对这种通信技术的攻击研究一直集中在大型飞机上，而忽略了轻型飞机和无人驾驶飞行器(UAV)中使用的技术。由于这种轻型飞机在空域使用者和伤亡人员中占很大的比例，而且这一比例还在不断上升，从安全角度来看，这是一个明显的疏忽。为了缓解这个问题，我们对FLARM生态系统进行了第一次全面的安全分析，FLARM生态系统是一个以轻型飞机和UAV为重点的防撞系统，在许多国家有大量且不断增加的分布。除了在40，000多架飞机上使用之外，几家大型空中交通数据提供商还使用地面接收器捕获未经认证的FLARM数据，以便提供给关键的下游应用程序。为了显示这个生态系统的脆弱性，我们设计、实现并评估了一个实际的欺骗攻击，它能够与空中和地面的FLARM接收器进行交互。演示的攻击使用低成本硬件和开源软件，因此可以被各种各样的威胁行为者获取，从而对所有空域用户的安全产生重大的潜在影响。最后，为了应对这种攻击，我们提出了第一种基于物理层特征的异常检测方法，并用真实的飞机数据进行了验证。
papers.title_zh: 关于Flarm碰撞警告系统的安全

papers.title: Hopper: Per-Device Nano Segmentation for the Industrial IoT
papers.authors: Piet De Vaere, Andrea Tulimiero, Adrian Perrig
papers.abstract: Today's industrial networks heavily rely on perimeter-based security. Although this has worked well in the past, the advent of the industrial IoT is blurring the network boundary, and thereby undermining the effectiveness of perimeter-based network defences. To address this, we propose Hopper: an industrial IoT security protocol that places each network host in its own access-controlled nano segment, thus minimizing the attack surface introduced by connecting devices to the network. Because Hopper enforces nano segmentation in-fabric, it does not require modifications to how packets are routed. Hopper achieves this by allowing each network node to verify that each packet it processes is part of a desired flow and was generated by an authorized host. Packets that fail any of these checks are dropped en route. By leveraging prevalent industrial network features, Hopper accomplishes low management and bandwidth overhead while being suitable for a wide range of networks. Our implementation on IoT-class hardware demonstrates that Hopper achieves high throughput and scalability, even in constrained environments.
papers.abstract_zh: 当今的工业网络严重依赖基于边界的安全性。尽管这在过去一直行之有效，但工业物联网的出现正在模糊网络边界，从而削弱基于边界的网络防御的有效性。为了解决这一问题，我们提出了Hopper:一种工业物联网安全协议，将每个网络主机放在自己的访问控制纳米段中，从而最大限度地减少因设备连接到网络而引入的攻击面。由于Hopper在结构中实施纳米分段，因此不需要修改数据包的路由方式。Hopper通过允许每个网络节点验证它处理的每个数据包都是所需流的一部分并且是由授权主机生成的来实现这一点。未能通过这些检查的数据包会在途中被丢弃。通过利用流行的工业网络功能，Hopper实现了低管理和带宽开销，同时适用于各种网络。我们在物联网级硬件上的实施表明，即使在受限的环境中，Hopper也能实现高吞吐量和可扩展性。
papers.title_zh: 料斗：工业物联网的人均纳米细分

papers.title: Signal Injection Attacks against CCD Image Sensors
papers.authors: Sebastian Köhler, Richard Baker, Ivan Martinovic
papers.abstract: Since cameras have become a crucial part in many safety-critical systems and applications, such as autonomous vehicles and surveillance, a large body of academic and non-academic work has shown attacks against their main component --- the image sensor. However, these attacks are limited to coarse-grained and often suspicious injections because light is used as an attack vector. Furthermore, due to the nature of optical attacks, they require the line-of-sight between the adversary and the target camera. In this paper, we present a novel post-transducer signal injection attack against CCD image sensors, as they are used in professional, scientific, and even military settings. We show how electromagnetic emanation can be used to manipulate the image information captured by a CCD image sensor with the granularity down to the brightness of individual pixels. We study the feasibility of our attack and then demonstrate its effects in the scenario of automatic barcode scanning. Our results indicate that the injected distortion can disrupt automated vision-based intelligent systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于摄像头已成为许多安全关键系统和应用(如自动驾驶汽车和监控)的重要组成部分，大量学术和非学术工作显示了对其主要组件图像传感器的攻击。然而，这些攻击仅限于粗粒度且通常可疑的注射，因为光被用作攻击媒介。此外，由于光学攻击的性质，它们需要对手和目标摄像机之间的视线。在本文中，我们提出了一种针对CCD图像传感器的新型传感器后信号注入攻击，因为它们用于专业、科学甚至军事环境中。我们展示了如何使用电磁辐射来处理CCD图像传感器捕获的图像信息，其粒度低至单个像素的亮度。我们研究了我们的攻击的可行性，然后在自动条形码扫描的场景中演示了它的效果。我们的结果表明，注入的失真会破坏基于视觉的自动智能系统。
papers.title_zh: 针对CCD图像传感器的信号注入攻击

papers.title: No Spring Chicken: Quantifying the Lifespan of Exploits in IoT Malware Using Static and Dynamic Analysis
papers.authors: Arwa Abdulkarim Al Alsadi, Kaichi Sameshima, Jakob Bleier, Katsunari Yoshioka, Martina Lindorfer, Michel van Eeten, Carlos Hernandez Gañán
papers.abstract: The Internet of things (IoT) is composed by a wide variety of software and hardware components that inherently contain vulnerabilities. Previous research has shown that it takes only a few minutes from the moment an IoT device is connected to the Internet to the first infection attempts. Still, we know little about the evolution of exploit vectors: Which vulnerabilities are being targeted in the wild, how has the functionality changed over time, and for how long are vulnerabilities being targeted? Understanding these questions can help in the secure development, and deployment of IoT networks. We present the first longitudinal study of IoT malware exploits by analyzing 17,720 samples collected from three different sources from 2015 to 2020. Leveraging static and dynamic analysis, we extract exploits from these binaries to then analyze them along the following four dimensions: (1) evolution of infection vectors over the years, (2) exploit lifespan, vulnerability age, and the time-to-exploit of vulnerabilities, (3) functionality of exploits, and (4) targeted IoT devices and manufacturers. Our descriptive analysis uncovers several patterns: IoT malware keeps evolving, shifting from simply leveraging brute force attacks to including dozens of device-specific exploits. Once exploits are developed, they are rarely abandoned. The most recent binaries still target (very) old vulnerabilities. In some cases, new exploits are developed for a vulnerability that has been known for years. We find that the mean time-to-exploit after vulnerability disclosure is around 29 months, much longer than for malware targeting other environments.
papers.abstract_zh: 物联网(IoT)由各种各样的软件和硬件组件组成，这些组件本身就包含漏洞。之前的研究表明，从物联网设备连接到互联网到首次感染尝试只需几分钟。尽管如此，我们对漏洞利用途径的演变知之甚少:哪些漏洞正在成为攻击的目标，功能如何随着时间的推移而变化，以及漏洞被攻击的时间有多长？了解这些问题有助于物联网网络的安全开发和部署。我们通过分析2015年至2020年从三个不同来源收集的17，720个样本，首次对物联网恶意软件利用进行了纵向研究。利用静态和动态分析，我们从这些二进制文件中提取漏洞，然后从以下四个方面对其进行分析:(1)多年来感染媒介的演变，(2)漏洞寿命、漏洞年龄和漏洞利用时间，(3)漏洞的功能性，以及(4)目标物联网设备和制造商。我们的描述性分析揭示了几种模式:物联网恶意软件不断演变，从简单地利用暴力攻击转变为包括数十种特定于设备的攻击。一旦开发了漏洞，它们很少会被放弃。最新的二进制文件仍然针对(非常)旧的漏洞。在某些情况下，针对一个已知多年的漏洞开发了新的利用方式。我们发现漏洞披露后的平均利用时间约为29个月，比针对其他环境的恶意软件要长得多。
papers.title_zh: 没有弹簧鸡：使用静态和动态分析来量化物联网恶意软件中的利用的寿命

papers.title: Confusing and Detecting ML Adversarial Attacks with Injected Attractors
papers.authors: Jiyi Zhang, Ee-Chien Chang, Hwee Kuan Lee
papers.abstract: Many machine learning adversarial attacks find adversarial samples of a victim model M by following the gradient of some attack objective functions, either explicitly or implicitly. To confuse and detect such attacks, we take the proactive approach that modifies those functions with the goal of misleading the attacks to some local minima, or to some designated regions that can be easily picked up by an analyzer. To achieve this goal, we propose adding a large number of artifacts, which we called attractors, onto the otherwise smooth function. An attractor is a point in the input space, where samples in its neighborhood have gradient pointing toward it. We observe that decoders of watermarking schemes exhibit properties of attractors and give a generic method that injects attractors from a watermark decoder into the victim model M. This principled approach allows us to leverage on known watermarking schemes for scalability and robustness and provides explainability of the outcomes. Experimental studies show that our method has competitive performance. For instance, for un-targeted attacks on CIFAR-10 dataset, we can reduce the overall attack success rate of DeepFool to 1.9%, whereas known defense LID, FS and MagNet can reduce the rate to 90.8%, 98.5% and 78.5% respectively.
papers.abstract_zh: 许多机器学习对抗性攻击通过遵循一些攻击目标函数的梯度(显式或隐式)来找到受害者模型M的对抗性样本。为了混淆和检测这种攻击，我们采取主动的方法来修改这些函数，目的是将攻击误导到一些局部最小值，或者一些可以被分析器容易地拾取的指定区域。为了达到这个目标，我们建议在原本平滑的函数上增加大量的人工产物，我们称之为吸引子。吸引子是输入空间中的一个点，其邻域中的样本具有指向它的梯度。我们观察到水印方案的解码器展示了吸引子的属性，并且给出了将来自水印解码器的吸引子注入到受害者模型m中的一般方法。该原理方法允许我们利用已知的水印方案来获得可伸缩性和鲁棒性，并且提供了结果的可解释性。实验研究表明，我们的方法具有竞争力的性能。例如，对于CIFAR-10数据集上的无针对性攻击，我们可以将DeepFool的整体攻击成功率降低到1.9%，而已知的防御LID、FS和MagNet可以将该比率分别降低到90.8%、98.5%和78.5%。
papers.title_zh: 与注入的吸引子混淆和检测ML对抗攻击

papers.title: Model Extraction Attacks on Graph Neural Networks: Taxonomy and Realisation
papers.authors: Bang Wu, Xiangwen Yang, Shirui Pan, Xingliang Yuan
papers.abstract: Machine learning models are shown to face a severe threat from Model Extraction Attacks, where a well-trained private model owned by a service provider can be stolen by an attacker pretending as a client. Unfortunately, prior works focus on the models trained over the Euclidean space, e.g., images and texts, while how to extract a GNN model that contains a graph structure and node features is yet to be explored. In this paper, for the first time, we comprehensively investigate and develop model extraction attacks against GNN models. We first systematically formalise the threat modelling in the context of GNN model extraction and classify the adversarial threats into seven categories by considering different background knowledge of the attacker, e.g., attributes and/or neighbour connections of the nodes obtained by the attacker. Then we present detailed methods which utilise the accessible knowledge in each threat to implement the attacks. By evaluating over three real-world datasets, our attacks are shown to extract duplicated models effectively, i.e., 84% - 89% of the inputs in the target domain have the same output predictions as the victim model.
papers.abstract_zh: 机器学习模型被证明面临来自模型提取攻击的严重威胁，其中服务提供商拥有的训练有素的私有模型可以被伪装成客户端的攻击者窃取。遗憾的是，现有的工作集中在欧几里德空间上训练的模型，例如图像和文本，而如何提取包含图结构和节点特征的GNN模型还有待探索。在本文中，我们首次全面地研究和发展了针对GNN模型的模型抽取攻击。我们首先在GNN模型提取的上下文中系统地形式化威胁建模，并且通过考虑攻击者的不同背景知识，例如攻击者获得的节点的属性和/或邻居连接，将对抗性威胁分类为七个类别。然后，我们提出了详细的方法，这些方法利用每个威胁中可获得的知识来实施攻击。通过评估超过三个真实世界的数据集，我们的攻击被证明可以有效地提取重复的模型，即目标域中84% - 89%的输入具有与受害者模型相同的输出预测。
papers.title_zh: 模型提取攻击对图神经网络的攻击：分类和实现

papers.title: Markov Chain Monte Carlo-Based Machine Unlearning: Unlearning What Needs to be Forgotten
papers.authors: Quoc Phong Nguyen, Ryutaro Oikawa, Dinil Mon Divakaran, Mun Choon Chan, Bryan Kian Hsiang Low
papers.abstract: As the use of machine learning (ML) models is becoming increasingly popular in many real-world applications, there are practical challenges that need to be addressed for model maintenance. One such challenge is to "undo" the effect of a specific subset of dataset used for training a model. This specific subset may contain malicious or adversarial data injected by an attacker, which affects the model performance. Another reason may be the need for a service provider to remove data pertaining to a specific user to respect the user's privacy. In both cases, the problem is to "unlearn" a specific subset of the training data from a trained model without incurring the costly procedure of retraining the whole model from scratch. Towards this goal, this paper presents a Markov chain Monte Carlo-based machine unlearning (MCU) algorithm. MCU helps to effectively and efficiently unlearn a trained model from subsets of training dataset. Furthermore, we show that with MCU, we are able to explain the effect of a subset of a training dataset on the model prediction. Thus, MCU is useful for examining subsets of data to identify the adversarial data to be removed. Similarly, MCU can be used to erase the lineage of a user's personal data from trained ML models, thus upholding a user's "right to be forgotten". We empirically evaluate the performance of our proposed MCU algorithm on real-world phishing and diabetes datasets. Results show that MCU can achieve a desirable performance by efficiently removing the effect of a subset of training dataset and outperform an existing algorithm that utilizes the remaining dataset.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着机器学习(ML)模型的使用在许多现实世界应用中变得越来越流行，对于模型维护来说，存在需要解决的实际挑战。一个这样的挑战是“撤销”用于训练模型的数据集的特定子集的效果。该特定子集可能包含攻击者注入的恶意或敌对数据，这会影响模型性能。另一个原因可能是服务提供商需要移除属于特定用户的数据以尊重用户的隐私。在这两种情况下，问题是从已训练的模型中“忘记”训练数据的特定子集，而不会导致从头开始重新训练整个模型的昂贵过程。为此，提出一种基于马尔可夫链蒙特卡罗的机器无学习(MCU)算法。MCU有助于有效且高效地从训练数据集的子集中去除已训练的模型。此外，我们表明，使用MCU，我们能够解释训练数据集的子集对模型预测的影响。因此，MCU对于检查数据子集以识别要移除的敌对数据是有用的。类似地，MCU可以用于从经过训练的ML模型中删除用户个人数据的血统，从而维护用户的“被遗忘权”。我们根据经验评估了我们提出的MCU算法在真实世界的网络钓鱼和糖尿病数据集上的性能。结果表明，MCU可以通过有效地去除训练数据集子集的影响来获得理想的性能，并且优于利用剩余数据集的现有算法。
papers.title_zh: 马尔可夫链蒙特卡洛的机器学习：学习需要忘记什么

papers.title: Membership Feature Disentanglement Network
papers.authors: Heonseok Ha, Jaehee Jang, Yonghyun Jeong, Sungroh Yoon
papers.abstract: Membership inference (MI) determines whether a given data point is involved in the training of target machine learning model. Thus, the notion of MI relies on both the data feature and the model. The existing MI methods focus on the model only. We introduce a membership feature disentanglement network (MFDN) to approach MI from the perspective of data features. We assume that the data features can be disentangled into the membership features and class features. The membership features are those that enable MI, and class features refer to those that the network is trying to learn. MFDN disentangles these features by adversarial games between the encoders and auxiliary critic networks. It also visualizes the membership features using an inductive bias from the perspective of MI. We perform empirical evaluations to demonstrate that MFDN can disentangle membership features and class features.
papers.abstract_zh: 隶属度推理(MI)确定给定的数据点是否参与目标机器学习模型的训练。因此，MI的概念依赖于数据特征和模型。现有的MI方法只关注模型。我们引入了一个成员特征解纠缠网络(MFDN ),从数据特征的角度来处理互信息。我们假设数据特征可以分解为成员特征和类特征。成员特征是那些启用MI的特征，而类特征是指那些网络试图学习的特征。MFDN通过编码器和辅助评论家网络之间的对抗游戏解开了这些特征。它还从MI的角度使用归纳偏差来可视化成员特征。我们进行实证评估，以证明MFDN可以解开成员特征和阶级特征。
papers.title_zh: 会员功能分解网络

papers.title: Privacy-Preserving Deep Sequential Model with Matrix Homomorphic Encryption
papers.authors: Jaehee Jang, Younho Lee, Andrey Kim, Byunggook Na, Donggeon Yhee, Byounghan Lee, Jung Hee Cheon, Sungroh Yoon
papers.abstract: Making deep neural networks available as a service introduces privacy problems, for which homomorphic encryption of both model and user data potentially offers the solution at the highest privacy level. However, the difficulty of operating on homomorphically encrypted data has hitherto limited the range of operations available and the depth of networks. We introduce an extended CKKS scheme MatHEAAN to provide efficient matrix representations and operations together with improved noise control. Using the MatHEAAN we developed a deep sequential model with a gated recurrent unit called MatHEGRU. We evaluated the proposed model using sequence modeling, regression, and classification of images and genome sequences. We show that the hidden states of the encrypted model, as well as the results, are consistent with a plaintext model.
papers.abstract_zh: 将深度神经网络作为服务提供会带来隐私问题，模型和用户数据的同态加密可能会提供最高隐私级别的解决方案。然而，对同态加密数据进行操作的困难迄今为止限制了可用操作的范围和网络的深度。我们引入了扩展的CKKS方案来提供有效的矩阵表示和运算以及改进的噪声控制。使用MatHEAAN，我们开发了一个深度序列模型，它有一个称为MatHEGRU的门控循环单元。我们使用序列建模、回归以及图像和基因组序列的分类来评估所提出的模型。我们表明，加密模型的隐藏状态，以及结果，与明文模型一致。
papers.title_zh: 具有矩阵同态加密的隐私保护深度顺序模型

papers.title: Cellular Security: Why is it difficult?
papers.authors: Yongdae Kim
papers.abstract: In the last 10 years, I have been working on various cellular security problems publishing more than 10 papers. The topics include privacy [1, 5, 11], accounting [2, 3, 4], service security [3], Middleboxes and IPV6 [4], automatic performance analysis [4], (semi-)automatic security analysis [7, 9, 10], and physical layers [8]. Throughout these studies, and interactions with device vendors, carriers and 3GPP/GSMA representatives, I found several fundamental problems cellular industry is facing. I believe these problems could be the root cause for many of the vulnerabilities found by researchers. I will first explain 5 key insights that distinguish the cellular network security from traditional network security, including generation changes (4G vs. 5G), governance and closedness issues. I then talk about several technical difficulties cellular security research is facing. Several real examples will be given to connect concrete vulnerabilities and those technical difficulties. At the end of the talk, I will briefly talk about some suggestions to improve security of cellular networks.
papers.abstract_zh: 在过去的10年里，我一直在研究各种蜂窝安全问题，发表了10多篇论文。主题包括隐私[1，5，11]，会计[2，3，4]，服务安全[3]，中间盒和IPV6 [4]，自动性能分析[4]，(半)自动安全分析[7，9，10]和物理层[8]。通过这些研究，以及与设备供应商、运营商和3GPP/GSMA代表的互动，我发现了蜂窝行业面临的几个基本问题。我相信这些问题可能是研究人员发现的许多漏洞的根本原因。我将首先解释区分蜂窝网络安全与传统网络安全的5个关键见解，包括世代变化(4G与5G)、治理和封闭性问题。然后，我将讨论蜂窝安全研究面临的几个技术难题。将给出几个真实的例子来连接具体的漏洞和那些技术困难。在演讲的最后，我将简要谈谈一些提高蜂窝网络安全性的建议。
papers.title_zh: 蜂窝安全：为什么困难？

papers.title: Aggregating and Thresholdizing Hash-based Signatures using STARKs
papers.authors: Irakliy Khaburzaniya, Konstantinos Chalkias, Kevin Lewi, Harjasleen Malvai
papers.abstract: This work presents an approach for compressing hash-based signatures using STARKs (Ben-Sasson et. al.'18). We focus on constructing a hash-based t-of-n threshold signature scheme, as well as an aggregate signature scheme. In both constructions, an aggregator collects individual one-time hash-based signatures and outputs a STARK proof attesting that the signatures are valid and meet the required thresholds. This proof then serves the role of the aggregate or threshold signature. We demonstrate the concrete performance of such constructions, having implemented the algebraic intermediate representations (AIR) for them, along with an experimental evaluation over our implementation of the STARK protocol. We find that, even when we aggregate thousands of signatures, the final aggregated size ranges between 100KB and 200KB. This makes our schemes attractive when there exist at least $50$ one-or-few-times hash-based signatures -- such as in the blockchain setting. We also observe that for STARK-based signature aggregation, the size of individual signatures is less important than the number of hash invocations and the complexity of the signature verification algorithm. This implies that simple hash-based signature variants (e.g. Lamport, HORST, BPQS) are well-suited for aggregation, as their large individual signatures serve only as witnesses to the ZKP circuit and are not needed for aggregate signature verification. Our constructions are directly applicable as scalable solutions for post-quantum secure blockchains which typically employ blocks of hundreds or thousands of signed transactions. Moreover, stateful hash-based one-or-few-times signatures are already used in some PQ-ready blockchains, as address reuse is typically discouraged for privacy reasons.
papers.abstract_zh: 这项工作提出了一种使用STARKs (Ben-Sasson et。艾尔。'18).我们致力于构造一个基于哈希的t-of-n门限签名方案，以及一个聚合签名方案。在这两种构造中，聚合器收集单个一次性的基于散列的签名，并输出证明签名有效并满足所需阈值的严格证明。然后，该证明充当集合签名或阈值签名的角色。我们演示了这种结构的具体性能，实现了它们的代数中间表示(AIR ),并对STARK协议的实现进行了实验评估。我们发现，即使我们聚合了数千个签名，最终的聚合大小也在100KB到200KB之间。这使得我们的方案在存在至少50美元的一次或几次基于散列的签名时很有吸引力，例如在区块链环境中。我们还观察到，对于基于STARK的签名聚合，单个签名的大小没有哈希调用的次数和签名验证算法的复杂性重要。这意味着简单的基于散列的签名变体(例如Lamport、HORST、BPQS)非常适合于聚合，因为它们的大型个人签名仅充当ZKP电路的见证，而不需要用于聚合签名验证。我们的构造可直接应用于后量子安全区块链的可扩展解决方案，该方案通常采用数百或数千个签名交易块。此外，基于有状态哈希的一次或几次签名已经在一些PQ就绪的区块链中使用，因为出于隐私原因，通常不鼓励地址重用。
papers.title_zh: 使用Starks汇总和阈值基于哈希的签名

papers.title: Hierarchical Identity-based Puncturable Encryption from Lattices with Application to Forward Security
papers.authors: Priyanka Dutta, Mei Jiang, Dung Hoang Duong, Willy Susilo, Kazuhide Fukushima, Shinsaku Kiyomoto
papers.abstract: Puncturable encryption (PE), introduced by Green and Miers at IEEE S$&$P 2015, allows recipients to update their decryption keys to revoke decryption capability for selected messages without communicating with senders. In general, it allows users to control which ciphertexts their keys may decrypt. The notion of PE has been found very useful in many applications, such as asynchronous messaging systems, group messaging systems, public-key watermarking schemes, secure cloud emails, and many more. In this paper, we introduce a new primitive called hierarchical identity-based puncturable encryption (HIBPE) that enhances the concept of PE by allowing more general key delegation and flexible key puncture. It enhances the capability of the data owner for multi-level encrypted data sharing within a group of users by delegating the decryption keys of the users in higher-levels to generate decryption keys for the users in lower-levels. Moreover, it allows users to puncture (update) their decryption keys on tags so that a decryption key punctured on a tag can no longer decrypt ciphertexts under this tag. In addition, to control access to the users' data, the higher-level users can further puncture the delegated keys (for lower-level users) with some tags such that the part of the owner's data is labeled by the punctured tags will no longer be accessible by the lower-level users. These features offer an efficient and flexible solution for encrypted data sharing as well as data-access control mechanisms in a hierarchical setting. We propose the formal definition and security model for HIBPE schemes and provide a concrete HIBPE scheme based on the hardness of the learning with errors problem in the standard model. Further, we provide a generic construction of forward secure hierarchical identity-based encryption (fs-HIBE) from HIBPE, which enables the first quantum-safe construction of fs-HIBE in the standard model. Moreover, this is the first fs-HIBE construction by exploring the concept of PE. The proposed fs-HIBE provides quantum-safe protection for secret keys from exposure in multi-level encrypted data sharing by evolving the keys with time.
papers.abstract_zh: Green和Miers在IEEE S$&$P 2015上推出的可穿孔加密(PE)允许收件人更新他们的解密密钥，以撤销选定消息的解密能力，而无需与发件人通信。一般来说，它允许用户控制他们的密钥可以解密哪些密文。已经发现PE的概念在许多应用中非常有用，例如异步消息传递系统、群组消息传递系统、公钥水印方案、安全云电子邮件等等。在本文中，我们介绍了一种称为分层的基于身份的可穿孔加密(HIBPE)的新原语，它通过允许更通用的密钥委托和灵活的密钥穿孔来增强PE的概念。它通过委托较高层用户的解密密钥为较低层用户生成解密密钥，增强了数据所有者在一组用户内共享多级加密数据的能力。此外，它允许用户在标签上穿孔(更新)他们的解密密钥，使得在标签上穿孔的解密密钥不再能够解密该标签下的密文。此外，为了控制对用户数据的访问，较高级别的用户可以进一步用一些标签穿孔委托密钥(对于较低级别的用户),使得由穿孔标签标记的所有者数据部分将不再被较低级别的用户访问。这些功能为加密数据共享以及分层设置中的数据访问控制机制提供了一种高效而灵活的解决方案。我们提出了HIBPE方案的形式化定义和安全模型，并基于标准模型中错误学习问题的困难性给出了一个具体的HIBPE方案。此外，我们还提供了一个来自HIBPE的前向安全分层基于身份加密(fs-HIBE)的一般构造，它在标准模型中实现了fs-HIBE的第一个量子安全构造。此外，这是首次通过探索PE的概念来构建fs-HIBE。提出的fs-HIBE通过随时间演化密钥，为多级加密数据共享中的密钥提供量子安全保护。
papers.title_zh: 基于分层身份的基于层次标识的可点缀加密，来自具有应用程序的晶格

papers.title: Public-key Authenticated Encryption with Keyword Search: Cryptanalysis, Enhanced Security, and Quantum-resistant Instantiation
papers.authors: Zi-Yuan Liu, Yi-Fan Tseng, Raylin Tso, Masahiro Mambo, Yu-Chi Chen
papers.abstract: With the rapid development of cloud computing, an increasing number of companies are adopting cloud storage technology to reduce overhead. However, to ensure the privacy of sensitive data, the uploaded data need to be encrypted before being outsourced to the cloud. The concept of public-key encryption with keyword search (PEKS) was introduced by Boneh et al. to provide flexible usage of the encrypted data. Unfortunately, most of the PEKS schemes are not secure against inside keyword guessing attacks (IKGA), so the keyword information of the trapdoor may be leaked to the adversary. To solve this issue, Huang and Li presented public key authenticated encryption with keyword search (PAEKS) in which the trapdoor generated by the receiver is only valid for authenticated ciphertexts. With their seminal work, many PAEKS schemes have been introduced for the enhanced security of PAEKS. Some of them further consider the upcoming quantum attacks. However, our cryptanalysis indicated that in fact, these schemes could not withstand IKGA. To fight against the attacks from quantum adversaries and support the privacy-preserving search functionality, we first introduce a novel generic PAEKS construction in this work. Then, we further present the first quantum-resistant PAEKS instantiation based on lattices. The security proofs show that our instantiation not only satisfies the basic requirements but also achieves enhanced security models, namely the multi-ciphertext indistinguishability and multi-trapdoor privacy. Furthermore, the comparative results indicate that with only some additional expenditure, the proposed instantiation provides more secure properties, making it suitable for more diverse application environments.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着云计算的快速发展，越来越多的公司采用云存储技术来减少开销。但是，为了保证敏感数据的隐私性，上传的数据在外包到云端之前需要加密。Boneh等人引入了带有关键字搜索的公钥加密(PEKS)的概念，以提供加密数据的灵活使用。不幸的是，大多数PEKS方案不能抵抗内部关键字猜测攻击(IKGA)，因此陷门的关键字信息可能会泄露给对手。为了解决这个问题，黄和李提出了带关键字搜索的公钥认证加密算法(PAEKS)。由于他们的开创性工作，许多PAEKS方案被引入以增强PAEKS的安全性。他们中的一些人进一步考虑即将到来的量子攻击。然而，我们的密码分析表明，事实上，这些方案不能抵御IKGA。为了对抗来自量子对手的攻击并支持隐私保护搜索功能，我们首先介绍了一种新的通用PAEKS结构。然后，我们进一步提出了第一个基于格的抗量子PAEKS实例。安全性证明表明，我们的实例化不仅满足基本要求，而且实现了增强的安全模型，即多重密文不可区分性和多重陷门隐私。此外，比较结果表明，仅通过一些额外的开销，所提出的实例化提供了更安全的属性，使其适用于更多样化的应用环境。
papers.title_zh: 使用关键字搜索的公钥认证加密：加密分析，增强的安全性和抗量子的实例化

papers.title: InfoCensor: An Information-Theoretic Framework against Sensitive Attribute Inference and Demographic Disparity
papers.authors: Tianhang Zheng, Baochun Li
papers.abstract: Deep learning sits at the forefront of many on-going advances in a variety of learning tasks. Despite its supremacy in accuracy under benign environments, Deep learning suffers from adversarial vulnerability and privacy leakage (e.g., sensitive attribute inference) in adversarial environments. Also, many deep learning systems exhibit discriminatory behaviors against certain groups of subjects (e.g., demographic disparity). In this paper, we propose a unified information-theoretic framework to defend against sensitive attribute inference and mitigate demographic disparity in deep learning for the model partitioning scenario, by minimizing two mutual information terms. We prove that as one mutual information term decreases, an upper bound on the chance for any adversary to infer the sensitive attribute from model representations will decrease. Also, the extent of demographic disparity is bounded by the other mutual information term. Since direct optimization on the mutual information is intractable, we also propose a tractable Gaussian mixture based method and a gumbel-softmax trick based method for estimating the two mutual information terms. Extensive evaluations in a variety of application domains, including computer vision and natural language processing, demonstrate our framework's overall better performance than the existing baselines.
papers.abstract_zh: 深度学习位于各种学习任务中许多正在进行的进步的最前沿。尽管深度学习在良性环境下具有至高无上的准确性，但在敌对环境下，深度学习会遭受敌对脆弱性和隐私泄露(例如，敏感属性推断)。此外，许多深度学习系统表现出对某些主体群体的歧视行为(例如，人口统计差异)。在本文中，我们提出了一个统一的信息论框架，通过最小化两个互信息项来防御敏感属性推理，并缓解深度学习中模型划分场景的人口差异。我们证明，随着一个互信息项的减少，任何对手从模型表示中推断敏感属性的机会的上限将会减少。此外，人口统计差异的程度受到另一个相互信息项的限制。由于直接优化互信息是困难的，我们还提出了一种基于高斯混合的方法和一种基于gumbel-softmax技巧的方法来估计两个互信息项。在包括计算机视觉和自然语言处理在内的各种应用领域的广泛评估表明，我们的框架比现有的基线具有更好的整体性能。
papers.title_zh: Infocentor：针对敏感属性推理和人口统计学差异的信息理论框架

papers.title: EVOLIoT: A Self-Supervised Contrastive Learning Framework for Detecting and Characterizing Evolving IoT Malware Variants
papers.authors: Mirabelle Dib, Sadegh Torabi, Elias Bou-Harb, Nizar Bouguila, Chadi Assi
papers.abstract: Recent years have witnessed the emergence of new and more sophisticated malware targeting the Internet of Things. Moreover, the public release of the source code of popular malware families such as Mirai has spawned diverse variants, making it harder to disambiguate their ownership, lineage, and correct label. Such a rapidly evolving landscape makes it also harder to deploy and generalize effective learning models against retired, updated, and/or new threat campaigns. In this paper, we present EVOLIoT, a novel approach aiming at combating "concept drift" and the limitations of inter-family IoT malware classification by detecting drifting IoT malware families and understanding their diverse evolutionary trajectories. We introduce a robust and effective contrastive method that learns and compares semantically meaningful representations of IoT malware binaries and codes without the need for expensive target labels. We find that the evolution of IoT binaries can be used as an augmentation strategy to learn effective representations to contrast (dis)similar variant pairs. We discuss the impact and findings of our analysis and present several evaluation studies to highlight the tangled relationships of IoT malware, as well as the efficiency of our contrastively learned feature vectors in preserving semantics and reducing out-of-vocabulary size in cross-architecture IoT malware binaries.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，针对物联网的新型、更复杂的恶意软件层出不穷。此外，Mirai未来组合等流行恶意软件家族源代码的公开发布催生了各种各样的变种，这使得区分它们的所有权、血统和正确标签变得更加困难。这种快速发展的格局也使得针对过时、更新和/或新的威胁活动部署和推广有效的学习模型变得更加困难。在本文中，我们提出了EVOLIoT，这是一种新的方法，旨在通过检测漂移的物联网恶意软件家族并了解它们不同的进化轨迹来克服“概念漂移”和家族间物联网恶意软件分类的局限性。我们介绍了一种鲁棒而有效的对比方法，该方法可以学习和比较物联网恶意软件二进制文件和代码的语义表示，而无需昂贵的目标标签。我们发现物联网二进制文件的演变可以用作增强策略，以学习有效的表示来对比(消除)相似的变体对。我们讨论了我们分析的影响和发现，并介绍了几项评估研究，以突出物联网恶意软件的复杂关系，以及我们对比学习的特征向量在跨架构物联网恶意软件二进制文件中保留语义和减少词汇外大小的效率。
papers.title_zh: Evoliot：一个自我监督的对比学习框架，用于检测和表征不断发展的物联网恶意软件变体

papers.title: Machine Learning-based Online Social Network Privacy Preservation
papers.authors: Tianchong Gao, Feng Li
papers.abstract: Online data privacy draws more and more concerns. Online Social Network (OSN) service providers employ anonymization mechanisms to preserve private information and data utility. However, these mechanisms mostly focus on the traditional definitions about privacy and utility. Recently, both benign data scientists and attackers utilize machine learning methods to extract information from OSNs. This paper aims to present a novel angle of balancing privacy and utility under machine learning. The proposed scheme perturbs the data that breaks the attackers' learning results and protect the benign third parties' learning results. To preserve both privacy and utility, we propose two different anonymization approaches to solve the multi-objective optimization problem. The first approach combines the two objectives. It utilizes the deep learning model, Generative Adversarial Network (GAN), to sequentially learns the two objectives and generates graphs. The second approach analyzes the differences between the two objects on structures. It utilizes Integrated Gradient (IG) in learning to break attackers' learning results. It structurally rewires edges to preserve third parties' learning results afterwards. The experiment results show that both approaches work well in privacy preservation.
papers.abstract_zh: 在线数据隐私引起越来越多的关注。在线社交网络(OSN)服务提供商采用匿名化机制来保护私人信息和数据效用。然而，这些机制主要集中在传统的隐私和效用定义上。最近，良性数据科学家和攻击者都利用机器学习方法从osn中提取信息。本文旨在提出一个在机器学习下平衡隐私和效用的新角度。该方案扰动破坏攻击者学习结果的数据，保护良性第三方的学习结果。为了保护隐私和效用，我们提出了两种不同的匿名方法来解决多目标优化问题。第一种方法结合了这两个目标。它利用深度学习模型——生成对抗网络(GAN)，依次学习两个目标并生成图形。第二种方法分析两个对象在结构上的差异。它在学习中利用综合梯度来破坏攻击者的学习结果。它在结构上重新连接边缘，以保存第三方后来的学习结果。实验结果表明，这两种方法都能很好地保护隐私。
papers.title_zh: 基于机器学习的在线社交网络隐私保护

papers.title: Towards a Utopia of Dataset Sharing: A Case Study on Machine Learning-based Malware Detection Algorithms
papers.authors: Ping-Jui Chuang, Chih-Fan Hsu, Yung-Tien Chu, Szu-Chun Huang, Chun-Ying Huang
papers.abstract: Working with a high-quality (complete and up-to-date) dataset is the key to building a good machine learning model, especially in security research areas. However, it is not easy to collect a good quality dataset for security research communities because of the sensitive property of most security datasets. We believe that having more contributors to share up-to-date samples would increase the quality of datasets. Therefore, this study aims to increase security dataset sharing for research communities by eliminating possible information leakage. We propose a dataset sharing model and the core algorithm, FeatureTransformer, which guarantees no sensitive information leakage from a shared dataset. FeatureTransformer transforms extracted raw features into intermediate features that conceal sensitive information. Meanwhile, models built from transformed features maintain similar performance compared to models built from the original raw features. We show the effectiveness of our model by evaluating FeatureTransformer with typical malware classification problems using (1) traditional machine learning classifiers and (2) neural network-based classifiers. The experiment results show that the models trained with transformed features merely suffer from 2.56% and 1.48% accuracy degradation on the investigated problems. It indicates that models validated by datasets processed by FeatureTransformer work well with the original raw (untransformed) datasets. We believe that our privacy-preserving model can stimulate dataset sharing and advance the development of machine learning approaches in solving security problems.
papers.abstract_zh: 使用高质量(完整和最新)的数据集是建立良好的机器学习模型的关键，尤其是在安全研究领域。然而，由于大多数安全数据集的敏感属性，为安全研究社区收集高质量的数据集并不容易。我们相信，让更多的贡献者分享最新的样本将提高数据集的质量。因此，这项研究旨在通过消除可能的信息泄漏来增加研究社区的安全数据集共享。我们提出了一个数据集共享模型和核心算法FeatureTransformer，它保证了共享数据集中的敏感信息不会泄漏。FeatureTransformer将提取的原始特征转换为隐藏敏感信息的中间特征。同时，与从原始原始特征构建的模型相比，从变换的特征构建的模型保持相似的性能。我们通过使用(1)传统的机器学习分类器和(2)基于神经网络的分类器评估具有典型恶意软件分类问题的FeatureTransformer来展示我们的模型的有效性。实验结果表明，用变换后的特征训练的模型在所研究的问题上仅遭受2.56%和1.48%的精度下降。这表明由FeatureTransformer处理的数据集验证的模型与原始原始(未转换的)数据集一起工作良好。我们相信，我们的隐私保护模型可以刺激数据集共享，并推动解决安全问题的机器学习方法的发展。
papers.title_zh: 迈向数据集共享的乌托邦：基于机器学习的恶意软件检测算法的案例研究

papers.title: Gatekeeper: A Gateway-based Broadcast Authentication Protocol for the In-Vehicle Ethernet
papers.authors: Shengtuo Hu, Qingzhao Zhang, André Weimerskirch, Z. Morley Mao
papers.abstract: Automotive Ethernet is considered to be the next-generation in-vehicle network, because of its high bandwidth, high throughput, and low cost characteristics. However, no common standard has been established for the security protocol of Automotive Ethernet. While there are a few candidates, including MACsec, IPsec, and TLS, there is no widely favored candidate. Most importantly, existing candidates cannot fully satisfy the requirements of in-vehicle communication, specifically source authentication for broadcast/multicast communication. In this paper, we conduct a comprehensive analysis in both security and performance of existing security protocol candidates and identify source authentication and Denial-of-Service (DoS) prevention as two essential but missing properties in these candidates. We propose Gatekeeper, a gateway-based broadcast authentication protocol to ensure source authentication. In general, Gatekeeper introduces an on-path authenticator, which co-locates with the in-vehicle gateway or domain controllers and helps receivers to verify the sender's identity. To defend against DoS threats, we further integrate the time-lock puzzle with Gatekeeper to slow down malicious traffic. Our performance evaluation results show that Gatekeeper only results in 0.03 ms latency overhead for CAN data transmission and outperforms TESLA on both CAN and LiDAR transmission scenarios, highlighting the effectiveness and efficiency of Gatekeeper.
papers.abstract_zh: 汽车以太网被认为是下一代车载网络，因为它具有高带宽、高吞吐量和低成本的特点。然而，汽车以太网的安全协议还没有一个通用的标准。虽然有几个候选方案，包括MACsec、IPsec和TLS，但没有一个被广泛看好的候选方案。最重要的是，现有的候选方案不能完全满足车载通信的要求，特别是广播/多播通信的源认证。在本文中，我们对现有候选安全协议的安全性和性能进行了全面的分析，并确定源认证和拒绝服务(DoS)预防是这些候选协议中两个基本但缺失的属性。我们提出了网守，一个基于网关的广播认证协议，以确保源认证。一般来说，Gatekeeper引入了一个路径上验证器，它与车载网关或域控制器位于同一位置，并帮助接收者验证发送者的身份。为了防御DoS威胁，我们进一步将时间锁定难题与网守相结合，以减缓恶意流量。我们的性能评估结果显示，网守仅导致0.03 ms的CAN数据传输延迟开销，并且在CAN和激光雷达传输场景下均优于TESLA，凸显了网守的有效性和效率。
papers.title_zh: 网关：基于网关的广播身份验证协议，用于车载以太网

papers.title: WearRF-CLA: Continuous Location Authentication with Wrist Wearables and UHF RFID
papers.authors: Ang Li, Jiawei Li, Dianqi Han, Yan Zhang, Tao Li, Yanchao Zhang
papers.abstract: Continuous location authentication (CLA) seeks to continuously and automatically verify the physical presence of legitimate users in a protected indoor area. CLA can play an important role in contexts where access to electrical or physical resources must be limited to physically present legitimate users. In this paper, we present WearRF-CLA, a novel CLA scheme built upon increasingly popular wrist wearables and UHF RFID systems. WearRF-CLA explores the observation that human daily routines in a protected indoor area comprise a sequence of human-states (e.g., walking and sitting) that follow predictable state transitions. Each legitimate WearRF-CLA user registers his/her RFID tag and also wrist wearable during system enrollment. After the user enters a protected area, WearRF-CLA continuously collects and processes the gyroscope data of the wrist wearable and the phase data of the RFID tag signals to verify three factors to determine the user's physical presence/absence without explicit user involvement: (1) the tag ID as in a traditional RFID authentication system, (2) the validity of the human-state chain, and (3) the continuous coexistence of the paired wrist wearable and RFID tag with the user. The user passes CLA if and only if all three factors can be validated. Extensive user experiments on commodity smartwatches and UHF RFID devices confirm the very high security and low authentication latency of WearRF-CLA.
