papers.abstract_zh: 连续位置认证(CLA)寻求连续和自动地验证合法用户在受保护的室内区域中的物理存在。在必须将对电或物理资源的访问限制于物理上在场的合法用户的情况下，CLA可以发挥重要作用。在本文中，我们介绍了WearRF-CLA，这是一种基于日益流行的手腕可穿戴设备和超高频RFID系统的新型CLA方案。wearf-CLA研究了这样的观察结果，即在受保护的室内区域中，人类的日常活动包括一系列人类状态(例如，行走和坐着),这些状态遵循可预测的状态转换。在系统注册期间，每个合法的WearRF-CLA用户注册他/她的RFID标签和可佩戴的手腕。在用户进入受保护区域后，WearRF-CLA连续收集并处理腕戴式可穿戴设备的陀螺仪数据和RFID标签信号的相位数据，以验证三个因素来确定用户的物理存在/不存在，而无需明确的用户参与:(1)如在传统RFID认证系统中的标签ID，(2)人-状态链的有效性，以及(3)成对的腕戴式可穿戴设备和RFID标签与用户的持续共存。当且仅当所有三个因素都有效时，用户通过CLA。在商品智能手表和超高频RFID设备上进行的大量用户实验证实了WearRF-CLA非常高的安全性和低认证延迟。
papers.title_zh: WEARRF-CLA：连续的位置身份验证，具有腕部可穿戴设备和UHF RFID

papers.title: PeriScope: Comprehensive Vulnerability Analysis of Mobile App-defined Bluetooth Peripherals
papers.authors: Qingchuan Zhao, Chaoshun Zuo, Jorge Blasco, Zhiqiang Lin
papers.abstract: Many IoT devices today talk to each other via Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE), a wireless communication technology often used to exchange data between a paired central and peripheral. These peripheral devices include not only firmware-defined bare-metal peripherals but also mobile application defined peripherals where a mobile app turns a smartphone into a peripheral instead of their usual central role. However, this role reversal increases the attack surface and brings vulnerabilities in bare-metal Bluetooth peripherals to mobile apps where relevant security and privacy have not been well studied. To fill this knowledge gap, this paper presents PeriScope, an automated tool to unveil the security and privacy vulnerabilities at the link layer of app-defined Bluetooth peripherals in the procedures of broadcasting, pairing, and communication by systematically analyzing their companion mobile apps. PeriScope has analyzed 1,160 Bluetooth peripheral apps from Google Play and identified 69.13% of them that broadcast device or personal identifiable information in cleartext, and, in addition, there are 95% pieces of data managed by these apps (e.g., personal health data and digital keys to unlock doors) to exchange with connected devices can be accessed without authentication. Finally, a set of guidelines for secure app-defined Bluetooth peripherals development is also provided.
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，许多物联网设备通过低能耗蓝牙(Bluetooth Low Energy，BLE)相互通信，这是一种无线通信技术，通常用于在配对的中央设备和外围设备之间交换数据。这些外围设备不仅包括固件定义的裸机外围设备，还包括移动应用定义的外围设备，其中移动应用将智能手机变成外围设备，而不是它们通常的核心角色。然而，这种角色转换增加了攻击面，并将裸机蓝牙外设中的漏洞带到了相关安全性和隐私尚未得到很好研究的移动应用程序中。为了填补这一知识空白，本文介绍了PeriScope，这是一种自动化工具，通过系统分析其配套的移动应用程序，揭示应用程序定义的蓝牙外设在广播、配对和通信过程中的链路层的安全和隐私漏洞。PeriScope分析了来自Google Play的1，160个蓝牙外设应用程序，并确定其中69.13%的应用程序以明文形式广播设备或个人身份信息，此外，这些应用程序管理的95%的数据(例如，个人健康数据和开门的数字钥匙)可以在未经身份验证的情况下与连接的设备交换。最后，还提供了一套安全的应用程序定义的蓝牙外设开发指南。
papers.title_zh: 潜望镜：移动应用定义的蓝牙外围设备的全面脆弱性分析

papers.title: ShadowAuth: Backward-Compatible Automatic CAN Authentication for Legacy ECUs
papers.authors: Sungwoo Kim, Gisu Yeo, Taegyu Kim, Junghwan John Rhee, Yuseok Jeon, Antonio Bianchi, Dongyan Xu, Dave (Jing) Tian
papers.abstract: Controller Area Network (CAN) is the de-facto standard in-vehicle network system. Despite its wide adoption by automobile manufacturers, the lack of security design makes it vulnerable to attacks. For instance, broadcasting packets without authentication allows the impersonation of electronic control units (ECUs). Prior mitigations, such as message authentication or intrusion detection systems, fail to address the compatibility requirement with legacy ECUs, stealthy and sporadic malicious messaging, or guaranteed attack detection. We propose a novel authentication system called ShadowAuth that overcomes the aforementioned challenges by offering backwardcompatible packet authentication to ECUs without requiring ECU firmware source code. Specifically, our authentication scheme provides transparent CAN packet authentication without modifying existing CAN packet definitions (e.g., J1939) via automatic ECU firmware instrumentation technique to locate CAN packet transmission code, and instrument authentication code based on the CAN packet behavioral transmission patterns. ShadowAuth enables vehicles to detect state-of-the-art CAN attacks, such as busoff and packet injection, responsively within 60ms without false positives. ShadowAuth provides a sound and deployable solution for real-world ECUs.
papers.abstract_zh: 控制器局域网(CAN)是事实上的标准车载网络系统。尽管它被汽车制造商广泛采用，但缺乏安全设计使其容易受到攻击。例如，广播未经认证的数据包会导致电子控制单元(ECU)的假冒。先前的缓解措施，例如消息认证或入侵检测系统，未能解决与传统ECU、秘密的和零星的恶意消息或有保证的攻击检测的兼容性要求。我们提出了一种称为ShadowAuth的新型认证系统，通过向ECU提供向后兼容的分组认证而不需要ECU固件源代码，克服了上述挑战。具体地，我们的认证方案提供了透明的CAN分组认证，而不需要修改现有的CAN分组定义(例如，J1939 ),通过自动ECU固件检测技术来定位CAN分组传输代码，并且基于CAN分组行为传输模式检测认证代码。ShadowAuth使车辆能够在60毫秒内检测到最先进的CAN攻击，如总线关闭和数据包注入，而不会出现误报。ShadowAuth为现实世界的ECU提供了一个可靠的、可部署的解决方案。
papers.title_zh: Shadowauth：向后兼容的自动可以为传统ECUS身份验证

papers.title: SoK: A Survey Of Indirect Network-level Covert Channels
papers.authors: Tobias Schmidbauer, Steffen Wendzel
papers.abstract: Within the last few years, indirect network-level covert channels have experienced a renaissance with new ideas and evolving concepts. Logical network separation may now be crossed and the sending and receiving activities can be performed with temporal distance between sending and receiving operations. Despite these new developments, all indirect network covert channels share certain basic principles that allow a categorization. So far, the concepts of indirect network-level covert channels have never been systematized. In this paper, we introduce a taxonomy containing indirect covert channel patterns that allow a differentiated analysis of all known indirect network-level covert channels. We introduce additional definitions to unify the understanding of the domain and further identify crucial features of indirect covert channels to make them comparable and describable. We further discuss application scenarios as well as potential and already evaluated countermeasures against indirect covert channels. Further, we discuss observable trends and anticipated future developments in the research area of indirect network-level covert channels.
papers.abstract_zh: 在过去的几年里，间接网络级隐蔽通道经历了一次新思想和不断发展的概念的复兴。现在可以跨越逻辑网络隔离，并且可以在发送和接收操作之间存在时间距离的情况下执行发送和接收活动。尽管有这些新的发展，所有的间接网络秘密渠道共享某些基本原则，允许分类。迄今为止，间接网络级隐蔽通道的概念从未系统化。在本文中，我们介绍了一种包含间接隐蔽通道模式的分类法，该分类法允许对所有已知的间接网络级隐蔽通道进行差异化分析。我们引入了额外的定义，以统一对该领域的理解，并进一步确定间接隐蔽渠道的关键特征，使它们具有可比性和可描述性。我们进一步讨论了应用场景以及潜在的和已经评估的针对间接隐蔽通道的对策。此外，我们讨论了间接网络级隐蔽通道研究领域的可观察趋势和预期的未来发展。
papers.title_zh: SOK：间接网络级别秘密渠道的调查

papers.title: TargetFuzz: Using DARTs to Guide Directed Greybox Fuzzers
papers.authors: Sadullah Canakci, Nikolay Matyunin, Kalman Graffi, Ajay Joshi, Manuel Egele
papers.abstract: Software development is a continuous and incremental process. Developers continuously improve their software in small batches rather than in one large batch. The high frequency of small batches makes it essential to use effective testing methods that detect bugs under limited testing time. To this end, researchers propose directed greybox fuzzing (DGF) which aims to generate test cases towards stressing certain target sites. Different from the coverage-based greybox fuzzing (CGF) which aims to maximize code coverage in the whole program, the goal of DGF is to cover potentially buggy code regions (e.g., a recently modified program region). While prior works improve several aspects of DGF (such as power scheduling, input prioritization, and target selection), little attention has been given to improving the seed selection process. Existing DGF tools use seed corpora mainly tailored for CGF (i.e., a set of seeds that cover different regions of the program). We observe that using CGF-based corpora limits the bug-finding capability of a directed greybox fuzzer. To mitigate this shortcoming, we propose TargetFuzz, a mechanism that provides a DGF tool with a target-oriented seed corpus. We refer to this corpus as DART corpus, which contains only 'close' seeds to the targets. This way, DART corpus guides DGF to the targets, thereby exposing bugs even under limited fuzzing time. Evaluations on 34 real bugs show that AFLGo (a state-of-the-art directed greybox fuzzer), when equipped with DART corpus, finds 10 additional bugs and achieves $4.03x speedup, on average, in the time-to-exposure compared to a generic CGF-based corpus.
papers.abstract_zh: 软件开发是一个持续的增量过程。开发人员不断地小批量改进他们的软件，而不是一个大批量。小批量的高频率使得在有限的测试时间内使用有效的测试方法来检测缺陷变得至关重要。为此，研究人员提出了定向灰盒模糊化(DGF ),旨在生成针对特定目标位置的测试用例。与基于覆盖的灰盒模糊化(CGF)不同，灰盒模糊化旨在最大化整个程序中的代码覆盖，DGF的目标是覆盖潜在的错误代码区域(例如，最近修改的程序区域)。虽然先前的工作改进了DGF的几个方面(例如功率调度、输入优先化和目标选择)，但是很少关注改进种子选择过程。现有的DGF工具使用主要为CGF定制的seed语料库(即，覆盖程序的不同区域的一组seed)。我们观察到，使用基于CGF的语料库限制了定向灰箱模糊器的缺陷发现能力。为了减轻这一缺点，我们提出了TargetFuzz，一种为DGF工具提供面向目标的种子语料库的机制。我们把这个语料库称为DART语料库，它只包含与目标“接近”的种子。这样，DART corpus引导DGF找到目标，从而即使在有限的模糊时间内也能发现漏洞。对34个真实bug的评估表明，AFLGo(一种最先进的定向灰箱fuzzer)在配备DART语料库时，发现了10个额外的bug，与基于CGF的通用语料库相比，平均在暴露时间方面实现了4.03倍的加速。
papers.title_zh: TargetFuzz：使用飞镖引导有向的灰盒绒毛

papers.title: RecIPE: Revisiting the Evaluation of Memory Error Defenses
papers.authors: Yuancheng Jiang, Roland H. C. Yap, Zhenkai Liang, Hubert Rosier
papers.abstract: Many detection and defense mechanisms have been proposed to prevent and mitigate memory errors. A good understanding of the pros and cons of memory defense mechanisms is essential before practical deployment. However, the environment, compilers, and defenses change over time. Thus, a benchmark providing comprehensive evaluations of a range of compilation option choices and defenses is helpful to give developers guidance. The most well-known test suite for evaluating spatial memory errors and exploits is RIPE. However, we show that it is no longer applicable, and a new benchmark is needed. Furthermore, a benchmark should be extensible to evolve over time easily. We propose RecIPE, a new extensible and comprehensive benchmark for evaluating memory error defenses. For extensibility and customisability, RecIPE consists of two components. The TestGen component generates vulnerable code from configurable templates across various vulnerable attributes allowing easy changes through the templates. Measuring the attack and exploitation is with the DefEval component, serving as an attacker at runtime and can be updated with new exploitations. We present a comprehensive evaluation of compiler defenses and sanitizers on RecIPE with gcc and clang, showing the strengths and weaknesses of the various defenses. The results show pros and cons which may not be well known, including gaps between the in-principle guarantee and practical implementation. Our results also point out directions for further improvement in defenses.
papers.abstract_zh: 已经提出了许多检测和防御机制来防止和减轻存储器错误。在实际部署之前，很好地理解内存防御机制的利弊是至关重要的。然而，环境、编译器和防御会随着时间而变化。因此，提供一系列编译选项选择和防御的综合评估的基准有助于为开发人员提供指导。用于评估空间内存错误和利用的最著名的测试套件已经成熟。然而，我们表明它不再适用，需要一个新的基准。此外，基准应该是可扩展的，可以很容易地随时间演变。我们提出了RecIPE，一个新的可扩展的和全面的评估内存错误防御的基准。为了可扩展性和可定制性，RecIPE由两部分组成。TestGen组件从跨各种易受攻击属性的可配置模板中生成易受攻击的代码，从而允许通过模板轻松进行更改。使用DefEval组件测量攻击和利用情况，该组件在运行时充当攻击者，并且可以使用新的利用情况进行更新。我们用gcc和clang对RecIPE上的编译器防御和杀毒程序进行了全面的评估，展示了各种防御的优缺点。结果显示了可能不太为人所知的利弊，包括原则保证和实际执行之间的差距。我们的结果也指出了进一步改善防御的方向。
papers.title_zh: 食谱：重新审查记忆错误防御的评估

papers.title: ReFuzz - Structure Aware Fuzzing of the Resilient File System (ReFS)
papers.authors: Tobias Groß, Tobias Schleier, Tilo Müller
papers.abstract: The Resilient File System (ReFS) from Microsoft promises new features such as increased performance and resilience compared to the New Technology File System (NTFS). On the downside, the ReFS drivers are growing more extensive and more complex, increasing the attack surface of the Windows kernel. Attackers can often use security-critical bugs in file system drivers to escalate privileges by mounting a file system. In this work, we present ReFuzz, a structure-aware fuzzer that uses hardware-assisted code coverage to identify bugs in the ReFS driver. The ReFS file system offers several challenges to fuzzing because first, while ReFS is not documented, it exhaustively uses checksums. Second, the minimal size of a ReFS partition is 2GB, notably decreasing the performance of naive fuzzing approaches. We demonstrate the effectiveness of our fuzzing approach by finding 27 unique payloads that panic the Windows kernel when mounting or accessing ReFS partitions. Furthermore, we find 162 unique payloads that lead to a system hang-up. Microsoft confirmed those bugs and acknowledged ten unique issues which are security-critical, eight of them allowing remote code execution attacks and got assigned with a CVE number.
papers.abstract_zh: 与新技术文件系统(NTFS)相比，微软的弹性文件系统(ReFS)承诺了新的功能，如提高的性能和弹性。不利的一面是，ReFS驱动变得越来越广泛和复杂，增加了Windows内核的攻击面。攻击者通常可以利用文件系统驱动程序中的安全关键缺陷，通过挂载文件系统来提升权限。在这项工作中，我们提出了ReFuzz，一个结构感知的fuzzer，它使用硬件辅助的代码覆盖来识别ReFS驱动程序中的错误。ReFS文件系统给fuzzing带来了几个挑战，因为首先，虽然ReFS没有被记录，但是它详尽地使用了校验和。其次，ReFS分区的最小大小是2GB，这明显降低了简单模糊化方法的性能。我们通过找到27个在挂载或访问ReFS分区时使Windows内核恐慌的独特有效负载来证明我们的模糊方法的有效性。此外，我们发现了162个导致系统挂起的唯一有效负载。微软证实了这些错误，并承认了十个独特的安全关键问题，其中八个允许远程代码执行攻击，并被分配了一个CVE号码。
papers.title_zh: 重新填充 - 弹性文件系统（REFS）的结构意识

papers.title: The Convergence of Source Code and Binary Vulnerability Discovery - A Case Study
papers.authors: Alessandro Mantovani, Luca Compagna, Yan Shoshitaishvili, Davide Balzarotti
papers.abstract: Decompilers are tools designed to recover a high-level language representation (typically in C code) from program binaries. Over the past five years, decompilers have improved enormously, not only in terms of the readability of the produced pseudocode, but also in terms of similarity of the recovered representation to the original source code. Albeit decompilers are routinely used by reverse engineers in different disciplines (e.g., to support vulnerability discovery or malware analysis), they are not yet adopted to produce input for source-code static analysis tools. In particular, source code vulnerability discovery and binary vulnerability discovery remain today two very different areas of research, despite the fact that decompilers could potentially bridge this gap and enable source-code analysis on binary files. In this paper, we conducted a number of experiments on real world vulnerabilities to evaluate the feasibility of this approach. In particular, our measurements are intended to show how the differences between original and decompiled code impact the accuracy of static analysis tools. Remarkably, our results show that in 71% of the cases, the same vulnerabilities can be detected by running the static analyzers on the decompiled code, even though for several cases we observe a steep increment in the number of false positives. To understand the reasons behind these differences, we manually investigated all cases and we identified a number of root causes that affected the ability of static tools to 'understand' the generated code.
papers.abstract_zh: 反编译器是设计用来从程序二进制文件中恢复高级语言表示(通常是C代码)的工具。在过去的五年里，反编译器有了很大的改进，不仅在生成的伪代码的可读性方面，而且在恢复的表示与原始源代码的相似性方面。尽管反编译器通常被不同学科的逆向工程师使用(例如，支持漏洞发现或恶意软件分析)，但是它们还没有被采用来为源代码静态分析工具产生输入。特别是，源代码漏洞发现和二进制漏洞发现今天仍然是两个非常不同的研究领域，尽管事实上反编译器可能会弥合这一差距，并允许对二进制文件进行源代码分析。在本文中，我们对现实世界中的漏洞进行了大量实验，以评估这种方法的可行性。特别是，我们的测量旨在显示原始代码和反编译代码之间的差异如何影响静态分析工具的准确性。值得注意的是，我们的结果显示，在71%的情况下，可以通过对反编译代码运行静态分析器来检测相同的漏洞，尽管在一些情况下，我们观察到误报数量急剧增加。为了理解这些差异背后的原因，我们手动调查了所有情况，并且我们确定了影响静态工具“理解”生成代码的能力的许多根本原因。
papers.title_zh: 源代码和二进制漏洞发现的融合 - 案例研究

papers.title: SoK: The Evolution of Trusted UI on Mobile
papers.authors: Davide Bove
papers.abstract: In mobile security research, one of the many challenges is the lack of trusted user interfaces (TUI). Currently, users are not able to reliably identify which screen content is genuine and which is potentially manipulated. The concepts of trusted displays and user interfaces, which offer a high confidence in the trustworthiness of screen contents, are not universally implemented on current consumer devices. In this paper, we systematically analyze the developments in the field of TUIs on mobile devices over seven years. We present a new taxonomy to define and categorize challenges and issues in current UI designs, with a focus on issues that negatively affect the security of the whole OS. In addition, we suggest directions where contributions in research could solve these issues.
papers.abstract_zh: 在移动安全研究中，许多挑战之一是缺乏可信用户界面(TUI)。目前，用户不能可靠地识别哪些屏幕内容是真实的，哪些是可能被操纵的。可信显示器和用户界面的概念提供了对屏幕内容可信度的高度信任，但在当前的消费设备上还没有普遍实现。在本文中，我们系统地分析了移动设备上的tui领域在过去七年中的发展。我们提出了一种新的分类法来定义和分类当前UI设计中的挑战和问题，重点关注对整个操作系统的安全性产生负面影响的问题。此外，我们建议在研究中的贡献可以解决这些问题的方向。
papers.title_zh: SOK：移动中受信任的UI的演变

papers.title: Speedster: An Efficient Multi-party State Channel via Enclaves
papers.authors: Jinghui Liao, Fengwei Zhang, Wenhai Sun, Weisong Shi
papers.abstract: State channel network is the most popular layer-2 solution to the issues of scalability, high transaction fees, and low transaction throughput of public Blockchain networks. However, the existing works have limitations that curb the wide adoption of the technology, such as the expensive creation and closure of channels, strict synchronization between the main chain and off-chain channels, frozen deposits, and inability to execute multi-party smart contracts. In this work, we present Speedster, an account-based state-channel system that aims to address the above issues. To this end, Speedster leverages the latest development of secure hardware to create dispute-free certified channels that can be operated efficiently off the Blockchain. Speedster is peer-to-peer decentralized and provides better privacy protection than prior channel projects. It supports fast native multi-party contract execution, which is previously unavailable in TEE-enabled channel networks. Compared to the Lightning Network, Speedster improves the throughput by about 10,000X and generates 97%$ less on-chain data with a comparable network scale.
papers.abstract_zh: 状态通道网络是解决公共区块链网络的可扩展性、高交易费用和低交易吞吐量问题的最流行的第二层解决方案。然而，现有的作品具有限制该技术广泛采用的局限性，例如昂贵的通道创建和关闭、主链和链外通道之间的严格同步、冻结的存款以及无法执行多方智能合约。在这项工作中，我们提出了Speedster，一个基于帐户的状态通道系统，旨在解决上述问题。为此，Speedster利用安全硬件的最新发展来创建无争议的认证通道，这些通道可以在区块链之外高效运行。Speedster是点对点分散式的，比以前的渠道项目提供了更好的隐私保护。它支持快速本机多方契约执行，这在以前启用TEE的通道网络中是不可用的。与Lightning网络相比，Speedster将吞吐量提高了约10，000倍，在网络规模相当的情况下，生成的链上数据减少了97%。
papers.title_zh: Speedster：通过飞地有效的多方状态通道

papers.title: Veksel: Simple, Efficient, Anonymous Payments with Large Anonymity Sets from Well-Studied Assumptions
papers.authors: Matteo Campanelli, Mathias Hall-Andersen
papers.abstract: We propose Veksel, a simple generic paradigm for constructing efficient non-interactive coin mixes. The central component in our work is a concretely efficient proof π1-many that a homomorphic commitment c* is a rerandomization of a commitment c ∈ {c1, …,cℓ} without revealing c. We formalize anonymous account-based cryptocurrency as a universally composable functionality and show how to efficiently instantiate it using π1-many in a straightforward way. We instantiate and implement π1-many from Strong-RSA, DDH and random oracles targeting ≈ 112 bits of security. The resulting NIZK has constant size (|π1-many| = 5.3 KB) and constant proving/verification time (≈ 90 ms), on an already accumulated set. Compared to ZCash---which offers comparable marginal verification cost and an anonymity set consisting of every existing transaction---our transactions are larger (6.2 KB) and verification is slower. On the other hand, Veksel relies on better studied assumptions, has no expensive trusted setup for proofs and is arguably simpler to implement. Additionally we think that π1-many might be interesting in other applications, e.g. proving possession of some credential posted on-chain. The efficiency of our concrete NIZK relies on a new Ristretto-friendly elliptic curve, Jabberwock, that is of independent interest: it can be used to efficiently prove statements on "committments on commitments'' in Bulletproofs.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了Veksel，一个简单的通用范例，用于构造高效的非交互式硬币组合。我们工作的核心部分是一个具体有效的证明π1-many，同态承诺c*是承诺c ∈ {c1，…,cℓ}的再随机化，而不暴露c。我们将基于匿名账户的加密货币形式化为一个通用的可组合功能，并展示如何以一种简单的方式使用π1-many有效地实例化它。我们实例化并实现了π1-many from Strong-RSA、DDH和随机预言机，目标是≈ 112位安全。在已经累积的集合上，得到的NIZK具有恒定的大小(|π1-many| = 5.3 KB)和恒定的证明/验证时间(≈ 90 ms)。与ZCash相比——它提供了可比较的边际验证成本和包含每个现有交易的匿名集——我们的交易更大(6.2 KB)并且验证更慢。另一方面，Veksel依赖于经过更好研究的假设，没有昂贵的可信的证明设置，并且可以说实现起来更简单。此外，我们认为π1-many可能在其他应用中也很有趣，例如证明拥有链上发布的某些凭证。我们的concrete NIZK的效率依赖于一种新的Ristretto友好的椭圆曲线Jabberwock，这是一种独立的兴趣:它可以用来有效地证明Bulletproofs中关于“committments on commitments”的语句。
papers.title_zh: veksel：简单，高效，匿名付款，匿名集中有大量的假设

papers.title: Symbolic Synthesis of Indifferentiability Attacks
papers.authors: Itsaka Rakotonirina, Miguel Ambrona, Alejandro Aguirre, Gilles Barthe
papers.abstract: We propose automated methods for synthesising attacks against indifferentiability, a powerful simulation-based notion of security commonly used to reason about symmetric-key constructions. Our methods are inspired from symbolic cryptography which is popular to reason about, e.g., cryptographic protocols. For that, we introduce a core programming language for algebraic distinguishers and study the class of universal distinguishers, who win the indifferentiability game against every simulator; then, we show that the universality of algebraic distinguishers can be reduced to solving systems of algebraic, deducibility and static-equivalence constraints. Our approach is implemented in a tool, AutoDiff, which solves these constraint systems, and applies heuristics to automate the cryptanalysis (i.e., to search automatically for universal distinguishers). We evaluate the tool with many non-trivial attacks from the literature on Feistel networks and Even-Mansour blockciphers among others. Our tool is able to check the validity these attacks, and in many cases to synthesise them without guidance. To our knowledge, AutoDiff is the first practical tool for indifferentiability attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了针对不可微性的自动合成攻击方法，不可微性是一种强大的基于模拟的安全概念，通常用于对对称密钥结构进行推理。我们的方法受符号密码学的启发，这种密码学在推理例如密码协议时很流行。为此，我们引入了代数区分器的核心程序设计语言，并研究了通用区分器类，它们在与所有模拟器的不可微博弈中获胜；然后，我们证明了代数区分子的普适性可以归结为求解代数、可演绎和静态等价约束系统。我们的方法在工具AutoDiff中实现，该工具解决这些约束系统，并应用启发式算法来自动进行密码分析(即，自动搜索通用区分符)。我们用Feistel网络和Even-Mansour分组密码等文献中的许多非平凡攻击来评估该工具。我们的工具能够检查这些攻击的有效性，并且在许多情况下在没有指导的情况下合成它们。据我们所知，AutoDiff是第一个用于不可区分攻击的实用工具。
papers.title_zh: 无差异性攻击的象征性综合

papers.title: DPaSE: Distributed Password-Authenticated Symmetric-Key Encryption, or How to Get Many Keys from One Password
papers.authors: Poulami Das, Julia Hesse, Anja Lehmann
papers.abstract: Cloud storage is becoming increasingly popular among end users that outsource their personal data to services such as Dropbox or Google Drive. For security, uploaded data should ideally be encrypted under a key that is controlled and only known by the user. Current solutions that support user-centric encryption either require the user to manage strong cryptographic keys, or derive keys from weak passwords. While the former has massive usability issues and requires secure storage by the user, the latter approach is more convenient but offers only little security since encrypted data is susceptible to offline attacks. The recent concept of password-authenticated secret-sharing (PASS) enables users to securely derive strong keys from weak passwords by leveraging a distributed server setup, and has been considered a promising step towards secure and usable encryption. However, using PASS for encryption is not as suitable as originally thought: it only considers the (re)construction of a single, static key -- whereas practical encryption will require the management of many, object-specific keys. Using a dedicated PASS instance for every key makes the solution vulnerable against online attacks, inherently leaks access patterns to the servers and poses the risk of permanent data loss when an incorrect password is used at encryption. We therefore propose a new protocol that directly targets the problem of boostrapping encryption from a single password: distributed password-authenticated symmetric encryption DPaSE. DPaSE offers strong security and usability, such as protecting the user's password against online and offline attacks, and ensuring message privacy and ciphertext integrity as long as at least one server is honest. We formally define the desired security properties in the UC framework and propose a provably secure instantiation. The core of our protocol is a new type of Oblivious Pseudorandom Function (OPRF) that allows to extend a previous partially-blind query with a follow-up request and will be used to blindly carry over passwords across evaluations and avoid online attacks. Our (proof-of-concept) implementation of DPaSE uses 10 exponentiations at the user, 4 exponentiations and 2 pairings at each server, and has a server throughput of 76 account creations and 37 (user authentication followed by) encryptions per second, when run between a user and 2-10 servers.
papers.abstract_zh: 云存储在将个人数据外包给Dropbox或Google Drive等服务的最终用户中越来越受欢迎。为了安全起见，上传的数据应该在一个只有用户知道的受控密钥下加密。支持以用户为中心的加密的当前解决方案要么要求用户管理强密码密钥，要么从弱密码中导出密钥。虽然前者有大量的可用性问题，并要求用户安全存储，但后一种方法更方便，但安全性很低，因为加密数据容易受到离线攻击。最近的口令认证秘密共享(PASS)概念使用户能够通过利用分布式服务器设置从弱口令中安全地导出强密钥，并且被认为是朝着安全和可用的加密迈出了有希望的一步。然而，使用PASS进行加密并不像最初认为的那样合适:它只考虑了单个静态密钥的(重新)构造——而实际的加密将需要管理许多特定于对象的密钥。对每个密钥使用专用的PASS实例使得该解决方案容易受到在线攻击，固有地将访问模式泄露给服务器，并且当在加密时使用不正确的密码时会带来永久数据丢失的风险。因此，我们提出了一个新的协议，直接针对从单个口令中增强加密的问题:分布式口令认证对称加密DPaSE。DPaSE提供了强大的安全性和可用性，例如保护用户的密码免受在线和离线攻击，只要至少有一个服务器是诚实的，就可以确保消息隐私和密文完整性。我们在UC框架中正式定义了期望的安全属性，并提出了一个可证明的安全实例化。该协议的核心是一种新型的不经意伪随机函数(OPRF ),它允许用后续请求来扩展先前的部分盲查询，并将被用于跨评估盲携带密码和避免在线攻击。我们的DPaSE(概念验证)实施在用户处使用10次指数运算，在每台服务器处使用4次指数运算和2次配对，并且当在用户和2-10台服务器之间运行时，服务器吞吐量为每秒76个帐户创建和37次(用户验证后)加密。
papers.title_zh: DPASE：分布式密码实施的对称键加密，或如何从一个密码中获取许多键

papers.title: SoK: Password-Authenticated Key Exchange - Theory, Practice, Standardization and Real-World Lessons
papers.authors: Feng Hao, Paul C. van Oorschot
papers.abstract: Password-authenticated key exchange (PAKE) is a major area of cryptographic protocol research and practice. Many PAKE proposals have emerged in the 30 years following the original 1992 Encrypted Key Exchange (EKE), some accompanied by new theoretical models to support rigorous analysis. To reduce confusion and encourage practical development, major standards bodies including IEEE, ISO/IEC and the IETF have worked towards standardizing PAKE schemes, with mixed results. Challenges have included contrasts between heuristic protocols and schemes with security proofs, and subtleties in the assumptions of such proofs rendering some schemes unsuitable for practice. Despite initial difficulty identifying suitable use cases, the past decade has seen PAKE adoption in numerous large-scale applications such as Wi-Fi, Apple's iCloud, browser synchronization, e-passports, and the Thread network protocol for Internet of Things devices. Given this backdrop, we consolidate three decades of knowledge on PAKE protocols, integrating theory, practice, standardization and real-world experience. We provide a thorough and systematic review of the field, a summary of the state-of-the-art, a taxonomy to categorize existing protocols, and a comparative analysis of protocol performance using representative schemes from each taxonomy category. We also review real-world applications, summarize lessons learned, and highlight open research problems related to PAKE protocols.
papers.abstract_zh: 口令认证密钥交换是密码协议研究和实践的一个重要领域。在1992年最初的加密密钥交换(EKE)之后的30年中，出现了许多PAKE提案，其中一些伴随着新的理论模型来支持严格的分析。为了减少混乱和鼓励实际开发，包括IEEE、ISO/IEC和IETF在内的主要标准机构已经致力于标准化PAKE方案，结果喜忧参半。挑战包括启发式协议和具有安全证明的方案之间的对比，以及这种证明的假设中的微妙之处，使得一些方案不适合实践。尽管最初很难找到合适的用例，但在过去十年中，PAKE已被大量大规模应用采用，如Wi-Fi、苹果iCloud、浏览器同步、电子护照和物联网设备的线程网络协议。在这种背景下，我们整合了三十年来在PAKE协议方面的知识，将理论、实践、标准化和实际经验融为一体。我们对该领域进行了全面系统的回顾，总结了最新技术，对现有协议进行了分类，并使用每个分类类别中的代表性方案对协议性能进行了比较分析。我们还回顾现实世界的应用，总结经验教训，并强调与PAKE协议相关的开放研究问题。
papers.title_zh: SOK：密码实施密钥交换 - 理论，实践，标准化和现实世界的课程

papers.title: ASAP: Algorithm Substitution Attacks on Cryptographic Protocols
papers.authors: Sebastian Berndt, Jan Wichelmann, Claudius Pott, Tim-Henrik Traving, Thomas Eisenbarth
papers.abstract: The security of digital communication relies on few cryptographic protocols that are used to protect internet traffic, from web sessions to instant messaging. These protocols and the cryptographic primitives they rely on have been extensively studied and are considered secure. Yet, sophisticated attackers are often able to bypass rather than break security mechanisms. Kleptography or algorithm substitution attacks (ASA) describe techniques to place backdoors right into cryptographic primitives. While highly relevant as a building block, we show that the real danger of ASAs is their use in cryptographic protocols. In fact, we show that highly desirable security properties of these protocols - forward secrecy and post-compromise security - imply the applicability of ASAs. We then analyze the application of ASAs in three widely used protocols: TLS, WireGuard, and Signal. We show that these protocols can be easily subverted by carefully placing ASAs. Our analysis shows that careful design of ASAs makes detection unlikely while leaking long-term secrets within a few messages in the case of TLS and WireGuard, allowing impersonation attacks. In contrast, Signal's double-ratchet protocol shows higher immunity to ASAs, as the leakage requires much more messages.
papers.abstract_zh: 数字通信的安全性依赖于少数用于保护互联网流量的加密协议，从web会话到即时消息。这些协议和它们所依赖的密码原语已经过广泛的研究，并被认为是安全的。然而，老练的攻击者通常能够绕过而不是破坏安全机制。盗窃或算法替代攻击(ASA)描述了在密码原语中设置后门的技术。虽然作为一个构建模块高度相关，我们表明as a的真正危险是它们在加密协议中的使用。事实上，我们证明了这些协议非常令人满意的安全特性——前向安全性和后向安全性——暗示了ASAs的适用性。然后我们分析ASAs在三个广泛使用的协议中的应用:TLS、WireGuard和Signal。我们表明，这些协议可以很容易地通过仔细放置asa来破坏。我们的分析表明，asa的精心设计使得检测变得不太可能，同时在TLS和WireGuard的情况下，在一些消息中泄漏长期秘密，从而允许假冒攻击。相比之下，Signal的双棘轮协议显示出对asa更高的免疫力，因为泄漏需要更多的消息。
papers.title_zh: ASAP：算法替代对加密协议的攻击

papers.title: Mixed Certificate Chains for the Transition to Post-Quantum Authentication in TLS 1.3
papers.authors: Sebastian Paul, Yulia Kuzovkova, Norman Lahr, Ruben Niederhagen
papers.abstract: Large-scale quantum computers will be able to efficiently solve the underlying mathematical problems of widely deployed public key cryptosystems in the near future. This threat has sparked increased interest in the field of Post-Quantum Cryptography (PQC) and standardization bodies like NIST, IETF, and ETSI are in the process of standardizing PQC schemes as a new generation of cryptography. This raises the question of how to ensure a fast, reliable, and secure transition to upcoming PQC standards in today's highly interconnected world. In this work, we propose and investigate a migration strategy towards post-quantum (PQ) authentication for the network protocol Transport Layer Security (TLS). Our strategy is based on the concept of "mixed certificate chains" that use different signature algorithms within the same certificate chain. In order to demonstrate the feasibility of our migration strategy, we combine the well-studied and trusted hash-based signature schemes SPHINCS+ and XMSS with elliptic curve cryptography first and subsequently with lattice-based PQC signature schemes (CRYSTALS-Dilithium and Falcon). Furthermore, we combine authentication based on mixed certificate chains with the lattice-based key encapsulation mechanism (KEM) CRYSTALS-Kyber as representative for PQC KEMs to evaluate a fully post-quantum and mutually authenticated TLS 1.3 handshake. Our results show that mixed certificate chains containing hash-based signature schemes only at the root certificate authority level lead to feasible connection establishment times despite the increase in communication size. By analyzing code size and peak memory usage of our client and server programs we further demonstrate the suitability of our migration strategy even for embedded devices.
papers.abstract_zh: 在不久的将来，大规模量子计算机将能够有效地解决广泛部署的公钥密码系统的底层数学问题。这种威胁激发了人们对后量子密码术(PQC)领域的兴趣，并且像NIST、IETF和ETSI这样的标准化团体正在将PQC方案标准化为新一代密码术。这提出了一个问题，即在当今高度互联的世界中，如何确保快速、可靠、安全地过渡到即将到来的PQC标准。在这篇文章中，我们提出并研究了一种面向网络协议传输层安全(TLS)的后量子(PQ)认证的迁移策略。我们的策略基于“混合证书链”的概念，在同一证书链中使用不同的签名算法。为了证明我们的迁移策略的可行性，我们首先将经过充分研究的可信的基于哈希的签名方案SPHINCS+和XMSS与椭圆曲线密码相结合，然后与基于格的PQC签名方案(CRYSTALS-Dilithium和Falcon)相结合。此外，我们将基于混合证书链的认证与基于格的密钥封装机制(KEM) CRYSTALS-Kyber相结合，作为PQC KEMs的代表，以评估完全后量子和相互认证的TLS 1.3握手。我们的结果表明，仅在根证书授权级别包含基于散列的签名方案的混合证书链导致可行的连接建立时间，尽管通信大小增加。通过分析我们的客户端和服务器程序的代码大小和峰值内存使用量，我们进一步证明了我们的迁移策略的适用性，甚至适用于嵌入式设备。
papers.title_zh: 过渡到量子后身份验证的混合证书链1.3

papers.title: EnclaveTree: Privacy-preserving Data Stream Training and Inference Using TEE
papers.authors: Qifan Wang, Shujie Cui, Lei Zhou, Ocean Wu, Yonghua Zhu, Giovanni Russello
papers.abstract: The classification service over a stream of data is becoming an important offering for cloud providers, but users may encounter obstacles in providing sensitive data due to privacy concerns. While Trusted Execution Environments (TEEs) are promising solutions for protecting private data, they remain vulnerable to side-channel attacks induced by data-dependent access patterns. We propose a Privacy-preserving Data Stream Training and Inference scheme, called EnclaveTree, that provides confidentiality for user's data and the target models against a compromised cloud service provider. We design a matrix-based training and inference procedure to train the Hoeffding Tree (HT) model and perform inference with the trained model inside the trusted area of TEEs, which provably prevent the exploitation of access-pattern-based attacks. The performance evaluation shows that EnclaveTree is practical for processing the data streams with small or medium number of features. When there are less than 63 binary features,EnclaveTree is up to ~10x and ~9 faster than naïve oblivious solution on training and inference, respectively.
papers.abstract_zh: 数据流分类服务正在成为云提供商的重要产品，但用户可能会因为隐私问题而在提供敏感数据时遇到障碍。虽然可信执行环境(tee)是保护私有数据的有前途的解决方案，但是它们仍然容易受到由数据相关访问模式引起的旁路攻击。我们提出了一个隐私保护的数据流训练和推理方案，称为EnclaveTree，它为用户的数据和目标模型提供机密性，以抵御受威胁的云服务提供商。我们设计了一个基于矩阵的训练和推理过程来训练Hoeffding树(HT)模型，并使用训练好的模型在TEEs的可信区域内进行推理，可证明可以防止基于访问模式的攻击。性能评估表明，EnclaveTree对于处理具有少量或中等数量特征的数据流是实用的。当二进制特征少于63个时，EnclaveTree在训练和推理上分别比朴素的不经意解决方案快大约10倍和大约9倍。
papers.title_zh: Enclavetree：使用TEE的数据流培训和推断

papers.title: SoK: Design Tools for Side-Channel-Aware Implementations
papers.authors: Ileana Buhan, Lejla Batina, Yuval Yarom, Patrick Schaumont
papers.abstract: Side-channel attacks that leak sensitive information through a computing device's interaction with its physical environment have proven to be a severe threat to devices' security, particularly when adversaries have unfettered physical access to the device. Traditional approaches for leakage detection measure the physical properties of the device. Hence, they cannot be used during the design process and fail to provide root cause analysis. An alternative approach that is gaining traction is to automate leakage detection by modeling the device. The demand to understand the scope, benefits, and limitations of the proposed tools intensifies with the increase in the number of proposals. In this SoK, we classify approaches to automated leakage detection based on the model's source of truth. We classify the existing tools on two main parameters: whether the model includes measurements from a concrete device and the abstraction level of the device specification used for constructing the model. We survey the proposed tools to determine the current knowledge level across the domain and identify open problems. In particular, we highlight the absence of evaluation methodologies and metrics that would compare proposals' effectiveness from across the domain. We believe that our results help practitioners who want to use automated leakage detection and researchers interested in advancing the knowledge and improving automated leakage detection.
papers.abstract_zh: 通过计算设备与其物理环境的交互来泄漏敏感信息的旁道攻击已被证明是对设备安全性的严重威胁，尤其是当对手可以不受限制地物理访问设备时。传统的泄漏检测方法是测量设备的物理特性。因此，它们不能在设计过程中使用，也不能提供根本原因分析。另一种越来越受欢迎的方法是通过对设备建模来自动检测泄漏。随着提议数量的增加，理解提议的工具的范围、好处和限制的需求也在增加。在本SoK中，我们根据模型的真实来源对自动泄漏检测方法进行了分类。我们根据两个主要参数对现有工具进行分类:模型是否包括来自具体设备的测量，以及用于构建模型的设备规范的抽象级别。我们调查建议的工具，以确定整个领域的当前知识水平，并确定开放的问题。特别是，我们强调缺乏评估方法和度量来比较跨领域的提案的有效性。我们相信，我们的结果有助于希望使用自动泄漏检测的从业者和对增进知识和改进自动泄漏检测感兴趣的研究人员。
papers.title_zh: SOK：侧通道感知实现的设计工具

papers.title: Efficient Oblivious Permutation via the Waksman Network
papers.authors: William L. Holland, Olga Ohrimenko, Anthony Wirth
papers.abstract: Memory accesses to data stored on an untrusted server are known to leak information, even if the data is encrypted. The oblivious permutation (OP) is a key primitive for algorithms and protocols that are designed to hide these client accesses to the server. An OP algorithm permutes outsourced data blocks according to a given permutation without revealing the permutation to the server. Existing solutions strive to use only O (B) bits of client memory when permuting n blocks each of B bits. State-of-the-art O (B) bit solutions, require an optimal O (n log n) I/Os to complete. However, the hidden constant factor is at least $19600$. In this work, we depart from this memory constraint and, in pursuit of an I/O efficient algorithm, consider the context of cloud storage where a client can have a larger amount of private memory. We propose an algorithm, WaksmanOP, that uses 2n + o(n) + 2B bits of client storage and permutes data in at most 4n log n - 3.6n I/Os. WaksmanOP is based on the Waksman network and involves a novel routing algorithm that carefully configures network switch settings using small client space. We implement WaksmanOP and compare it with existing solutions. Compared to practical methods based on sorting, WaksmanOP reduces the number of I/Os by a log n factor and uses significantly less client space than methods based on shuffling for large values of B. (e.g., 41MB vs. 6.4GB of private memory to permute 16TB of data).
papers.abstract_zh: 众所周知，对存储在不受信任的服务器上的数据进行内存访问会泄漏信息，即使数据是加密的。不经意置换(OP)是算法和协议的关键原语，用于隐藏客户端对服务器的访问。OP算法根据给定的排列来排列外包的数据块，而不会将该排列透露给服务器。当置换n个块的每个B位时，现有的解决方案努力仅使用O (B)位的客户端存储器。最新的O (B)位解决方案需要最佳的O(n log n)I/O来完成。然而，隐藏常数因子至少是19600美元。在这项工作中，我们从这种内存限制出发，在追求I/O高效算法的过程中，考虑云存储的上下文，其中客户端可以拥有更大量的私有内存。我们提出了一个算法WaksmanOP，它使用2n + o(n) + 2B位的客户端存储，最多允许4n个log n-3.6n I/o中的数据。WaksmanOP基于Waksman网络，涉及一种新颖的路由算法，该算法使用较小的客户端空间仔细配置网络交换机设置。我们实现了WaksmanOP，并将其与现有的解决方案进行了比较。与基于排序的实用方法相比，WaksmanOP将I/o的数量减少了一个log n因子，并且使用的客户端空间比基于大值b的混洗的方法少得多(例如，置换16TB的数据需要41MB与6.4GB的专用内存)。
papers.title_zh: 通过WAKSMAN网络有效忽略的置换

papers.title: SoK: Exploring Current and Future Research Directions on XS-Leaks through an Extended Formal Model
papers.authors: Tom van Goethem, Gertjan Franken, Iskander Sánchez-Rola, David Dworken, Wouter Joosen
papers.abstract: A web visit typically consists of the browser rendering a dynamically generated response that is specifically tailored to the user. This generation of responses based on the currently authenticated user, whose authentication credentials are automatically included via cookies in all (including cross-site) requests, have led to a multitude of issues. Through cross-site leaks (XS-Leaks), an adversary can try to circumvent the same-origin policy and extract information about responses, which in turn can reveal potentially sensitive information about the user. As research on this class of vulnerabilities only recently gained traction, and the attacks affect many different components of the web platform, the intrinsic characteristics and underlying causes remain largely unexplored. In this paper we present an abstraction of XS-Leaks attacks and introduce an extended formal model that we use to reason about the cause of different leaks and which strategies the various defense mechanisms employ to defend against them. Furthermore, we provide a classification method for current attacks, and, guided by our model, propose a methodology to comprehensively detect new XS-Leak issues, or indicate their absence. Furthermore, we analyze the current defenses and identify gaps that still require further research to provide extensive solutions for sites that rely on cross-site interactions. Finally, we explore how XS-Leak defenses are currently deployed and which challenges website owners are still facing. As a first step towards facilitating the deployment of XS-Leak defenses, we introduce LeakBuster, a dynamic web interface that provides web developers with suggestions based on the insights provided throughout this paper.
papers.abstract_zh: web访问通常包括浏览器呈现专门为用户定制的动态生成的响应。这种基于当前经过身份验证的用户的响应生成(其身份验证凭据通过cookies自动包含在所有(包括跨站点)请求中)导致了大量问题。通过跨站点泄漏(XS泄漏)，对手可以试图绕过同源策略，并提取有关响应的信息，这反过来会泄露用户的潜在敏感信息。由于对这类漏洞的研究只是在最近才受到重视，而且攻击会影响web平台的许多不同组件，因此其内在特征和潜在原因在很大程度上仍未被探究。在本文中，我们提出了一个XS泄漏攻击的抽象，并介绍了一个扩展的形式模型，我们使用它来推理不同泄漏的原因以及各种防御机制用来防御它们的策略。此外，我们提供了一种对当前攻击的分类方法，并在我们的模型的指导下，提出了一种方法来全面检测新的XS泄漏问题，或者指出它们的存在。此外，我们分析了当前的防御措施，并确定了仍需要进一步研究的差距，以便为依赖跨站点交互的站点提供广泛的解决方案。最后，我们探索XS泄漏防御目前是如何部署的，以及网站所有者仍然面临哪些挑战。作为促进XS泄漏防御部署的第一步，我们引入了LeakBuster，这是一个动态的web界面，它根据本文提供的见解为web开发人员提供建议。
papers.title_zh: SOK：通过扩展的正式模型探索XS-Leaks的当前和未来研究指示

papers.title: Ruling the Rules: Quantifying the Evolution of Rulesets, Alerts and Incidents in Network Intrusion Detection
papers.authors: Mathew Vermeer, Michel van Eeten, Carlos Gañán
papers.abstract: Notwithstanding the predicted demise of signature-based network monitoring, it is still part of the bedrock of security operations. Rulesets are fundamental to the efficacy of Network Intrusion Detection Systems (NIDS). Yet, they have rarely been studied in production environments. We partner with a Managed Security Service Provider (MSSP) to gain more insight into the evolution of rulesets, the alerts that they trigger and the incidents that get investigated. We analyze a combined ruleset --including both commercial and proprietary rules-- that consists of 130 thousand rules and was used to monitor hundreds of networks. We find that these rulesets keep growing over time but there is almost no overlap among them in terms of detection options or what indicators of compromise they contain. The combined ruleset triggered more than 62 million alerts and led to 150 thousand incident investigations by SOC analysts, though the vast majority of rules never triggered a single alert. We find that just 0.5% of all rules are responsible for more than 80% of the alerts and incidents and only 1.2% of all alerts were deemed to merit closer investigation. Of all incidents, 16% were labeled as false positives and 9% carried significant risk to the client organization. Independently of the type of rule, updating rules is a minor activity. Most rules are never modified and only a fraction is deleted, except for periodic purges in some sets. Seven in-depth interviews with rule developers corroborate the patterns we found in our analysis. Finally, we identify several rule management practices that influence rule and ruleset efficacy, such as supplementing commercial rules with your own and making rules as specific as possible.
papers.abstract_zh: 尽管基于签名的网络监控被预言会消亡，但它仍然是安全操作的基石的一部分。规则集是网络入侵检测系统(NIDS)有效性的基础。然而，它们很少在生产环境中被研究。我们与托管安全服务提供商(MSSP)合作，深入了解规则集的演变、它们触发的警报以及需要调查的事件。我们分析了一个组合规则集——包括商业规则和专有规则——它由13万条规则组成，用于监控数百个网络。我们发现这些规则集随着时间的推移不断增长，但在检测选项或它们包含的危害指标方面，它们之间几乎没有重叠。组合规则集触发了超过6200万个警报，并导致SOC分析师进行了15万次事件调查，尽管绝大多数规则从未触发过一个警报。我们发现，80%以上的警报和事件都是由0.5%的规则引起的，只有1.2%的警报值得进一步调查。在所有事件中，16%被标记为误报，9%给客户组织带来重大风险。与规则的类型无关，更新规则是一项次要的活动。大多数规则从不修改，只有一小部分被删除，除了某些规则集中的定期清除。对规则开发者的七次深入采访证实了我们在分析中发现的模式。最后，我们确定了几个影响规则和规则集有效性的规则管理实践，例如用您自己的规则补充商业规则，并使规则尽可能具体。
papers.title_zh: 裁定规则：量化网络入侵检测中规则集，警报和事件的演变

papers.title: Differentially Private Data Synthesis: State of the Art and Challenges
papers.authors: Ninghui Li
papers.abstract: Differential privacy has been accepted as the de facto notion for protecting privacy. Companies and government agencies use differential privacy for privacy-preserving data analysis. For example, the US census bureau applied differential privacy in the 2020 census. One important approach to use a private dataset is to generate a synthetic dataset that is similar to the private dataset in a way that satisfies differential privacy. This enables data analysts to directly apply existing algorithms for performing data analysis. Furthermore, as additional data analysis tasks performed on the published dataset are post-processing, they do not incur additional privacy cost. In recent years, US National Institutes of Standards and Technology ran two competitions on differentially private data synthesis, which drove the development of practically effective data synthesis algorithms. In this talk, I will discuss the current state of the art for private data synthesis, with a focus on those approaches that have performed well in the NIST competitions. One family of approaches uses probabilistic graphical models. My group's approach uses private marginals and a procedure that is similar to Iterative Proportional Fitting, which has been studied in many fields. We also discuss the remaining challenge and open questions.
papers.abstract_zh: 差别隐私已被接受为保护隐私的事实概念。公司和政府机构使用差异隐私进行隐私保护数据分析。例如，美国人口普查局在2020年的人口普查中应用了差异隐私。使用私有数据集的一个重要方法是生成一个合成数据集，该数据集在某种程度上类似于私有数据集，满足差分隐私。这使得数据分析师能够直接应用现有算法来执行数据分析。此外，由于在发布的数据集上执行的额外数据分析任务是后处理的，因此它们不会产生额外的隐私成本。近年来，美国国家标准和技术研究所举办了两次关于差分私有数据合成的比赛，推动了实际有效的数据合成算法的发展。在本次演讲中，我将讨论私有数据合成的当前艺术状态，重点是那些在NIST竞赛中表现出色的方法。一类方法使用概率图形模型。我们小组的方法使用了私有边界和一种类似于迭代比例拟合的程序，这种方法已经在许多领域进行了研究。我们还讨论了剩余的挑战和开放的问题。
papers.title_zh: 差异私人数据综合：艺术和挑战的状态

papers.title: Adversarial Level Agreements for Two-Party Protocols
papers.authors: Marilyn George, Seny Kamara
papers.abstract: Adversaries in cryptography have traditionally been modeled as either semi-honest or malicious. Over the years, however, several works have investigated the design of cryptographic protocols against rational adversaries. The most well-known example are covert adversaries in secure computation (Aumann & Lindell, TCC '07) which are adversaries that wish to deviate from the protocol but without being detected. Protocols secure against such covert adversaries guarantee that deviations are detected with probability at least - which is known as the deterrence factor. In this work, we initiate the study of contracts in cryptographic protocol design. We show how to design, use and analyze contracts between parties for the purpose of incentivizing honest behavior from rational adversaries. We refer to such contracts as adversarial level agreements (ALA). The framework we propose can result in more efficient protocols and can enforce deterrence in covert protocols; meaning that one can guarantee that a given deterrence factor will deter the adversary instead of assuming it. We show how to apply our framework to two-party protocols, including secure two-party computation (2PC) and proofs of storage (PoS). In the 2PC case, we integrate ALAs to publicly-verifiable covert protocols and show, through a game-theoretic analysis, how to set the parameters of the ALA to guarantee honest behavior. We do the same for PoS which are two-party protocols that allow a client to efficiently verify the integrity of a file stored in the cloud.
papers.abstract_zh: 传统上，密码学中的对手要么是半诚实的，要么是恶意的。然而，在过去的几年里，已经有几部著作研究了针对理性对手的密码协议的设计。最著名的例子是安全计算中的秘密对手(Aumann & Lindell，TCC’07)，这些对手希望偏离协议但不被检测到。针对这种隐蔽对手的安全协议保证了至少有概率检测到偏差，这被称为威慑因素。在这项工作中，我们发起了对密码协议设计中契约的研究。我们展示了如何设计、使用和分析各方之间的契约，以激励理性对手的诚实行为。我们将这种合同称为对抗性水平协议(ALA)。我们提出的框架可以产生更有效的协议，并可以在秘密协议中加强威慑；这意味着人们可以保证给定的威慑因素将威慑对手，而不是假设它。我们展示了如何将我们的框架应用于两方协议，包括安全两方计算(2PC)和存储证明(PoS)。在2PC案例中，我们将ALA整合到可公开验证的隐蔽协议中，并通过博弈分析展示了如何设置ALA的参数以保证诚实行为。我们对PoS也做了同样的事情，PoS是一种双方协议，允许客户端有效地验证存储在云中的文件的完整性。
papers.title_zh: 两党协议的对抗水平协议

papers.title: Easy-to-Implement Two-Server based Anonymous Communication with Simulation Security
papers.authors: Adam Bowers, Jize Du, Dan Lin, Wei Jiang
papers.abstract: Anonymous communication, that is secure end-to-end and unlinkable, plays a critical role in protecting user privacy by preventing service providers from using message metadata to discover communication links between any two users. Techniques, such as Mix-net, DC-net, time delay, cover traffic, Secure Multiparty Computation (SMC) and Private Information Retrieval, can be used to achieve anonymous communication. SMC-based approach generally offers stronger simulation based security guarantee. In this paper, we propose a simple and novel SMC approach to establishing anonymous communication, easily implementable with two non-colluding servers which have only communication and storage related capabilities. Our approach offers stronger security guarantee against malicious adversaries without incurring a great deal of extra computation. To show its practicality, we implemented our solutions using Chameleon Cloud to simulate the interactions among a million users, and extensive simulations were conducted to show message latency with various group sizes. Our approach is efficient for smaller group sizes and sub-group communication while preserving message integrity. Also, it does not have the message collision problem.
papers.abstract_zh: 匿名通信是端到端安全且不可链接的，它通过防止服务提供商使用消息元数据来发现任意两个用户之间的通信链接，在保护用户隐私方面起着至关重要的作用。混合网、DC网、时间延迟、隐蔽通信、安全多方计算(SMC)和私人信息检索等技术可以用来实现匿名通信。基于SMC的方法通常提供更强的基于模拟的安全保证。在本文中，我们提出了一种简单新颖的SMC方法来建立匿名通信，该方法易于用两个非共谋服务器实现，这两个服务器仅具有通信和存储相关的能力。我们的方法在不招致大量额外计算的情况下，提供了更强的针对恶意对手的安全保证。为了展示其实用性，我们使用变色龙云来实现我们的解决方案，以模拟一百万用户之间的交互，并且进行了大量的模拟来显示不同组大小的消息延迟。我们的方法对于较小的组大小和子组通信是有效的，同时保持消息完整性。此外，它没有消息冲突问题。
papers.title_zh: 易于实现的基于仿真安全性的基于两效的匿名通信

papers.title: Scalable Private Decision Tree Evaluation with Sublinear Communication
papers.authors: Jianli Bai, Xiangfu Song, Shujie Cui, Ee-Chien Chang, Giovanni Russello
papers.abstract: Private decision tree evaluation (PDTE) allows a decision tree holder to run a secure protocol with a feature provider. By running the protocol, the feature provider will learn a classification result. Nothing more is revealed to either party. In most existing PDTE protocols, the required communication grows exponentially with the tree's depth d, which is highly inefficient for large trees. This shortcoming motivated us to design a sublinear PDTE protocol with $O(d)$ communication complexity. The core of our construction is a shared oblivious selection (SOS) functionality, allowing two parties to perform a secret-shared oblivious read operation from an array. We provide two SOS protocols, both of which achieve sublinear communication and propose optimizations to further improve their efficiency. Our sublinear PDTE protocol is based on the proposed SOS functionality and we prove its security under a semi-honest adversary. We compare our protocol with the state-of-the-art, in terms of communication and computation, under various network settings. The performance evaluation shows that our protocol is practical and more scalable over large trees than existing solutions.
papers.abstract_zh: 私有决策树评估(PDTE)允许决策树持有者运行与特征提供者的安全协议。通过运行该协议，特征提供者将了解分类结果。双方都没有透露更多信息。在大多数现有的PDTE协议中，所需的通信随着树的深度d呈指数增长，这对于大树来说是非常低效的。这个缺点促使我们设计了一个通信复杂度为O(d)$的次线性PDTE协议。我们的构造的核心是一个共享的不经意选择(SOS)功能，允许双方从一个数组执行一个秘密共享的不经意读取操作。我们提供了两个SOS协议，这两个协议都实现了次线性通信，并提出了进一步提高其效率的优化。我们的次线性PDTE协议是基于提出的SOS功能的，我们证明了它在半诚实敌手下的安全性。我们比较了我们的协议与最先进的，在通信和计算方面，在各种网络设置。性能评估表明，我们的协议是切实可行的，比现有的解决方案更大的树可伸缩性。
papers.title_zh: 可扩展的私人决策树评估与均匀通信

papers.title: Memory and Round-Efficient MPC Primitives in the Pre-Processing Model from Unit Vectorization
papers.authors: Nuttapong Attrapadung, Hiraku Morita, Kazuma Ohara, Jacob C. N. Schuldt, Kazunari Tozawa
papers.abstract: In this paper, we propose memory- and round-efficient protocols for securely evaluating arithmetic primitives. We focus on secure two-party computation over the ring ℤ2k that achieves security against semi-honest adversaries and works in the pre-processing model. Our protocols rely on the unit vectorization technique introduced by Boyle et al. (TCC 2019). The unit vectorization technique provides online-optimal protocols for several fundamental operations in the pre-processing model. However, a relatively large memory cost for correlated randomness is required, which might become an obstacle in a large-scale application. In order to achieve both memory and communication efficiency, we propose a size reduction method that uses unit vectorization only for short-length inputs, and based on this, construct two-round protocols for equality test, detecting the most significant non-zero bit, detecting wrap-around, and less-than comparison. In addition, as applications of these results, we provide practically efficient protocols for integer division, integer square root, integer logarithm, and modular exponentiation.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们提出了内存和轮有效的协议，安全评估算术原语。我们关注环ℤ2k上的安全两方计算，它实现了对抗半诚实对手的安全性，并在预处理模型中工作。我们的协议依赖于Boyle等人(TCC 2019)介绍的单元矢量化技术。单元向量化技术为预处理模型中的几个基本操作提供了在线优化协议。然而，相关随机性需要相对较大的存储成本，这可能成为大规模应用中的障碍。为了同时实现存储和通信效率，我们提出了一种仅针对短长度输入使用单元向量化的大小缩减方法，并在此基础上，构建了用于相等性测试、检测最高有效非零位、检测回绕和小于比较的两轮协议。此外，作为这些结果的应用，我们为整数除法、整数平方根、整数对数和模幂运算提供了实际有效的协议。
papers.title_zh: 单位矢量化的预处理模型中的内存和圆形MPC原语

papers.title: Understanding and Detecting Remote Infection on Linux-based IoT Devices
papers.authors: Hongda Li, Qiqing Huang, Fei Ding, Hongxin Hu, Long Cheng, Guofei Gu, Ziming Zhao
papers.abstract: The rocketed population, poor security, and 24/7 online properties make Linux-based Internet of Things (IoT) devices ideal targets for attackers. However, due to the budget constraints and an enormous number of vulnerabilities on such devices, protecting them against attacks is very challenging. Therefore, understanding and detecting IoT malware remote infection, which is before the compromised IoT devices are monetized by adversaries, is crucial to mitigate damages and financial loss caused by IoT malware. In this paper, we conduct an empirical study on a large-scale dataset covering 403,464 samples collected from VirusShare and a large group of IoT honeypots to gain a deep insight into the characteristics of IoT malware remote infection. We share detailed statistics of shell commands found in our dataset, highlight malicious behaviors performed through those commands, investigate current states of fingerprinting methods of those commands, and offer a taxonomy of shell commands by introducing the notion of infection capability. To demonstrate the usefulness of the knowledge gained from our study, we develop an approach to detect ongoing remote infection activities based on infection capabilities. Our evaluation shows that our detection approach can achieve a 99.22% detection rate for remote infections in the wild and introduce small performance overhead.
papers.abstract_zh: 飞速增长的人口、糟糕的安全性和全天候在线属性使得基于Linux的物联网(IoT)设备成为攻击者的理想目标。然而，由于预算限制和此类设备上的大量漏洞，保护它们免受攻击是非常具有挑战性的。因此，在受害的物联网设备被对手利用之前，了解和检测物联网恶意软件远程感染对于减轻物联网恶意软件造成的损害和经济损失至关重要。在本文中，我们对从VirusShare和大量物联网蜜罐中收集的覆盖403，464个样本的大规模数据集进行了实证研究，以深入了解物联网恶意软件远程感染的特征。我们分享在我们的数据集中发现的外壳命令的详细统计数据，突出通过这些命令执行的恶意行为，调查这些命令的指纹识别方法的当前状态，并通过引入感染能力的概念提供外壳命令的分类。为了证明从我们的研究中获得的知识的有用性，我们开发了一种基于感染能力来检测正在进行的远程感染活动的方法。我们的评估表明，我们的检测方法可以实现99.22%的远程感染检测率，并引入较小的性能开销。
papers.title_zh: 了解和检测基于Linux的IoT设备上的远程感染

papers.title: Driving Execution of Target Paths in Android Applications with (a) CAR
papers.authors: Michelle Y. Wong, David Lie
papers.abstract: Dynamic program analysis is commonly used to vet Android applications. One approach is targeted execution, in which interesting or suspicious code is specifically targeted and analyzed dynamically. However, faithful execution to just the paths that reach these targets can be difficult due to the dependencies they have on other parts of the application. Prior works that handle dependencies must favor either soundness or completeness to the detriment of the other. Techniques that rely on precise dependency tracking ultimately result in lower coverage of targets due to overhead. Meanwhile, other techniques that aim for completeness by ignoring or bypassing dependencies lead to unsound execution and false positives. In this paper, we treat dependencies through the lens of a path context, which represents the program state expected by the path as it is executing. We propose an approach that provides better completeness and low false positives using Context Approximation and Refinement (CAR), which combines static constraint analysis and dynamic error recovery to infer a context based on the desired path flow and refine it during execution. We show that the integration of CAR with targeted execution can reach 3.1x more target locations in popular Android applications than the existing state of the art while having a false detection rate of 9%, enabling more complete analysis and detection of security-sensitive behaviors.
papers.abstract_zh: 动态程序分析通常用于审查Android应用程序。一种方法是定向执行，在这种方法中，感兴趣或可疑的代码被特别地定向并被动态地分析。然而，由于它们依赖于应用程序的其他部分，只忠实地执行到达这些目标的路径可能是困难的。先前处理依赖关系的工作必须有利于健全性或完整性，而不利于另一个。依赖于精确依赖性跟踪的技术最终会由于开销而导致较低的目标覆盖率。同时，通过忽略或绕过依赖性来实现完整性的其他技术会导致不健全的执行和误报。在本文中，我们通过路径上下文来处理依赖关系，路径上下文代表了路径在执行时所期望的程序状态。我们提出了一种使用上下文近似和提炼(CAR)来提供更好的完整性和低误报的方法，该方法结合了静态约束分析和动态错误恢复，以基于期望的路径流来推断上下文，并在执行期间提炼它。我们表明，与现有技术相比，CAR与目标执行的集成可以在流行的Android应用程序中多到达3.1倍的目标位置，同时具有9%的错误检测率，从而能够更完整地分析和检测安全敏感行为。
papers.title_zh: 使用（a）汽车驱动在Android应用中执行目标路径

papers.title: PacJam: Securing Dependencies Continuously via Package-Oriented Debloating
papers.authors: Pardis Pashakhanloo, Aravind Machiry, Hyon-Young Choi, Anthony Canino, Kihong Heo, Insup Lee, Mayur Naik
papers.abstract: Real-world software is usually built on top of other software provided as packages that are managed by package managers. Package managers facilitate code reusability and programmer productivity but incur significant software bloat by installing excessive dependent packages. This dependency hell increases potential security issues and hampers rapid response to newly discovered vulnerabilities. We propose a package-oriented debloating framework, PacJam, for adaptive and security-aware management of an application's dependent packages. PacJam improves upon existing debloating techniques by providing a configurable fallback mechanism via post-deployment policies. It also elides the need to completely specify the application's usage scenarios and does not require runtime support. Moreover, PacJam enables to rapidly mitigate newly discovered vulnerabilities with minimal impact on the application's functionality. We evaluate PacJam on 10 popular and diverse Linux applications comprising 575K-39M SLOC each. Compared to a state-of-the-art approach, piecewise debloating, PacJam debloats 66% of the packages per application on average, reducing the attack surface by removing 46% of CVEs and 69% (versus 66%) of gadgets, with significantly less runtime overhead and without the need to install a custom loader.
papers.abstract_zh: 真实世界的软件通常是建立在其他软件之上的，这些软件以包的形式提供，由包管理器管理。包管理器促进了代码的可重用性和程序员的生产力，但是由于安装了过多的依赖包，导致了软件的膨胀。这种依赖性增加了潜在的安全问题，并阻碍了对新发现的漏洞的快速响应。我们提出了一个面向包的去模糊框架PacJam，用于对应用程序的依赖包进行自适应和安全感知的管理。PacJam通过部署后策略提供可配置的回退机制，改进了现有的去模糊技术。它还消除了完全指定应用程序使用场景的需要，并且不需要运行时支持。此外，PacJam能够快速缓解新发现的漏洞，对应用程序的功能影响极小。我们在10个流行的不同Linux应用程序上评估了PacJam，每个应用程序包含575K-39M SLOC。与最先进的分段去模糊方法相比，PacJam平均每个应用程序去模糊66%的包，通过删除46%的CVE和69%(相对于66%)的小工具来减少攻击面，运行时开销显著减少，并且不需要安装自定义加载程序。
papers.title_zh: PACJAM：通过面向包装的去隔板连续确保依赖关系

papers.title: On Measuring Vulnerable JavaScript Functions in the Wild
papers.authors: Maryna Kluban, Mohammad Mannan, Amr M. Youssef
papers.abstract: JavaScript is often rated as the most popular programming language for the development of both client-side and server-side applications, and is currently used in almost all websites. Because of its popularity, JavaScript has become a frequent target for attackers, who exploit vulnerabilities in the source code to take control over the application. To address these JavaScript security issues, such vulnerabilities must be identified first. Existing work mostly deals with package-level vulnerability tracking and measurements. However this approach is limited to detecting usage of already known vulnerabilities. In this paper we develop a vulnerability detection framework that uses vulnerable pattern recognition and textual similarity methods to detect vulnerable functions in real-world projects. We build our framework with the help of a comprehensive dataset of 1,360 verified vulnerable JavaScript functions that we compose based on Snyk vulnerability database and the VulnCode-DB project. Using our framework, we identify 11,148 vulnerable functions in three environments: NPM packages, Chrome web extensions and popular websites. In addition,we conduct an in-depth contextual analysis of the findings in several popular/critical projects and confirm the security exposure of 15 cases. As evident from the results, our approach can shift JavaScript vulnerability detection from the coarse package/library level to function level, and thus improve accuracy of detection and aid timely patching.
papers.abstract_zh: JavaScript通常被认为是开发客户端和服务器端应用程序最流行的编程语言，目前几乎在所有网站上都有使用。由于JavaScript的流行，它已经成为攻击者的常见目标，攻击者利用源代码中的漏洞来控制应用程序。为了解决这些JavaScript安全问题，必须首先识别这些漏洞。现有的工作主要处理包级漏洞跟踪和测量。然而，这种方法仅限于检测已知漏洞的使用。在本文中，我们开发了一个漏洞检测框架，该框架使用漏洞模式识别和文本相似性方法来检测现实项目中的漏洞功能。我们基于Snyk漏洞数据库和VulnCode-DB项目构建了一个包含1，360个经过验证的易受攻击JavaScript函数的综合数据集，并在此基础上构建了我们的框架。使用我们的框架，我们在三个环境中发现了11，148个易受攻击的功能:NPM软件包、Chrome web扩展和热门网站。此外，我们对几个流行/关键项目中的发现进行了深入的上下文分析，并确认了15个案例的安全风险。从结果可以看出，我们的方法可以将JavaScript漏洞检测从粗略的包/库级别转移到函数级别，从而提高检测的准确性并有助于及时打补丁。
papers.title_zh: 测量野外脆弱的JavaScript功能

papers.title: Hunter: HE-Friendly Structured Pruning for Efficient Privacy-Preserving Deep Learning
papers.authors: Yifei Cai, Qiao Zhang, Rui Ning, Chunsheng Xin, Hongyi Wu
papers.abstract: In order to protect user privacy in Machine Learning as a Service (MLaaS), a series of ingeniously designed privacy-preserving frameworks have been proposed. The state-of-the-art approaches adopt Homomorphic Encryption (HE) for linear function and Garbled Circuits (GC)/Oblivious Transfer (OT) for nonlinear operation to improve computation efficiency. Despite the encouraging progress, the computation cost is still too high for practical applications. This work represents the first step to effectively prune privacy-preserving deep learning models to reduce computation complexity. Although model pruning has been discussed extensively in the machine learning community, directly applying the plaintext model pruning schemes offers little help to reduce the computation in privacy-preserving models. In this paper we propose Hunter, a structured pruning method that identifies three novel HE-friendly structures, i.e., internal structure, external structure, and weight diagonal to guide the pruning process. Hunter outputs a pruned model that, without any loss in model accuracy, achieves a significant reduction in HE operations (and thus the overall computation cost) in the privacy-preserving MLaaS. We apply Hunter in various deep learning models, e.g., AlexNet, VGG and ResNet over classic datasets including MNIST, CIFAR-10 and ImageNet. The experimental results demonstrate that, without accuracy loss, Hunter efficiently prunes the original networks to reduce the HE Perm, Mult, and Add operations. For example, in the state-of-the-art VGG-16 on ImageNet with 10 chosen classes, the total number of Perm is reduced to as low as 2% of the original network, and at the same time, Mult and Add are reduced to only 14%, enabling a significantly more computation-efficient privacy-preserving MLaaS.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了在机器学习即服务(MLaaS)中保护用户隐私，人们提出了一系列设计巧妙的隐私保护框架。最新的方法对线性函数采用同态加密(he ),对非线性运算采用乱码电路(GC )/不经意传输(OT ),以提高计算效率。尽管取得了令人鼓舞的进展，但对于实际应用来说，计算成本仍然太高。这项工作代表了有效修剪隐私保护深度学习模型以降低计算复杂性的第一步。尽管在机器学习社区中已经广泛讨论了模型修剪，但是直接应用明文模型修剪方案对于减少隐私保护模型中的计算几乎没有帮助。在本文中，我们提出了Hunter，一种结构化的剪枝方法，该方法识别三种新的HE友好结构，即内部结构、外部结构和权重对角线，以指导剪枝过程。Hunter输出一个修剪模型，该模型在不损失模型精度的情况下，显著减少了隐私保护MLaaS中的运算量(从而减少了总的计算成本)。我们在各种深度学习模型中应用Hunter，例如，在包括MNIST、CIFAR-10和ImageNet在内的经典数据集上的AlexNet、VGG和ResNet。实验结果表明，在不损失精度的情况下，Hunter有效地修剪了原始网络，减少了Perm、Mult和Add运算。例如，在ImageNet上具有10个选择类的最先进的VGG-16中，Perm的总数减少到原始网络的2%,同时，Mult和Add减少到只有14%,从而实现了计算效率显著更高的隐私保护MLaaS。
papers.title_zh: 猎人：他友好的结构化修剪，以高效保护隐私的深度学习

papers.title: FLARE: Defending Federated Learning against Model Poisoning Attacks via Latent Space Representations
papers.authors: Ning Wang, Yang Xiao, Yimin Chen, Yang Hu, Wenjing Lou, Y. Thomas Hou
papers.abstract: Federated learning (FL) has been shown vulnerable to a new class of adversarial attacks, known as model poisoning attacks (MPA), where one or more malicious clients try to poison the global model by sending carefully crafted local model updates to the central parameter server. Existing defenses that have been fixated on analyzing model parameters show limited effectiveness in detecting such carefully crafted poisonous models. In this work, we propose FLARE, a robust model aggregation mechanism for FL, which is resilient against state-of-the-art MPAs. Instead of solely depending on model parameters, FLARE leverages the penultimate layer representations (PLRs) of the model for characterizing the adversarial influence on each local model update. PLRs demonstrate a better capability to differentiate malicious models from benign ones than model parameter-based solutions. We further propose a trust evaluation method that estimates a trust score for each model update based on pairwise PLR discrepancies among all model updates. Under the assumption that honest clients make up the majority, FLARE assigns a trust score to each model update in a way that those far from the benign cluster are assigned low scores. FLARE then aggregates the model updates weighted by their trust scores and finally updates the global model. Extensive experimental results demonstrate the effectiveness of FLARE in defending FL against various MPAs, including semantic backdoor attacks, trojan backdoor attacks, and untargeted attacks, and safeguarding the accuracy of FL.
papers.abstract_zh: 联合学习(FL)已被证明容易受到一种新的敌对攻击，称为模型中毒攻击(MPA)，其中一个或多个恶意客户端试图通过向中央参数服务器发送精心制作的本地模型更新来毒害全局模型。专注于分析模型参数的现有防御措施在检测这种精心制作的有毒模型方面显示出有限的有效性。在这项工作中，我们提出了FLARE，一种健壮的FL模型聚合机制，它对最先进的MPAs具有弹性。FLARE不仅仅依赖于模型参数，而是利用模型的倒数第二层表示(plr)来表征对每个本地模型更新的不利影响。与基于模型参数的解决方案相比，plr在区分恶意模型和良性模型方面表现出了更好的能力。我们还提出了一种信任评估方法，该方法基于所有模型更新之间的成对PLR差异来估计每个模型更新的信任分数。假设诚实的客户端占大多数，FLARE会为每个模型更新分配一个信任分数，而远离良性群集的客户端会被分配较低的分数。然后，FLARE聚合由信任分数加权的模型更新，并最终更新全局模型。大量的实验结果证明了FLARE在防御各种MPAs(包括语义后门攻击、木马后门攻击和无目标攻击)以及保护FL的准确性方面的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 耀斑：通过潜在空间表示捍卫联邦学习抵抗模型中毒攻击

papers.title: Understanding Disparate Effects of Membership Inference Attacks and their Countermeasures
papers.authors: Da Zhong, Haipei Sun, Jun Xu, Neil Zhenqiang Gong, Wendy Hui Wang
papers.abstract: Machine learning algorithms, when applied to sensitive data, can pose severe threats to privacy. A growing body of prior work has demonstrated that membership inference attack (MIA) can disclose whether specific private data samples are present in the training data to an attacker. However, most existing studies on MIA focus on aggregated privacy leakage for an entire population, while leaving privacy leakage across different demographic subgroups (e.g., females and males) in the population largely unexplored. This raises two important issues: (1) privacy unfairness (i.e., if some subgroups are more vulnerable to MIAs than the others); and (2) defense unfairness (i.e., if the defense mechanisms provide more protection to some particular subgroups than the others). In this paper, we investigate both privacy unfairness and defense fairness.We formalize a new notation of privacy-leakage disparity (PLD), which quantifies the disparate privacy leakage of machine learning models to MIA across different subgroups. In terms of privacy unfairness, our empirical analysis of PLD on real-world datasets shows that privacy unfairness exists. The minority subgroups (i.e., the less represented subgroups) tend to have higher privacy leakage. We analyze how subgroup size and subgroup data distribution impact PLD through the lens of model memorization. In terms of defense unfairness, our empirical evaluation shows the existence of unfairness of three state-of-the-art defenses, namely differential privacy, L2-regularizer, and Dropout, against MIA. However, defense unfairness mitigates privacy unfairness as the minority subgroups receive stronger protection than the others. We analyze how the three defense mechanisms affect subgroup data distribution disparately and thus leads to defense unfairness.
papers.abstract_zh: 机器学习算法在应用于敏感数据时，可能会对隐私构成严重威胁。越来越多的先前工作已经证明，成员推理攻击(MIA)可以向攻击者披露训练数据中是否存在特定的私有数据样本。然而，大多数关于MIA的现有研究集中于整个人群的合计隐私泄露，而对人群中不同人口统计亚群体(例如，女性和男性)的隐私泄露基本上未进行研究。这提出了两个重要的问题:(1)隐私不公平(即，如果一些子群比其他子群更容易受到mia的攻击)；以及(2)防御不公平性(即，如果防御机制向一些特定的子群提供比其他子群更多的保护)。在本文中，我们研究隐私不公平和辩护公平。我们形式化了一种新的隐私泄露差异(PLD)符号，该符号将机器学习模型的不同隐私泄露量化为跨不同子群的MIA。在隐私不公平方面，我们在真实数据集上对PLD的实证分析表明，隐私不公平是存在的。少数子群(即，较少代表的子群)倾向于具有更高的隐私泄露。我们从模型记忆的角度分析了子群规模和子群数据分布如何影响PLD。在辩护不公平性方面，我们的实证评估显示了三种最先进的辩护的不公平性，即差分隐私，L2正则化和辍学。然而，防御不公平减轻了隐私不公平，因为少数群体比其他群体受到更强的保护。我们分析了三种防御机制如何不同地影响子群数据分布，从而导致防御不公平。
papers.title_zh: 了解会员推断攻击及其对策的不同影响

papers.title: Generating Content-Preserving and Semantics-Flipping Adversarial Text
papers.authors: Weiping Pei, Chuan Yue
papers.abstract: Natural Language Processing (NLP) models are often vulnerable to semantics-preserving adversarial attacks. That is, they make different semantic predictions on input instances with similar content and semantics. However, it remains unclear to which extent modern NLP models are vulnerable to content-preserving and semantics-flipping (CPSF) adversarial attacks. That is, they would make the same semantic prediction on input instances with similar content but flipped semantics. Attackers can use either semantics-preserving or CPSF adversarial examples to create misunderstanding between humans and models, and incur severe consequences in real-world applications. However, this equally important problem on CPSF adversarial examples has not been studied by researchers yet. In this paper, we perform the first study to investigate CPSF adversarial examples and propose CPSF adversarial attacks to reveal this new type of vulnerability of NLP models. We develop a two-stage approach to generate CPSF adversarial examples. Our experiments on two types of NLP tasks, sentiment analysis and textual entailment, demonstrate that CPSF adversarial examples can successfully fool victim models while preserving the same content with flipped semantics to humans. We further validate the good transferability of CPSF adversarial examples on NLP services of Microsoft and Google. Moreover, we demonstrate that adversarial training can to a meaningful extent mitigate CPSF adversarial attacks. Overall, our work implies that researchers need to improve NLP models' robustness against CPSF adversarial attacks that uniquely exploit the blind spots where NLP models are too insensitive to even big changes in semantics.
papers.abstract_zh: 自然语言处理(NLP)模型经常容易受到保持语义的敌对攻击。也就是说，它们对内容和语义相似的输入实例进行不同的语义预测。然而，目前还不清楚现代NLP模型在多大程度上容易受到内容保留和语义翻转(CPSF)的攻击。也就是说，他们会对内容相似但语义颠倒的输入实例进行相同的语义预测。攻击者可以使用保持语义或CPSF对立的例子来创建人和模型之间的误解，并在现实世界的应用中导致严重的后果。然而，这个同样重要的关于CPSF对立例子的问题还没有被研究者研究过。在本文中，我们进行了第一次研究，调查CPSF对抗性例子，并提出CPSF对抗性攻击，以揭示这种新类型的脆弱性的自然语言处理模型。我们发展了一个两阶段的方法来产生CPSF对立的例子。我们在两种类型的自然语言处理任务上的实验，情感分析和文本蕴涵，证明了CPSF对立例子可以成功地欺骗受害者模型，同时保持对人类具有翻转语义的相同内容。我们进一步验证了CPSF对立例子在微软和谷歌的NLP服务上良好的可移植性。此外，我们证明了对抗性训练可以在很大程度上减轻CPSF对抗性攻击。总的来说，我们的工作意味着研究人员需要提高NLP模型对CPSF对抗性攻击的鲁棒性，这些攻击独特地利用了NLP模型对语义的巨大变化过于不敏感的盲点。
papers.title_zh: 生成内容保存和语义流畅的对抗文本

papers.title: MAB-Malware: A Reinforcement Learning Framework for Blackbox Generation of Adversarial Malware
papers.authors: Wei Song, Xuezixiang Li, Sadia Afroz, Deepali Garg, Dmitry Kuznetsov, Heng Yin
papers.abstract: Modern commercial antivirus systems increasingly rely on machine learning (ML) to keep up with the rampant inflation of new malware. However, it is well-known that machine learning models are vulnerable to adversarial examples (AEs). Previous works have shown that ML malware classifiers are fragile to the white-box adversarial attacks. However, ML models used in commercial antivirus (AV) products are usually not available to attackers and only return hard classification labels. Therefore, it is more practical to evaluate the robustness of ML models and real-world AVs in a pure black-box manner. We propose a black-box Reinforcement Learning (RL) based framework to generate AEs for PE malware classifiers and AV engines. It regards the adversarial attack problem as a multi-armed bandit problem, which finds an optimal balance between exploiting the successful patterns and exploring more varieties. Compared to other frameworks, our improvements lie in three points: 1) limiting the exploration space by modeling the generation process as a stateless process to avoid combination explosions, 2) reusing the successful payload in modeling; and 3) minimizing the changes on AE samples to correctly assign the rewards in RL learning (which also helps identify the root cause of evasions). As a result, our framework has much higher evasion rates than other off-the-shelf frameworks. Results show it has over 74%--97% evasion rate for two state-of-the-art ML detectors and over 32%--48% evasion rate for commercial AVs in a pure black-box setting. We also demonstrate that the transferability of adversarial attacks among ML-based classifiers is higher than that between ML-based classifiers and commercial AVs.
papers.abstract_zh: 现代商业反病毒系统越来越依赖机器学习(ML)来跟上新恶意软件的猖獗蔓延。然而，众所周知，机器学习模型容易受到对立示例(AEs)的攻击。先前的工作已经表明ML恶意软件分类器对于白盒对抗性攻击是脆弱的。然而，商业反病毒(AV)产品中使用的ML模型通常对攻击者不可用，并且仅返回硬分类标签。因此，以纯黑盒的方式评估ML模型和真实世界AVs的鲁棒性更为实际。我们提出了一个基于黑盒强化学习(RL)的框架来为PE恶意软件分类器和反病毒引擎生成AEs。它将对抗性攻击问题视为一个多臂强盗问题，在开发成功模式和探索更多变种之间找到一个最佳平衡。与其他框架相比，我们的改进在于三点:1)通过将生成过程建模为无状态过程来限制探索空间，以避免组合爆炸；2)在建模中重用成功的有效载荷；以及3)最小化AE样本的变化，以正确分配RL学习中的回报(这也有助于识别逃避的根本原因)。因此，我们的框架比其他现成的框架具有更高的规避率。结果表明，在纯黑盒环境下，它对两种最先进的ML检测器的规避率超过74% - 97%，对商用AVs的规避率超过32% - 48%。我们还证明了对抗性攻击在基于最大似然的分类器之间的可转移性高于基于最大似然的分类器和商用AVs之间的可转移性。
papers.title_zh: mab-malware：黑盒生成对抗性恶意软件的加固学习框架

papers.title: Proximity Searchable Encryption for the Iris Biometric
papers.authors: Chloé Cachet, Sohaib Ahmad, Luke Demarest, Ariel Hamlin, Benjamin Fuller
papers.abstract: Biometric databases collect people's information and allow users to perform proximity searches (finding all records within a bounded distance of the query point) with few cryptographic protections. This work studies proximity searchable encryption applied to the iris biometric. Prior work proposed inner product functional encryption as a technique to build proximity biometric databases (Kim et al., SCN 2018). This is because binary Hamming distance is computable using an inner product. This work identifies and closes two gaps to using inner product encryption for biometric search: Biometrics naturally use long vectors often with thousands of bits. Many inner product encryption schemes generate a random matrix whose dimension scales with vector size and have to invert this matrix. As a result, setup is not feasible on commodity hardware unless we reduce the dimension of the vectors. We explore state of the art techniques to reduce the dimension of the iris biometric and show that all known techniques harm the accuracy of the resulting system. That is, for small vector sizes multiple unrelated biometrics are returned in the search. For length 64 vectors, at a 90% probability of the searched biometric being returned, 10% of stored records are erroneously returned on average. Rather than changing the feature extractor, we introduce a new cryptographic technique that allows one to generate several smaller matrices. For vectors of length 1024 this reduces time to run setup from 23 days to 4 minutes. At this vector length, for the same $90%$ probability of the searched biometric being returned, .02% of stored records are erroneously returned on average. Prior inner product approaches leak distance between the query and all stored records. We refer to these as distance-revealing. We show a natural construction from function hiding, secret-key, predicate, inner product encryption (Shen, Shi, and Waters, TCC 2009). Our construction only leaks access patterns, and which returned records are the same distance from the query. We refer to this scheme as distance-hiding. We implement and benchmark one distance-revealing and one distance-hiding scheme. The distance-revealing scheme can search a small (hundreds) database in 4 minutes while the distance-hiding scheme is not yet practical, requiring 3.5 hours.
papers.abstract_zh: 生物数据库收集人们的信息，并允许用户在几乎没有密码保护的情况下执行邻近搜索(查找查询点有限距离内的所有记录)。这项工作研究了邻近搜索加密应用于虹膜生物特征。先前的工作提出了内积函数加密作为构建邻近生物特征数据库的技术(Kim等人，SCN 2018)。这是因为使用内积可以计算二进制汉明距离。这项工作确定并填补了使用内积加密进行生物特征搜索的两个空白:生物特征自然地使用通常具有数千位的长向量。许多内积加密方案生成一个随机矩阵，其维数与向量大小成比例，并且必须对该矩阵求逆。因此，除非我们降低向量的维数，否则在商用硬件上进行设置是不可行的。我们探索了最先进的技术来降低虹膜生物特征的维度，并表明所有已知的技术损害了最终系统的准确性。也就是说，对于小向量大小，在搜索中会返回多个不相关的生物特征。对于长度为64的向量，在返回所搜索的生物特征的概率为90%的情况下，平均10%的存储记录被错误地返回。我们没有改变特征提取器，而是引入了一种新的加密技术，允许生成几个更小的矩阵。对于长度为1024的向量，这将运行设置的时间从23天减少到4分钟。在这种向量长度下，对于返回所搜索的生物特征的相同的90%$概率，平均0.02%的存储记录被错误地返回。先前的内积方法泄漏了查询和所有存储记录之间的距离。我们称之为显示距离。我们展示了一个从函数隐藏，密钥，谓词，内积加密的自然构造(申，石，和沃特斯，TCC 2009)。我们的构造只泄漏访问模式，以及哪些返回的记录与查询的距离相同。我们称这个方案为距离隐藏。我们实现并测试了一个距离显示和一个距离隐藏方案。距离显示方案可以在4分钟内搜索一个小型(数百个)数据库，而距离隐藏方案还不实用，需要3.5小时。
papers.title_zh: 虹膜生物识别的可接近搜索加密

papers.title: SUPERVOICE: Text-Independent Speaker Verification Using Ultrasound Energy in Human Speech
papers.authors: Hanqing Guo, Qiben Yan, Nikolay Ivanov, Ying Zhu, Li Xiao, Eric J. Hunter
papers.abstract: Voice-activated systems are integrated into a variety of desktop, mobile, and Internet-of-Things (IoT) devices. However, voice spoofing attacks, such as impersonation and replay attacks, in which malicious attackers synthesize the voice of a victim or simply replay it, have brought growing security concerns. Existing speaker verification techniques distinguish individual speakers via the spectrographic features extracted from an audible frequency range of voice commands. However, they often have high error rates and/or long delays. In this paper, we explore a new direction of human voice research by scrutinizing the unique characteristics of human speech at the ultrasound frequency band. Our research indicates that the high-frequency ultrasound components (e.g. speech fricatives) from 20 to 48 kHz can significantly enhance the security and accuracy of speaker verification. We propose a speaker verification system, SUPERVOICE that uses a two-stream DNN architecture with a feature fusion mechanism to generate distinctive speaker models. To test the system, we create a speech dataset with 12 hours of audio (8,950 voice samples) from 127 participants. In addition, we create a second spoofed voice dataset to evaluate its security. In order to balance between controlled recordings and real-world applications, the audio recordings are collected from two quiet rooms by 8 different recording devices, including 7 smartphones and an ultrasound microphone. Our evaluation shows that SUPERVOICE achieves 0.58% equal error rate in the speaker verification task, which reduces the best equal error rate of the existing systems by 86.1%. SUPERVOICE only takes 120 ms for testing an incoming utterance, outperforming all existing speaker verification systems. Moreover, within 91 ms processing time, SUPERVOICE achieves 0% equal error rate in detecting replay attacks launched by 5 different loudspeakers. Finally, we demonstrate that SUPERVOICE can be used in retail smartphones by integrating an off-the-shelf ultrasound microphone.
papers.abstract_zh: 语音激活系统被集成到各种桌面、移动和物联网(IoT)设备中。然而，语音欺骗攻击，如模仿和重放攻击，其中恶意攻击者合成受害者的语音或简单重放它，已经带来了越来越多的安全问题。现有的说话人确认技术通过从语音命令的可听频率范围中提取的频谱特征来区分各个说话人。然而，它们通常具有高错误率和/或长延迟。在这篇论文中，我们通过仔细研究超声频段人类语音的独特特征，探索了人类语音研究的一个新方向。我们的研究表明，从20到48 kHz的高频超声分量(例如，语音摩擦音)可以显著增强说话人确认的安全性和准确性。我们提出了一个说话人确认系统SUPERVOICE，它使用了一个双流DNN结构和一个特征融合机制来生成独特的说话人模型。为了测试该系统，我们创建了一个语音数据集，包含来自127名参与者的12小时音频(8，950个语音样本)。此外，我们创建了第二个欺骗语音数据集来评估其安全性。为了在受控录音和现实世界应用之间取得平衡，音频录音是通过8个不同的录音设备从两个安静的房间收集的，包括7个智能手机和一个超声波麦克风。我们的评测表明，SUPERVOICE在说话人确认任务中达到了0.58%的等错误率，将现有系统的最佳等错误率降低了86.1%。SUPERVOICE只需要120毫秒来测试输入的话语，优于所有现有的说话人确认系统。此外，在91毫秒的处理时间内，SUPERVOICE在检测由5个不同扬声器发起的重放攻击时实现了0%的等错误率。最后，我们展示了SUPERVOICE可以通过集成现成的超声波麦克风用于零售智能手机。
papers.title_zh: Supperoice：在人类语音中使用超声波能量的独立扬声器验证

papers.title: Artificial Intelligence Meets Kinesthetic Intelligence: Mouse-based User Authentication based on Hybrid Human-Machine Learning
papers.authors: Shen Fu, Dong Qin, George T. Amariucai, Daji Qiao, Yong Guan, Ann Smiley
