We extensively evaluate IPGuard on CIFAR-10, CIFAR-100, and ImageNet datasets. Our results show that IPGuard can robustly identify post-processed versions of the model owner's classifier as pirated versions of the classifier, and IPGuard can identify classifiers, which are not the model owner's classifier nor its post-processed versions, as non-pirated versions of the classifier.
papers.abstract_zh: 深度神经网络(DNN)分类器代表模型所有者的知识产权，因为训练DNN分类器通常需要大量资源。最近提出水印来保护DNN分类器的知识产权。然而，水印受到一个关键的限制:它牺牲了模型所有者的分类器的实用性/准确性，因为它干扰了分类器的训练或微调过程。在这项工作中，我们提出了IPGuard，第一个方法来保护知识产权的DNN分类器，可证明不会导致分类器的准确性损失。我们的主要观察是DNN分类器可以由其分类边界唯一地表示。基于这种观察，IPGuard提取模型所有者的分类器的分类边界附近的一些数据点，并使用它们来对分类器进行指纹识别。如果DNN分类器为大多数指纹数据点预测了相同的标签，则称其为模型所有者分类器的盗版。IPGuard与水印有质的区别。具体来说，IPGuard提取已经训练过的分类器的分类边界附近的指纹数据点，而水印在分类器的训练或微调过程中将水印嵌入到分类器中。我们在CIFAR-10、CIFAR-100和ImageNet数据集上广泛评估了IPGuard。我们的结果表明，IPGuard可以稳健地将模型所有者的分类器的后处理版本识别为该分类器的盗版版本，并且IPGuard可以将既不是模型所有者的分类器也不是其后处理版本的分类器识别为该分类器的非盗版版本。
papers.title_zh: IPGUARD：通过指纹保护深度神经网络的知识产权

papers.title: A Diversity Index based Scoring Framework for Identifying Smart Meters Launching Stealthy Data Falsification Attacks
papers.authors: Shameek Bhattacharjee, Venkata Praveen Kumar Madhavarapu, Sajal K. Das
papers.abstract: A challenging problem in Advanced Metering Infrastructure (AMI) of smart grids is the identification of smart meters under the control of a stealthy adversary, that inject very low margins of stealthy data falsification. The problem is challenging due to wide legitimate variation in both individual and aggregate trends in real world power consumption data, making such stealthy attacks unrecognizable by existing approaches. In this paper, via proposed modified diversity index scoring metric, we propose a novel information-theory inspired data driven device anomaly classification framework to identify compromised meters launching low margins of stealthy data falsification attacks. Specifically, we draw a parallelism between the effects of data falsification attacks and ecological balance disruptions and identify required mathematical modifications in existing Renyi Entropy and Hill's Diversity Entropy measures. These modifications such as expected self-similarity with weighted abundance shifts across various temporal scales, and diversity order are appropriately embedded in our resulting framework. The resulting diversity index score is used to classify smart meters launching additive, deductive, and alternating switching attack types with high sensitivity (as low as 100W) compared to the existing works that perform poorly at margins of false data below 400W. Our proposed theory is validated with two different real smart meter datasets from USA and Ireland. Experimental results demonstrate successful detection sensitivity from very low to high margins of false data, thus reducing undetectable strategy space of attacks in AMI for an adversary having complete knowledge of our method.
papers.abstract_zh: 在智能电网的高级计量基础设施(AMI)中，一个具有挑战性的问题是在隐形对手的控制下识别智能电表，这使得隐形数据伪造的边际非常低。由于真实世界功耗数据中的个体和总体趋势的广泛合法变化，该问题具有挑战性，使得现有方法无法识别这种秘密攻击。在本文中，通过提出的改进的多样性指数得分度量，我们提出了一种新的信息论启发的数据驱动设备异常分类框架，以识别发起低利润率的秘密数据伪造攻击的受损仪表。具体来说，我们得出了数据篡改攻击和生态平衡破坏之间的平行关系，并确定了现有Renyi熵和Hill多样性熵度量中所需的数学修改。这些修改，如预期的自相似性与不同时间尺度上的加权丰度变化，以及多样性顺序都适当地嵌入到我们的结果框架中。与在400W以下的错误数据边缘表现不佳的现有工作相比，所得到的多样性指数分数用于对智能电表进行高灵敏度(低至100W)的加法、演绎和交替切换攻击类型的分类。我们提出的理论用来自美国和爱尔兰的两个不同的真实智能电表数据集进行了验证。实验结果表明，对于完全了解我们的方法的对手来说，从非常低到高的错误数据边缘的成功检测灵敏度，从而减少了AMI中攻击的不可检测策略空间。
papers.title_zh: 一个基于多样性指数的评分框架，用于识别智能电表启动隐身数据伪造攻击

papers.title: Exploiting the Sensitivity of L2 Adversarial Examples to Erase-and-Restore
papers.authors: Fei Zuo, Qiang Zeng
papers.abstract: By adding carefully crafted perturbations to input images, adversarial examples (AEs) can be generated to mislead neural-network-based image classifiers. L2 adversarial perturbations by Carlini and Wagner (CW) are among the most effective but difficult-to-detect attacks. While many countermeasures against AEs have been proposed, detection of adaptive CW-L2 AEs is still an open question. We find that, by randomly erasing some pixels in an L2 AE and then restoring it with an inpainting technique, the AE, before and after the steps, tends to have different classification results, while a benign sample does not show this symptom. We thus propose a novel AE detection technique, Erase-and-Restore (E&R), that exploits the intriguing sensitivity of L2 attacks. Experiments conducted on two popular image datasets, CIFAR-10 and ImageNet, show that the proposed technique is able to detect over 98% of L2 AEs and has a very low false positive rate on benign images. The detection technique exhibits high transferability: a detection system trained using CW-L2 AEs can accurately detect AEs generated using another L2 attack method. More importantly, our approach demonstrates strong resilience to adaptive L2 attacks, filling a critical gap in AE detection. Finally, we interpret the detection technique through both visualization and quantification.
papers.abstract_zh: 通过向输入图像添加精心制作的扰动，可以生成对立示例(AEs)来误导基于神经网络的图像分类器。由Carlini和Wagner (CW)制造的L2对抗性扰动是最有效但难以检测的攻击之一。虽然已经提出了许多对抗AEs的方法，但是自适应CW-L2 AEs的检测仍然是一个公开的问题。我们发现，通过随机擦除L2 AE中的一些像素，然后用修复技术对其进行恢复，AE在这些步骤之前和之后往往会有不同的分类结果，而良性样本不会显示这种症状。因此，我们提出了一种新的声发射检测技术，擦除和恢复(E&R)，利用L2攻击的耐人寻味的敏感性。在两个流行的图像数据集CIFAR-10和ImageNet上进行的实验表明，所提出的技术能够检测超过98%的L2不良事件，并且对良性图像具有非常低的假阳性率。检测技术表现出高度的可移植性:使用CW-L2 AEs训练的检测系统可以准确地检测使用另一种L2攻击方法产生的AEs。更重要的是，我们的方法显示了强大的适应性L2攻击的弹性，填补了声发射检测的关键空白。最后，我们通过可视化和量化来解释检测技术。
papers.title_zh: 利用L2对抗示例的敏感性对擦除和填充

papers.title: ConAML: Constrained Adversarial Machine Learning for Cyber-Physical Systems
papers.authors: Jiangnan Li, Yingyuan Yang, Jinyuan Stella Sun, Kevin Tomsovic, Hairong Qi
papers.abstract: Recent research demonstrated that the superficially well-trained machine learning (ML) models are highly vulnerable to adversarial examples. As ML techniques are becoming a popular solution for cyber-physical systems (CPSs) applications in research literatures, the security of these applications is of concern. However, current studies on adversarial machine learning (AML) mainly focus on pure cyberspace domains. The risks the adversarial examples can bring to the CPS applications have not been well investigated. In particular, due to the distributed property of data sources and the inherent physical constraints imposed by CPSs, the widely-used threat models and the state-of-the-art AML algorithms in previous cyberspace research become infeasible. We study the potential vulnerabilities of ML applied in CPSs by proposing Constrained Adversarial Machine Learning (ConAML), which generates adversarial examples that satisfy the intrinsic constraints of the physical systems. We first summarize the difference between AML in CPSs and AML in existing cyberspace systems and propose a general threat model for ConAML. We then design a best-effort search algorithm to iteratively generate adversarial examples with linear physical constraints. We evaluate our algorithms with simulations of two typical CPSs, the power grids and the water treatment system. The results show that our ConAML algorithms can effectively generate adversarial examples which significantly decrease the performance of the ML models even under practical constraints.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近的研究表明，表面上训练有素的机器学习(ML)模型非常容易受到对立例子的影响。随着ML技术成为信息物理系统(CPSs)应用的热门解决方案，这些应用的安全性受到关注。然而，目前对对抗性机器学习的研究主要集中在纯网络空间领域。对立的例子可能给CPS应用带来的风险还没有被很好地研究。特别是，由于数据源的分布式特性和CPSs施加的固有物理约束，以前网络空间研究中广泛使用的威胁模型和最先进的AML算法变得不可行。我们通过提出约束对抗机器学习(ConAML)来研究ML在CPSs中应用的潜在脆弱性，con AML生成满足物理系统内在约束的对抗实例。我们首先总结了CPSs中的反洗钱与现有网络空间系统中的反洗钱之间的差异，并提出了一个针对ConAML的通用威胁模型。然后，我们设计了一个尽力搜索算法来迭代地生成具有线性物理约束的对立例子。我们用两个典型的CPS，电网和水处理系统的仿真来评估我们的算法。结果表明，我们的ConAML算法可以有效地生成对立的例子，即使在实际的约束条件下，这些例子也会显著地降低ML模型的性能。
papers.title_zh: CONAML：网络物理系统的受限制机器学习

papers.title: EchoVib: Exploring Voice Authentication via Unique Non-Linear Vibrations of Short Replayed Speech
papers.authors: S. Abhishek Anand, Jian Liu, Chen Wang, Maliheh Shirvanian, Nitesh Saxena, Yingying Chen
papers.abstract: Recent advances in speaker verification and speech processing technology have seen voice authentication being adopted on a wide scale in commercial applications like online banking and customer care support and on devices such as smartphones and IoT voice assistant systems. However, it has been shown that the current voice authentication systems can be ineffective against voice synthesis attacks that mimic a user's voice to high precision. In this work, we suggest a paradigm shift from the traditional voice authentication systems operating in the audio domain but susceptible to speech synthesis attacks (in the same audio domain). We leverage a motion sensor's capability to pick up phonatory vibrations, that can help to uniquely identify a user via voice signatures in the vibration domain. The user's speech is played/echoed back by a device's speaker for a short duration (hence our method is termed EchoVib) and the resulting non-linear phonatory vibrations are picked up by the motion sensor for speaker recognition. The uniqueness of the device's speaker and its accelerometer results in a device-specific fingerprint in response to the echoed speech. The use of the vibration domain and its non-linear relationship with audio allows EchoVib to resist the state-of-the-art voice synthesis attacks, shown to be successful in the audio domain. We develop an instance of EchoVib using the onboard loudspeaker and the accelerometer embedded in smartphones, as the authenticator, based on machine learning techniques. Our evaluation shows that even with the low-quality loudspeaker and the low-sampling rate of accelerometer recordings, EchoVib can identify users with an accuracy of over 90%. We also analyze our system against state-of-art-voice synthesis attacks and show that it can distinguish between the morphed and the original speaker's voice samples, correctly rejecting the morphed samples with a success rate of 85% for voice conversion and voice modeling attacks. We believe that using the vibration domain to detect synthesized speech attacks is effective due to the hardness of preserving the unique phonatory vibration signatures and is difficult to mimic due to the non-linear mapping of the unique speaker and accelerometer response in the vibration domain to the voice in the audio domain.
papers.abstract_zh: 说话人验证和语音处理技术的最新进展使得语音认证在网上银行和客户服务支持等商业应用以及智能手机和物联网语音助理系统等设备上得到广泛采用。然而，已经表明，当前的语音认证系统对于高精度模仿用户语音的语音合成攻击可能是无效的。在这项工作中，我们建议从在音频域中操作但易受语音合成攻击(在同一音频域中)的传统语音认证系统进行范式转变。我们利用运动传感器拾取发声振动的能力，这有助于通过振动领域的声音特征来唯一识别用户。用户的语音由设备的扬声器在短时间内播放/回响(因此我们的方法被称为EchoVib ),由此产生的非线性发声振动被运动传感器拾取，用于扬声器识别。设备扬声器及其加速度计的唯一性导致了响应回声语音的特定于设备的指纹。振动域的使用及其与音频的非线性关系使EchoVib能够抵御最先进的语音合成攻击，这在音频领域表现得非常成功。我们开发了一个EchoVib实例，使用智能手机中嵌入的板载扬声器和加速度计作为认证器，基于机器学习技术。我们的评估表明，即使使用低质量的扬声器和低采样率的加速度计记录，EchoVib也可以识别用户，准确率超过90%。我们还分析了我们的系统对最先进的语音合成攻击，并表明它可以区分变形和原始说话人的语音样本，正确拒绝变形样本，对语音转换和语音建模攻击的成功率为85%。我们相信，使用振动域来检测合成语音攻击是有效的，这是由于保存独特发声振动特征的难度，并且难以模仿，这是由于振动域中独特说话者和加速度计响应到音频域中语音的非线性映射。
papers.title_zh: eChovib：通过简短重播语音的独特非线性振动探索语音身份验证

papers.title: HVAC: Evading Classifier-based Defenses in Hidden Voice Attacks
papers.authors: Yi Wu, Xiangyu Xu, Payton R. Walker, Jian Liu, Nitesh Saxena, Yingying Chen, Jiadi Yu
papers.abstract: Recent years have witnessed the rapid development of automatic speech recognition (ASR) systems, providing a practical voice-user interface for widely deployed smart devices. With the ever-growing deployment of such an interface, several voice-based attack schemes have been proposed towards current ASR systems to exploit certain vulnerabilities. Posing one of the more serious threats,hidden voice attack uses the human-machine perception gap to generate obfuscated/hidden voice commands that are unintelligible to human listeners but can be interpreted as commands by machines. However, due to the nature of hidden voice commands (i.e., normal and obfuscated samples exhibit a significant difference in their acoustic features), recent studies show that they can be easily detected and defended by a pre-trained classifier, thereby making it less threatening. In this paper, we validate that such a defense strategy can be circumvented with a more advanced type of hidden voice attack calledHVAC. Our proposed HVAC attack can easily bypass the existing learning-based defense classifiers while preserving all the essential characteristics of hidden voice attacks (i.e., unintelligible to humans and recognizable to machines). Specifically, we find that all classifier-based defenses build on top of classification models that are trained with acoustic features extracted from the entire audio of normal and obfuscated samples. However, only speech parts (i.e., human voice parts) of these samples contain the useful linguistic information needed for machine transcription. We thus propose a fusion-based method to combine the normal sample and corresponding obfuscated sample as a hybrid HVAC command, which can effectively cheat the defense classifiers. Moreover, to make the command more unintelligible to humans, we tune the speed and pitch of the sample and make it even more distorted in the time domain while ensuring it can still be recognized by machines. Extensive physical over-the-air experiments demonstrate the robustness and generalizability of our HVAC attack under different realistic attack scenarios. Results show that our HVAC commands can achieve an average 94.1% success rate of bypassing machine-learning-based defense approaches under various realistic settings.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，自动语音识别(ASR)系统发展迅速，为广泛部署的智能设备提供了实用的语音用户界面。随着这种接口的不断发展，已经提出了几种针对当前ASR系统的基于语音的攻击方案，以利用某些弱点。隐藏语音攻击是一种更严重的威胁，它利用人机感知差距来生成混淆/隐藏的语音命令，这些命令对人类听众来说是难以理解的，但可以被机器解释为命令。然而，由于隐藏语音命令的性质(即，正常样本和混淆样本在其声学特征上表现出显著差异)，最近的研究表明，它们可以很容易地被预训练的分类器检测和防御，从而使其威胁较小。在本文中，我们验证了这种防御策略可以通过一种更高级的隐藏语音攻击VAC来规避。我们提出的HVAC攻击可以很容易地绕过现有的基于学习的防御分类器，同时保留隐藏语音攻击的所有本质特征(即，人类无法理解而机器可以识别)。具体来说，我们发现所有基于分类器的防御都建立在分类模型之上，这些分类模型是用从正常和混淆样本的整个音频中提取的声学特征来训练的。然而，只有这些样本的语音部分(即，人声部分)包含机器转录所需的有用语言信息。因此，我们提出了一种基于融合的方法，将正常样本和相应的混淆样本合并为一个混合HVAC命令，可以有效地欺骗防御分类器。此外，为了使命令对人类来说更加难以理解，我们调整了样本的速度和音调，并使其在时域中更加失真，同时确保它仍然可以被机器识别。大量的物理空中实验证明了我们的HVAC攻击在不同的实际攻击场景下的鲁棒性和可推广性。结果显示，我们的HVAC命令在各种实际设置下绕过基于机器学习的防御方法的成功率平均为94.1%。
papers.title_zh: HVAC：隐藏语音攻击中逃避基于分类器的防御

papers.title: Conware: Automated Modeling of Hardware Peripherals
papers.authors: Chad Spensky, Aravind Machiry, Nilo Redini, Colin Unger, Graham Foster, Evan Blasband, Hamed Okhravi, Christopher Kruegel, Giovanni Vigna
papers.abstract: Emulation is at the core of many security analyses. However, emulating embedded systems is still not possible in most cases. To facilitate this critical analysis, we present Conware, a hardware emulation framework that can automatically generate models for hardware peripherals, which alleviates one of the major challenges currently hindering embedded systems emulation. Conware enables individual peripherals to be modeled, exported, and combined with other peripherals in a pluggable fashion. Conware achieves this by first obtaining a recording of the low-level hardware interactions between the firmware and the peripheral, using either existing methods or our source-code instrumentation technique. These recordings are then used to create high-fidelity automata representations of the peripheral using novel automata-generation techniques. The various models can then be merged to facilitate full-system emulation of any embedded firmware that uses any of the modeled peripherals, even if that specific firmware or its target hardware was never directly instrumented. Indeed, we demonstrate that Conware is able to successfully emulate a peripheral-heavy firmware binary that was never instrumented, by merging the models of six unique peripherals that were trained on a development board using only the vendor-provided example code.
papers.abstract_zh: 仿真是许多安全分析的核心。然而，在大多数情况下，模拟嵌入式系统仍然是不可能的。为了促进这一关键分析，我们提出了一个硬件仿真框架Conware，它可以自动生成硬件外设的模型，这缓解了当前阻碍嵌入式系统仿真的一个主要挑战。Conware支持对单个外设进行建模、导出，并以可插拔的方式与其他外设相结合。通过使用现有方法或我们的源代码工具技术，首先获得固件和外设之间的低级硬件交互的记录，Conware实现了这一点。这些记录然后被用于使用新颖的自动机生成技术来创建外围设备的高保真自动机表示。然后，可以合并各种模型，以便对使用任何建模外设的任何嵌入式固件进行全系统仿真，即使该特定固件或其目标硬件从未被直接检测。事实上，我们证明，通过合并仅使用供应商提供的示例代码在开发板上训练的六个独特外设的模型，Conware能够成功地模拟从未装备的外设密集型固件二进制文件。
papers.title_zh: CONWARE：硬件外围设备的自动建模

papers.title: Careful Who You Trust: Studying the Pitfalls of Cross-Origin Communication
papers.authors: Gordon Meiser, Pierre Laperdrix, Ben Stock
papers.abstract: In the past, Web applications were mostly static and most of the content was provided by the site itself. Nowadays, they have turned into rich client-side experiences customized for the user where third parties supply a considerable amount of content, e.g., analytics, advertisements, or integration with social media platforms and external services. By default, any exchange of data between documents is governed by the Same-Origin Policy, which only permits to exchange data with other documents sharing the same protocol, host, and port. Given the move to a more interconnected Web, standard bodies and browser vendors have added new mechanisms to enable cross-origin communication, primarily domain relaxation, postMessages, and CORS. While prior work has already shown the pitfalls of not using these mechanisms securely (e.g., omitting origin checks for incoming postMessages), we instead focus on the increased attack surface created by the trust that is necessarily put into the communication partners. We report on a study of the Tranco Top 5,000 to measure the prevalence of cross-origin communication. By analyzing the interactions between sites, we build an interconnected graph of the trust relations necessary to run the Web. Subsequently, based on this graph, we estimate the damage caused through exploitation of existing XSS flaws on trusted sites.
papers.abstract_zh: 过去，Web应用程序大多是静态的，大部分内容都是由网站自己提供的。如今，它们已经变成为用户定制的丰富客户端体验，其中第三方提供大量内容，例如分析、广告或与社交媒体平台和外部服务的集成。默认情况下，文档之间的任何数据交换都由同源策略控制，同源策略只允许与共享相同协议、主机和端口的其他文档交换数据。考虑到向互联程度更高的Web的转移，标准团体和浏览器供应商已经添加了新的机制来实现跨源通信，主要是域放松、后消息和CORS。虽然先前的工作已经显示了不安全地使用这些机制的缺陷(例如，省略对传入的postMessages的来源检查)，但是我们反而关注由必须对通信伙伴的信任所产生的增加的攻击面。我们报告了一项对Tranco Top 5,000的研究，以衡量跨来源沟通的流行程度。通过分析站点之间的交互，我们构建了运行Web所需的信任关系的互连图。随后，基于此图，我们估计了通过利用可信站点上现有的XSS漏洞所造成的损害。
papers.title_zh: 小心您信任的人：研究交叉沟通的陷阱

papers.title: Oversharing Is Not Caring: How CNAME Cloaking Can Expose Your Session Cookies
papers.authors: Assel Aliyeva, Manuel Egele
papers.abstract: In modern web ecosystem, online businesses often leverage third-party web analytics services to gain insights into the behavior of their users. Due to the recent privacy enhancements in major browsers that restrict third-party cookie usage for tracking, these businesses were urged to disguise third-party analytics infrastructure as regular subdomains of their websites [3]. The integration technique referred to as CNAME cloaking allows the businesses to continue monitoring user activity on their websites. However, it also opens up the possibility for severe security infractions as the businesses often share their session cookies with the analytics providers, thus putting online user accounts in danger. Previous work has raised privacy concerns with regards to subdomain tracking and extensively studied the drawbacks of widely used privacy-enhancing browser extensions. In this work, we demonstrate the impact of deploying CNAME cloaking along with lax cookie access control settings on web user security. To this end, we built a system that automatically detects the presence of the disguised third-party domains as well as the leakage of the first-party cookies. Using our system, we identified 2,139 web analytics domains that can be conveniently added to commonly deployed hostbased blacklists. Concerningly, we also found that 27 out of 90 highly sensitive web services (e.g., banks) that we analyzed expose session cookies to the web analytics services.
papers.abstract_zh: 在现代网络生态系统中，在线企业经常利用第三方网络分析服务来洞察用户的行为。由于最近主要浏览器中的隐私增强限制了第三方cookie用于跟踪，这些企业被敦促将第三方分析基础设施伪装成其网站的常规子域[3]。被称为CNAME伪装的集成技术允许企业继续监控他们网站上的用户活动。然而，这也为严重的安全违规打开了可能性，因为企业经常与分析提供商共享他们的会话cookies，从而将在线用户帐户置于危险之中。以前的工作提出了关于子域跟踪的隐私问题，并广泛研究了广泛使用的隐私增强浏览器扩展的缺点。在这项工作中，我们演示了部署CNAME伪装和宽松的cookie访问控制设置对web用户安全性的影响。为此，我们构建了一个系统来自动检测伪装的第三方域的存在以及第一方cookies的泄漏。使用我们的系统，我们确定了2，139个web分析域，可以方便地添加到通常部署的基于主机的黑名单中。令人关注的是，我们还发现，在我们分析的90个高度敏感的web服务(如银行)中，有27个将会话cookies暴露给web分析服务。
papers.title_zh: 过度分享并不关心：Cname披肩如何揭露您的会话cookie

papers.title: P2DPI: Practical and Privacy-Preserving Deep Packet Inspection
papers.authors: Jongkil Kim, Seyit Camtepe, Joonsang Baek, Willy Susilo, Josef Pieprzyk, Surya Nepal
papers.abstract: The amount of encrypted Internet traffic almost doubles every year thanks to the wide adoption of end-to-end traffic encryption solutions such as IPSec, TLS and SSH. Despite all the benefits of user privacy the end-to-end encryption provides, the encrypted internet traffic blinds intrusion detection system (IDS) and makes detecting malicious traffic hugely difficult. The resulting conflict between the user's privacy and security has demanded solutions for deep packet inspection (DPI) over encrypted traffic. The approach of those solutions proposed to date is still restricted in that they require intensive computations during connection setup or detection. For example, BlindBox, introduced by Sherry et al. (SIGCOMM 2015) enables inspection over the TLS-encrypted traffic without compromising users' privacy, but its usage is limited due to a significant delay on establishing an inspected channel. PrivDPI, proposed more recently by Ning et al. (ACM CCS 2019), improves the overall efficiency of BlindBox and makes the inspection scenario more viable. Despite the improvement, we show in this paper that the user privacy of Ning et al.'s PrivDPI can be compromised entirely by the rule generator without involving any other parties, including the middlebox. Having observed the difficulties of realizing efficiency and security in the previous work, we propose a new DPI system for encrypted traffic, named "Practical and Privacy-Preserving Deep Packet Inspection (P2DPI)''. P2DPI enjoys the same level of security and privacy that BlindBox provides. At the same time, P2DPI offers fast setup and encryption and outperforms PrivDPI. Our results are supported by formal security analysis. We implemented our P2DPI and comparable PrivDPI and performed extensive experimentation for performance analysis and comparison.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于IPSec、TLS和SSH等端到端流量加密解决方案的广泛采用，加密的互联网流量几乎每年翻一番。尽管端到端加密提供了用户隐私的所有好处，但加密的互联网流量会蒙蔽入侵检测系统(IDS ),并使检测恶意流量变得非常困难。由此产生的用户隐私和安全之间的冲突需要针对加密流量的深度数据包检测(DPI)的解决方案。迄今为止提出的那些解决方案的方法仍然受到限制，因为它们在连接建立或检测期间需要密集的计算。例如，Sherry等人(SIGCOMM 2015)推出的BlindBox能够在不损害用户隐私的情况下检查TLS加密的流量，但由于建立被检查通道时的显著延迟，其使用受到限制。PrivDPI是由Ning等人最近提出的(ACM CCS 2019)，它提高了BlindBox的整体效率，使检查场景更加可行。尽管有所改进，但我们在本文中表明，Ning等人的PrivDPI的用户隐私可以完全被规则生成器破坏，而不涉及任何其他方，包括中间体。在观察到先前工作中实现效率和安全性的困难之后，我们提出了一种新的用于加密流量的DPI系统，命名为“实用且隐私保护的深度包检测(P2DPI)”。P2DPI享有与BlindBox同等的安全性和隐私性。同时，P2DPI提供快速设置和加密，性能优于PrivDPI。我们的结果得到了正式安全性分析的支持。我们实现了我们的P2DPI和类似的PrivDPI，并进行了大量的性能分析和比较实验。
papers.title_zh: P2DPI：实用和隐私的深数据包检查

papers.title: Camoufler: Accessing The Censored Web By Utilizing Instant Messaging Channels
papers.authors: Piyush Kumar Sharma, Devashish Gosain, Sambuddho Chakravarty
papers.abstract: Free and open communication over the Internet is considered a fundamental human right, essential to prevent repressions from silencing voices of dissent. This has led to the development of various anti-censorship systems. Recent systems have relied on a common blocking resistance strategy i.e., incurring collateral damage to the censoring regimes, if they attempt to restrict such systems. However, despite being promising, systems built on such strategies pose additional challenges, viz., deployment limitations, poor QoS etc. These challenges prevent their wide scale adoption. Thus, we propose a new anti-censorship system, Camoufler, that overcomes aforementioned challenges, while still maintaining similar blocking resistance. Camoufler leverages Instant Messaging (IM) platforms to tunnel client's censored content. This content (encapsulated inside IM traffic) is transported to the Camoufler server (hosted in a free country), which proxies it to the censored website. However, the eavesdropping censor would still observe regular IM traffic being exchanged between the IM peers. Thus, utilizing IM channels as-is for transporting traffic provides unobservability, while also ensuring good QoS, due to its inherent properties such as low-latency message transports. Moreover, it does not pose new deployment challenges. Performance evaluation of Camoufler, implemented on five popular IM apps indicate that it provides sufficient QoS for web browsing. E.g., the median time to render the homepages of Alexa top-1k sites was recorded to be about 3.6s, when using Camoufler implemented over Signal IM application.
papers.abstract_zh: 互联网上的自由和公开交流被视为一项基本人权，对于防止压制不同意见至关重要。这导致了各种反审查系统的发展。最近的系统依赖于普通的阻塞抵抗策略，即，如果它们试图限制这样的系统，则会招致对审查制度的附带损害。然而，尽管前景看好，建立在这种策略上的系统带来了额外的挑战，即。部署限制、较差的QoS等。这些挑战阻碍了它们的广泛采用。因此，我们提出了一个新的反审查系统，Camoufler，它克服了上述挑战，同时仍然保持类似的阻塞阻力。Camoufler利用即时消息(IM)平台来隧道客户端的审查内容。这些内容(封装在IM流量中)被传输到Camoufler服务器(托管在一个自由的国家),该服务器将其代理到被审查的网站。然而，窃听审查员仍然会观察到在IM对等体之间交换的常规IM流量。因此，利用IM信道原样传输流量提供了不可观察性，同时还确保了良好的QoS，这是由于其固有的属性，例如低延迟消息传输。此外，它不会带来新的部署挑战。Camoufler在五个流行的IM应用上的性能评估表明，它为网页浏览提供了足够的服务质量。例如，当使用在信号IM应用上实现的Camoufler时，呈现Alexa top-1k站点的主页的中间时间被记录为大约3.6s。
papers.title_zh: Camoufler：通过使用即时消息传递渠道访问审查的网络

papers.title: Red Alert for Power Leakage: Exploiting Intel RAPL-Induced Side Channels
papers.authors: Zhenkai Zhang, Sisheng Liang, Fan Yao, Xing Gao
papers.abstract: RAPL (Running Average Power Limit) is a hardware feature introduced by Intel to facilitate power management. Even though RAPL and its supporting software interfaces can benefit power management significantly, they are unfortunately designed without taking certain security issues into careful consideration. In this paper, we demonstrate that information leaked through RAPL-induced side channels can be exploited to mount realistic attacks. Specifically, we have constructed a new RAPL-based covert channel using a single AVX instruction, which can exfiltrate data across different boundaries (e.g., those established by containers in software or even CPUs in hardware); and, we have investigated the first RAPL-based website fingerprinting technique that can identify visited webpages with a high accuracy (up to 99% in the case of the regular network using a browser like Chrome or Safari, and up to 81% in the case of the anonymity network using Tor). These two studies form a preliminary examination into RAPL-imposed security implications. In addition, we discuss some possible countermeasures.
papers.abstract_zh: RAPL(运行平均功率限制)是英特尔推出的一项硬件功能，旨在促进电源管理。尽管RAPL及其支持软件接口可以极大地有利于电源管理，但不幸的是，它们在设计时没有仔细考虑某些安全问题。在本文中，我们证明了通过RAPL诱发的侧信道泄漏的信息可以被利用来发动实际的攻击。具体来说，我们使用单个AVX指令构建了一个新的基于RAPL的隐蔽通道，它可以跨越不同的边界(例如，由软件中的容器甚至硬件中的CPU建立的边界)泄漏数据；此外，我们研究了首个基于RAPL的网站指纹识别技术，该技术可以高精度地识别访问过的网页(在使用Chrome或Safari等浏览器的常规网络中高达99%，在使用Tor的匿名网络中高达81%)。这两项研究是对RAPL强加的安全影响的初步审查。此外，我们讨论了一些可能的对策。
papers.title_zh: 电源泄漏的红色警报：利用英特尔RAPL诱导的侧通道

papers.title: PLI-TDC: Super Fine Delay-Time Based Physical-Layer Identification with Time-to-Digital Converter for In-Vehicle Networks
papers.authors: Shuji Ohira, Araya Kibrom Desta, Ismail Arai, Kazutoshi Fujikawa
papers.abstract: Recently, cyberattacks on Controller Area Network (CAN) which is one of the automotive networks are becoming a severe problem. CAN is a protocol for communicating among Electronic Control Units (ECUs) and it is a de-facto standard of automotive networks. Some security researchers point out several vulnerabilities in CAN such as unable to distinguish spoofing messages due to no authentication and no sender identification. To prevent a malicious message injection, at least we should identify the malicious senders by analyzing live messages. In previous work, a delay-time based method called Divider to identify the sender node has been proposed. However, Divider could not identify ECUs which have similar variations because Divider's measurement clock has coarse time-resolution. In addition, Divider cannot adapt a drift of delay-time caused by the temperature drift at the ambient buses. In this paper, we propose a super fine delay-time based sender identification method with Time-to-Digital Converter (TDC). The proposed method achieves an accuracy rate of 99.67% in the CAN bus prototype and 97.04% in a real-vehicle. Besides, in an environment of drifting temperature, the proposed method can achieve a mean accuracy of over 99%.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近，对汽车网络之一的控制器局域网(CAN)的网络攻击正成为一个严重的问题。CAN是用于电子控制单元(ECU)之间通信的协议，并且是汽车网络的事实上的标准。一些安全研究人员指出了CAN中的几个漏洞，例如由于没有认证和没有发送者标识而无法区分欺骗消息。为了防止恶意消息注入，至少我们应该通过分析实时消息来识别恶意发送者。在以前的工作中，已经提出了一种基于延迟时间的方法，称为除法器来识别发送者节点。然而，分频器无法识别具有相似变化的ECU，因为分频器的测量时钟具有粗糙的时间分辨率。此外，分频器无法适应环境总线温度漂移引起的延迟时间漂移。在本文中，我们提出了一种基于时间-数字转换器(TDC)的超精细延迟时间的发送者识别方法。所提出的方法在CAN总线原型中实现了99.67%的准确率，在实车中实现了97.04%的准确率。此外，在温度漂移的环境下，该方法可以达到99%以上的平均准确率。
papers.title_zh: PLI-TDC：超级延迟时间的物理层识别，用于车载网络的时间为数字转换器

papers.title: HECTOR-V: A Heterogeneous CPU Architecture for a Secure RISC-V Execution Environment
papers.authors: Pascal Nasahl, Robert Schilling, Mario Werner, Stefan Mangard
papers.abstract: To ensure secure and trustworthy execution of applications in potentially insecure environments, vendors frequently embed trusted execution environments (TEE) into their systems. Applications executed in this safe, isolated space are protected from adversaries, including a malicious operating system. TEEs are usually build by integrating protection mechanisms directly into the processor or by using dedicated external secure elements. However, both of these approaches only cover a narrow threat model resulting in limited security guarantees. Enclaves nested into the application processor typically provide weak isolation between the secure and non-secure domain, especially when considering side-channel attacks. Although external secure elements do provide strong isolation, the slow communication interface to the application processor is exposed to adversaries and restricts the use cases. Independently of the used approach, TEEs often lack the possibility to establish secure communication to peripherals, and most operating systems executed inside TEEs do not provide state-of-the-art defense strategies, making them vulnerable to various attacks. We argue that TEEs, such as Intel SGX or ARM TrustZone, implemented on the main application processor, are insecure, especially when considering side-channel attacks. In this paper, we demonstrate how a heterogeneous multicore architecture can be utilized to realize a secure TEE design. We directly embed a secure processor into our HECTOR-V architecture to provide strong isolation between the secure and non-secure domain. The tight coupling of the TEE and the application processor enables HECTOR-V to provide mechanisms for establishing secure communication channels between different devices. We further introduce RISC-V Secure Co-Processor (RVSCP), a security-hardened processor tailored for TEEs. To secure applications executed inside the TEE, RVSCP provides hardware enforced control-flow integrity and rigorously restricts I/O accesses to certain execution states. RVSCP reduces the trusted computing base to a minimum by providing operating system services directly in hardware.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了确保在潜在的不安全环境中安全可信地执行应用程序，供应商经常将可信执行环境(TEE)嵌入到他们的系统中。在这个安全、隔离的空间中执行的应用程序受到保护，免受包括恶意操作系统在内的对手的攻击。tee通常通过将保护机制直接集成到处理器中或使用专用的外部安全元件来构建。然而，这两种方法都只覆盖了一个狭窄的威胁模型，导致有限的安全保证。嵌套在应用处理器中的飞地通常在安全域和非安全域之间提供弱隔离，尤其是在考虑旁路攻击时。尽管外部安全元件确实提供了强大的隔离，但与应用处理器的缓慢通信接口会暴露给对手，并限制了用例。独立于所使用的方法，tee通常缺乏与外围设备建立安全通信的可能性，并且在tee内部执行的大多数操作系统不提供最先进的防御策略，使得它们容易受到各种攻击。我们认为，诸如英特尔SGX或ARM TrustZone等在主应用处理器上实现的tee是不安全的，尤其是在考虑侧信道攻击时。在本文中，我们展示了如何利用异构多核架构来实现安全的TEE设计。我们将安全处理器直接嵌入到我们的HECTOR-V架构中，以在安全域和非安全域之间提供强大的隔离。TEE和应用处理器的紧密耦合使HECTOR-V能够提供在不同设备之间建立安全通信通道的机制。我们还推出了RISC-V安全协处理器(RVSCP)，这是一款专为tee定制的安全增强型处理器。为了保护在TEE内部执行的应用程序，RVSCP提供了硬件强制的控制流完整性，并严格限制对特定执行状态的I/O访问。RVSCP通过直接在硬件中提供操作系统服务，将可信计算基础降至最低。
papers.title_zh: Hector-V：用于安全RISC-V执行环境的异构CPU体系结构

papers.title: CrypTag: Thwarting Physical and Logical Memory Vulnerabilities using Cryptographically Colored Memory
papers.authors: Pascal Nasahl, Robert Schilling, Mario Werner, Jan Hoogerbrugge, Marcel Medwed, Stefan Mangard
papers.abstract: Memory vulnerabilities are a major threat to many computing systems. To effectively thwart spatial and temporal memory vulnerabilities, full logical memory safety is required. However, current mitigation techniques for memory safety are either too expensive or trade security against efficiency. One promising attempt to detect memory safety vulnerabilities in hardware is memory coloring, a security policy deployed on top of tagged memory architectures. However, due to the memory storage and bandwidth overhead of large tags, commodity tagged memory architectures usually only provide small tag sizes, thus limiting their use for security applications. Irrespective of logical memory safety, physical memory safety is a necessity in hostile environments prevalent for modern cloud computing and IoT devices. Architectures from Intel and AMD already implement transparent memory encryption to maintain confidentiality and integrity of all off-chip data. Surprisingly, the combination of both, logical and physical memory safety, has not yet been extensively studied in previous research, and a naive combination of both security strategies would accumulate both overheads. In this paper, we propose CrypTag, an efficient hardware/software co-design mitigating a large class of logical memory safety issues and providing full physical memory safety. At its core, CrypTag utilizes a transparent memory encryption engine not only for physical memory safety, but also for memory coloring at hardly any additional costs. The design avoids any overhead for tag storage by embedding memory colors in the upper bits of a pointer and using these bits as an additional input for the memory encryption. A custom compiler extension automatically leverages CrypTag to detect logical memory safety issues for commodity programs and is fully backward compatible. For evaluating the design, we extended a RISC-V processor with memory encryption with CrypTag. Furthermore, we developed a LLVM-based toolchain automatically protecting all dynamic, local, and global data. Our evaluation shows a hardware overhead of less than 1% and an average runtime overhead between 1.5% and 6.1% for thwarting logical memory safety vulnerabilities on a system already featuring memory encryption. Enhancing a system with memory encryption typically induces a runtime overhead between 5% and 109.8% for commercial and open-source encryption units.
papers.abstract_zh: 内存漏洞是许多计算系统的主要威胁。为了有效地防止空间和时间内存漏洞，需要完全的逻辑内存安全。然而，当前的内存安全缓解技术要么过于昂贵，要么在安全性和效率之间进行权衡。检测硬件中内存安全漏洞的一种有希望的尝试是内存着色，这是一种部署在标记内存架构之上的安全策略。然而，由于大标签的存储器存储和带宽开销，商品标签存储器架构通常仅提供小标签大小，因此限制了它们在安全应用中的使用。不考虑逻辑内存安全，物理内存安全在现代云计算和物联网设备普遍存在的恶劣环境中是必要的。英特尔和AMD的架构已经实施了透明内存加密，以保持所有片外数据的机密性和完整性。令人惊讶的是，逻辑和物理内存安全这两者的组合在以前的研究中还没有得到广泛的研究，并且两种安全策略的简单组合会累积两种开销。在本文中，我们提出了CrypTag，一种有效的硬件/软件协同设计，减轻了一大类逻辑存储器安全问题，并提供完全的物理存储器安全。在其核心，CrypTag利用一个透明的内存加密引擎不仅为物理内存安全，而且为内存着色几乎没有任何额外的成本。该设计通过在指针的高位嵌入存储器颜色并使用这些位作为存储器加密的附加输入，避免了标签存储的任何开销。自定义编译器扩展自动利用CrypTag来检测商用程序的逻辑内存安全问题，并且完全向后兼容。为了评估设计，我们使用CrypTag扩展了一个带有存储器加密的RISC-V处理器。此外，我们开发了一个基于LLVM的工具链，可以自动保护所有动态、本地和全局数据。我们的评估显示，在已经采用内存加密的系统上，阻止逻辑内存安全漏洞的硬件开销不到1%，平均运行时开销在1.5%到6.1%之间。对于商业和开源加密单元，使用内存加密增强系统通常会导致5%到109.8%的运行时开销。
papers.title_zh: 加密：使用加密彩色内存来挫败物理和逻辑记忆漏洞

papers.title: Efficient Verifiable Image Redacting based on zk-SNARKs
papers.authors: Hankyung Ko, Ingeun Lee, Seunghwa Lee, Jihye Kim, Hyunok Oh
papers.abstract: Image is a visual representation of a certain fact and can be used as proof of events. As the utilization of the image increases, it is required to prove its authenticity with the protection of its sensitive personal information. In this paper, we propose a new efficient verifiable image redacting scheme based on zk-SNARKs, a commitment, and a digital signature scheme. We adopt a commit-and-prove SNARK scheme which takes commitments as inputs, in which the authenticity can be quickly verified outside the circuit. We also specify relations between the original and redacted images to guarantee the redacting correctness. Our experimental results show that the proposed scheme is superior to the existing works in terms of the key size and proving time without sacrificing the other parameters. The security of the proposed scheme is proven formally.
papers.abstract_zh: 图像是对某一事实的直观表示，可以作为事件的证据。随着图像使用的增加，需要证明其真实性并保护其敏感的个人信息。本文基于zk-SNARKs、承诺和数字签名方案，提出了一种新的有效的可验证图像编辑方案。我们采用了一种提交-证明的SNARK方案，该方案以提交作为输入，其真实性可以在电路之外快速验证。我们还指定了原始图像和编辑图像之间的关系，以保证编辑的正确性。实验结果表明，在不牺牲其他参数的情况下，该方案在密钥长度和证明时间方面优于现有的方案。对所提方案的安全性进行了形式化证明。
papers.title_zh: 基于ZK-SNARKS的有效可验证的图像编辑

papers.title: Secure Role and Rights Management for Automotive Access and Feature Activation
papers.authors: Christian Plappert, Lukas Jäger, Andreas Fuchs
papers.abstract: The trend towards fully autonomous vehicles changes the concept of car ownership drastically. Purchasing a personal car becomes obsolete. Thus, business models related to feature activation are gaining even higher importance for car manufacturers in order to retain their customers. Various recent security incidents demonstrated however that vehicles are a valuable attack goal ranging from illegal access to car features to the theft of the whole vehicles. In this paper, we present a secure access and feature activation system for automotive scenarios that uses a TPM 2.0 as trust anchor within the vehicle to mitigate potential security threats. Our system enables a fine-granular authorization mechanism by utilizing TPM 2.0 enhanced authorization constructs to implement usage restrictions and revocation policies as well as offline rights delegation. The TPM 2.0 acts as a communication end point to the vehicles' environment and integrates seamlessly with already deployed security features of the in-vehicle network. We implemented our concept on a Raspberry Pi as a lightweight equivalent to hardware used in the automotive domain and evaluate our solution by performance measurements.
papers.abstract_zh: 全自动驾驶汽车的趋势彻底改变了汽车所有权的概念。购买私人汽车变得过时了。因此，为了留住客户，与功能激活相关的商业模式对于汽车制造商来说变得更加重要。然而，最近的各种安全事件表明，从非法访问汽车特征到盗窃整辆汽车，车辆都是有价值的攻击目标。在本文中，我们提出了一种用于汽车场景的安全访问和功能激活系统，该系统使用TPM 2.0作为车内的信任锚来减轻潜在的安全威胁。我们的系统通过利用TPM 2.0增强的授权构造来实现使用限制和撤销策略以及离线权限委托，从而实现了细粒度的授权机制。TPM 2.0充当车辆环境的通信端点，并与已经部署的车载网络安全功能无缝集成。我们在Raspberry Pi上实现了我们的概念，作为汽车领域中使用的硬件的轻量级等价物，并通过性能测量来评估我们的解决方案。
papers.title_zh: 安全角色和权利管理用于汽车访问和功能激活

papers.title: Pipa: Privacy-preserving Password Checkup via Homomorphic Encryption
papers.authors: Jie Li, Yamin Liu, Shuang Wu
papers.abstract: Data-breach is not rare on Internet, and once it happens, web users may suffer from privacy leakage and property loss. In order to enable web users to conveniently check whether their confidential information is compromised in data-breach events while preserving their privacy, we design Pipa, which is essentially a special case of private set intersection protocol instantiated with homomorphic encryption. We choose the password checkup scenario for an entry point. In the architecture of Pipa, a server is needed to maintain the database of leaked accounts, namely usernames and passwords, and a homomorphic encryption (HE) module is deployed at the user-end. Once the user issues a checkup query to the server, the HE model encrypts the hash of the user's account information and sends the ciphertexts to the server. The server then evaluates a compare-add-multiply circuit on the ciphertexts and the database, and sends a result ciphertext back to the user-end. Finally the HE module decrypts the result and informs the user if the account information is leaked. The server will never know the username or password, or whether the user's information has matched some entry in the database. We have tested the prototype implementation of Pipa with the Brakerski-Fan-Vercauteren (BFV) HE scheme. By choosing proper parameters, the implementation is pretty practical on PC. For the most light-weight parameter settings in the paper, the total communication volume can be as low as about 2.2MB, and it only takes the server 0.17 seconds to finish the homomorphic computation on encrypted data.
papers.abstract_zh: 数据泄露在互联网上并不罕见，一旦发生，网络用户可能遭受隐私泄露和财产损失。为了使网络用户能够方便地在数据泄露事件中检查他们的机密信息是否被泄露，同时保护他们的隐私，我们设计了Pipa，它本质上是用同态加密实例化的私有集合相交协议的一个特例。我们选择密码检查场景作为入口点。在Pipa的体系结构中，需要一个服务器来维护泄漏账户的数据库，即用户名和密码，并且在用户端部署一个同态加密(he)模块。一旦用户向服务器发出检查查询，he模型就对用户帐户信息的散列进行加密，并将密文发送到服务器。然后，服务器对密文和数据库进行比较-加法-乘法运算，并将结果密文发送回用户端。最后，he模块解密结果，并通知用户帐户信息是否泄漏。服务器永远不会知道用户名或密码，也不会知道用户的信息是否与数据库中的某个条目相匹配。我们已经用布拉克斯基-范-维考特伦(BFV)方案测试了Pipa的原型实现。通过选择适当的参数，该实现在PC机上是相当实用的。对于论文中最轻量级的参数设置，总通信量可以低至2.2MB左右，服务器完成对加密数据的同态计算只需要0.17秒。
papers.title_zh: PIPA：通过同型加密检查隐私密码检查

papers.title: Multi-User Collusion-Resistant Searchable Encryption with Optimal Search Time
papers.authors: Yun Wang, Dimitrios Papadopoulos
papers.abstract: The continued development of cloud computing requires technologies that protect users' data privacy even from the cloud providers themselves. Multi-user searchable encryption is one such kind of technology. It allows a data owner to selectively enable users to perform keyword searches over her encrypted documents that are stored at a cloud server. For privacy purposes, it is important to limit what an adversarial server can infer about the encrypted documents, even if it colludes with some of the users. Clearly, in this case it can learn the content of documents shared with this subset of "corrupted" users, however, it is important to ensure that this collusion does not reveal information about parts of the dataset that are only shared with the remaining "uncorrupted" users via cross-user leakage. In this work, we propose three novel multi-user searchable encryption schemes for this setting that achieve different trade-offs between performance and leakage. Compared to previous ones, our first two schemes are the first to achieve asymptotically optimal search time. Our third scheme achieves minimal user storage and forward privacy with respect to document sharing, but slightly slower search performance. We formally prove the security of our schemes under reasonable assumptions. Moreover, we implement and evaluate their performance both on a single machine and over WAN. Our experimental results are encouraging, e.g., the search computation time is in the order of a few milliseconds.
papers.abstract_zh: 云计算的持续发展需要保护用户数据隐私的技术，即使是对云提供商本身也是如此。多用户可搜索加密就是这样一种技术。它允许数据所有者有选择地让用户对存储在云服务器上的加密文档进行关键字搜索。出于保护隐私的目的，限制敌对服务器对加密文档的推断是很重要的，即使它与某些用户有勾结。显然，在这种情况下，它可以了解与该“被破坏”用户子集共享的文档的内容，然而，重要的是要确保这种共谋不会通过跨用户泄漏而泄露关于仅与剩余“未被破坏”用户共享的数据集部分的信息。在这项工作中，我们提出了三个新的多用户可搜索加密方案，实现了不同的性能和泄漏之间的权衡。与以前的方案相比，我们的前两个方案是第一个实现渐近最优搜索时间的方案。我们的第三个方案在文档共享方面实现了最小的用户存储和前向隐私，但是搜索性能稍慢。我们在合理的假设下正式证明了我们的方案的安全性。此外，我们在单机和广域网上实现并评估了它们的性能。我们的实验结果是令人鼓舞的，例如，搜索计算时间在几毫秒的数量级。
papers.title_zh: 最佳搜索时间的多用户综合可搜索加密

papers.title: HoneyGen: Generating Honeywords Using Representation Learning
papers.authors: Antreas Dionysiou, Vassilis Vassiliades, Elias Athanasopoulos
papers.abstract: Honeywords are false passwords injected in a database for detecting password leakage. Generating honeywords is a challenging problem due to the various assumptions about the adversary's knowledge as well as users' password-selection behaviour. The success of a Honeywords Generation Technique (HGT) lies on the resulting honeywords; the method fails if an adversary can easily distinguish the real password. In this paper, we propose HoneyGen, a practical and highly robust HGT that produces realistic looking honeywords. We do this by leveraging representation learning techniques to learn useful and explanatory representations from a massive collection of unstructured data, i.e., each operator's password database. We perform both a quantitative and qualitative evaluation of our framework using the state-of-the-art metrics. Our results suggest that HoneyGen generates high-quality honeywords that cause sophisticated attackers to achieve low distinguishing success rates.
papers.abstract_zh: 蜜语是注入数据库的假密码，用于检测密码泄露。由于对对手的知识以及用户的密码选择行为的各种假设，生成蜜语是一个具有挑战性的问题。蜜语生成技术(HGT)的成功依赖于产生的蜜语；如果对手能够轻易地辨别出真正的口令，则该方法失败。在这篇文章中，我们提出了HoneyGen，一个实用的和高度健壮的HGT，可以产生逼真的甜言蜜语。我们通过利用表示学习技术从大量非结构化数据(即每个操作员的密码数据库)中学习有用的和解释性的表示来做到这一点。我们使用最先进的指标对我们的框架进行定量和定性评估。我们的结果表明，HoneyGen生成了高质量的蜜语，导致老练的攻击者获得较低的区分成功率。
papers.title_zh: 蜂蜜：使用代表学习生成蜜字

papers.title: On Detecting Deception in Space Situational Awareness
papers.authors: James Pavur, Ivan Martinovic
papers.abstract: Space Situational Awareness (SSA) data is critical to the safe piloting of satellites through an ever-growing field of orbital debris. However, measurement complexity means that most satellite operators cannot independently acquire SSA data and must rely on a handful of centralized repositories operated by major space powers. As interstate competition in orbit increases, so does the threat of attacks abusing these information-sharing relationships. This paper offers one of the first considerations of defense techniques against SSA deceptions. Building on historical precedent and real-world SSA data, we simulate an attack whereby an SSA operator seeks to disguise spy satellites as pieces of debris. We further develop and evaluate a machine-learning based anomaly detection tool which allows defenders to detect 90-98% of deception attempts with little to no in-house astrometry hardware. Beyond the direct contribution of this system, the paper takes a unique interdisciplinary approach, drawing connections between cyber-security, astrophysics, and international security studies. It presents the general case that systems security methods can tackle many novel and complex problems in an historically neglected domain and provides methods and techniques for doing so.
papers.abstract_zh: 空间态势感知数据对于安全驾驶卫星穿越不断扩大的轨道碎片领域至关重要。然而，测量的复杂性意味着大多数卫星运营商无法独立获取空间态势感知数据，而必须依赖由主要空间大国运营的少数中央存储库。随着轨道上国家间竞争的增加，滥用这些信息共享关系的攻击威胁也在增加。本文提供了针对SSA欺骗的防御技术的首要考虑之一。基于历史先例和真实世界的SSA数据，我们模拟了一次攻击，SSA操作员试图将间谍卫星伪装成碎片。我们进一步开发和评估了一种基于机器学习的异常检测工具，该工具允许防御方在很少或没有内部天体测量硬件的情况下检测到90-98%的欺骗企图。除了该系统的直接贡献之外，论文采用了独特的跨学科方法，在网络安全、天体物理学和国际安全研究之间建立了联系。它提出了系统安全方法可以解决历史上被忽视的领域中的许多新颖和复杂问题的一般情况，并提供了这样做的方法和技术。
papers.title_zh: 检测空间情境意识中的欺骗

papers.title: AMEBA: An Adaptive Approach to the Black-Box Evasion of Machine Learning Models
papers.authors: Stefano Calzavara, Lorenzo Cazzaro, Claudio Lucchese
papers.abstract: Machine learning models are vulnerable to evasion attacks, where the attacker starts from a correctly classified instance and perturbs it so as to induce a misclassification. In the black-box setting where the attacker only has query access to the target model, traditional attack strategies exploit a property known as transferability, i.e., the empirical observation that evasion attacks often generalize across different models. The attacker can thus rely on the following two-step attack strategy: (i) query the target model to learn how to train a surrogate model approximating it; and (ii) craft evasion attacks against the surrogate model, hoping that they "transfer" to the target model. This attack strategy is sub-optimal, because it assumes a strict separation of the two steps and under-approximates the possible actions that a real attacker might take. In this work we propose AMEBA, the first adaptive approach to the black-box evasion of machine learning models. AMEBA builds on a well-known optimization problem, known as Multi-Armed Bandit, to infer the best alternation of actions spent for surrogate model training and evasion attack crafting. We experimentally show on public datasets that AMEBA outperforms traditional two-step attack strategies.
papers.abstract_zh: 机器学习模型容易受到规避攻击，攻击者从正确分类的实例开始并干扰它，从而导致错误分类。在攻击者仅具有对目标模型的查询访问权的黑盒设置中，传统的攻击策略利用了被称为可转移性的属性，即，规避攻击通常在不同的模型中一般化的经验观察。因此，攻击者可以依赖以下两步攻击策略:(I)查询目标模型，以了解如何训练近似它的代理模型；以及(ii)对代理模型进行规避攻击，希望它们“转移”到目标模型。这种攻击策略是次优的，因为它假设两个步骤严格分离，并且低估了真正的攻击者可能采取的行动。在这项工作中，我们提出了AMEBA，第一个自适应的机器学习模型的黑盒规避方法。AMEBA建立在一个众所周知的优化问题上，称为多臂土匪，以推断代理模型训练和规避攻击工艺的最佳替代行动。我们在公共数据集上的实验表明，阿米巴优于传统的两步攻击策略。
papers.title_zh: Ameba：一种自适应方法，用于逃避机器学习模型

papers.title: Stealing Deep Reinforcement Learning Models for Fun and Profit
papers.authors: Kangjie Chen, Shangwei Guo, Tianwei Zhang, Xiaofei Xie, Yang Liu
papers.abstract: This paper presents the first model extraction attack against Deep Reinforcement Learning (DRL), which enables an external adversary to precisely recover a black-box DRL model only from its interaction with the environment. Model extraction attacks against supervised Deep Learning models have been widely studied. However, those techniques cannot be applied to the reinforcement learning scenario due to DRL models' high complexity, stochasticity and limited observable information. We propose a novel methodology to overcome the above challenges. The key insight of our approach is that the process of DRL model extraction is equivalent to imitation learning, a well-established solution to learn sequential decision-making policies. Based on this observation, our methodology first builds a classifier to reveal the training algorithm family of the targeted black-box DRL model only based on its predicted actions, and then leverages state-of-the-art imitation learning techniques to replicate the model from the identified algorithm family. Experimental results indicate that our methodology can effectively recover the DRL models with high fidelity and accuracy. We also demonstrate two use cases to show that our model extraction attack can (1) significantly improve the success rate of adversarial attacks, and (2) steal DRL models stealthily even they are protected by DNN watermarks. These pose a severe threat to the intellectual property and privacy protection of DRL applications.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文提出了针对深度强化学习(DRL)的第一种模型提取攻击，这种攻击使得外部对手仅通过与环境的交互就能精确恢复黑盒DRL模型。针对有监督的深度学习模型的模型提取攻击已经被广泛研究。然而，由于DRL模型的高度复杂性、随机性和有限的可观测信息，这些技术不能应用于强化学习场景。我们提出了一种新的方法来克服上述挑战。我们的方法的关键见解是，DRL模型提取的过程相当于模仿学习，这是一种学习序列决策政策的成熟解决方案。基于这一观察，我们的方法首先构建一个分类器，仅基于其预测的动作来揭示目标黑盒DRL模型的训练算法族，然后利用最先进的模仿学习技术来从已识别的算法族中复制模型。实验结果表明，我们的方法可以有效地恢复高保真和高精度的DRL模型。我们还演示了两个用例来说明我们的模型提取攻击可以(1)显著提高对抗攻击的成功率，以及(2)即使DRL模型受到DNN水印的保护，也可以悄悄地窃取它们。这些对DRL应用的知识产权和隐私保护构成了严重威胁。
papers.title_zh: 窃取深厚的加强学习模型以获取乐趣和利润

papers.title: Streamlet: An Absurdly Simple, Textbook Blockchain Protocol
papers.authors: Elaine Shi
papers.abstract: Numerous works in the past have focused on constructing simple and understandable distributed consensus protocols. In this talk, I will present an absurdly simple consensus protocol called Streamlet. The entire protocol is: every epoch, a leader proposes a block extending the longest chain it has seen so far. Everyone votes for (i.e., signs) the first block proposed by the leader if it extends from one of the longest notarized chains they have seen so far. When a block collects votes from 2/3 of the nodes, it becomes notarized. Notarized does not mean final. Finality is decided with the following rule: for any chain in which all blocks are notarized and moreover, the last three blocks have consecutive epoch numbers, the entire chain except the first block is final. Streamlet is inspired by the community's past five years of work on consensus motivated by decentralized blockchains. To the best of our knowledge, it is the simplest embodiment known thus far, and it subsumes classical landmark protocols such as PBFT/Paxos and their numerous variants. It is a great fit for pedagogy. Streamlet has been incorporated into courses at universities such as Stanford and CMU. Streamlet is also part of my new distributed consensus textbook available at http://distributedconsensus.net/ This is joint work with Benjamin Chan.
papers.abstract_zh: 过去的许多工作都集中在构造简单易懂的分布式共识协议上。在这次演讲中，我将提出一个简单得荒谬的共识协议，叫做细流。整个协议是:每一个纪元，一个领导者提出一个区块，扩展到目前为止它所看到的最长的链。如果领导者提出的第一个区块来自他们迄今为止见过的最长的公证链之一，每个人都会投票支持(即签名)。当一个区块收集了2/3节点的投票，它就变成了公证。公证不代表最终。终结性由以下规则决定:对于任何链，其中所有块都被公证，并且最后三个块具有连续的纪元编号，则除了第一个块之外的整个链都是最终的。细流的灵感来自社区过去五年在分散化区块链的推动下在共识方面所做的工作。据我们所知，这是迄今为止已知的最简单的实施例，它包含了经典的里程碑式的协议，如PBFT/Paxos及其众多变体。它非常适合教育学。细流已被纳入斯坦福和CMU等大学的课程。细流也是我的新分布式共识教科书的一部分，可在http://distributedconsensus.net/获得，这是与Benjamin Chan的合作作品。
papers.title_zh: 溪流：荒谬的简单，教科书区块链协议

papers.title: REFIT: A Unified Watermark Removal Framework For Deep Learning Systems With Limited Data
papers.authors: Xinyun Chen, Wenxiao Wang, Chris Bender, Yiming Ding, Ruoxi Jia, Bo Li, Dawn Song
papers.abstract: Training deep neural networks from scratch could be computationally expensive and requires a lot of training data. Recent work has explored different watermarking techniques to protect the pre-trained deep neural networks from potential copyright infringements. However, these techniques could be vulnerable to watermark removal attacks. In this work, we propose REFIT, a unified watermark removal framework based on fine-tuning, which does not rely on the knowledge of the watermarks, and is effective against a wide range of watermarking schemes. In particular, we conduct a comprehensive study of a realistic attack scenario where the adversary has limited training data, which has not been emphasized in prior work on attacks against watermarking schemes. To effectively remove the watermarks without compromising the model functionality under this weak threat model, we propose two techniques that are incorporated into our fine-tuning framework: (1) an adaption of the elastic weight consolidation (EWC) algorithm, which is originally proposed for mitigating the catastrophic forgetting phenomenon; and (2) unlabeled data augmentation (AU), where we leverage auxiliary unlabeled data from other sources. Our extensive evaluation shows the effectiveness of REFIT against diverse watermark embedding schemes. In particular, both EWC and AU significantly decrease the amount of labeled training data needed for effective watermark removal, and the unlabeled data samples used for AU do not necessarily need to be drawn from the same distribution as the benign data for model evaluation. The experimental results demonstrate that our fine-tuning based watermark removal attacks could pose real threats to the copyright of pre-trained models, and thus highlight the importance of further investigating the watermarking problem and proposing more robust watermark embedding schemes against the attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 从头开始训练深度神经网络在计算上可能是昂贵的，并且需要大量的训练数据。最近的工作已经探索了不同的水印技术来保护预训练的深度神经网络免受潜在的版权侵犯。然而，这些技术可能容易受到水印去除攻击。在本文中，我们提出了一个基于微调的统一水印去除框架REFIT，它不依赖于水印的知识，对各种水印方案都是有效的。特别地，我们对一个真实的攻击场景进行了全面的研究，其中对手具有有限的训练数据，这在以前针对水印方案的攻击工作中没有被强调。为了在这种弱威胁模型下有效地去除水印而不损害模型功能，我们提出了两种技术，这两种技术被结合到我们的微调框架中:(1)弹性权重合并(EWC)算法的适应，该算法最初被提出用于减轻灾难性遗忘现象；以及(2)未标记数据扩充(AU)，其中我们利用来自其他来源的辅助未标记数据。我们的广泛评估表明，改装对不同的水印嵌入方案的有效性。特别地，EWC和AU都显著减少了有效水印去除所需的标记训练数据的数量，并且用于AU的未标记数据样本不一定需要从与用于模型评估的良性数据相同的分布中提取。实验结果表明，我们基于微调的水印去除攻击会对预训练模型的版权造成真正的威胁，从而突出了进一步研究水印问题和提出更鲁棒的水印嵌入方案来抵抗攻击的重要性。
papers.title_zh: 翻新：深度学习系统的统一水印框架有限的数据

papers.title: Recompose Event Sequences vs. Predict Next Events: A Novel Anomaly Detection Approach for Discrete Event Logs
papers.authors: Lun-Pin Yuan, Peng Liu, Sencun Zhu
papers.abstract: One of the most challenging problems in the field of intrusion detection is anomaly detection for discrete event logs. While most earlier work focused on applying unsupervised learning upon engineered features, most recent work has started to resolve this challenge by applying deep learning methodology to abstraction of discrete event entries. Inspired by natural language processing, LSTM-based anomaly detection models were proposed. They try to predict upcoming events, and raise an anomaly alert when a prediction fails to meet a certain criterion. However, such a predict-next-event methodology has a fundamental limitation: event predictions may not be able to fully exploit the distinctive characteristics of sequences. This limitation leads to high false positives (FPs). It is also critical to examine the structure of sequences and the bi-directional causality among individual events. To this end, we propose a new methodology: Recomposing event sequences as anomaly detection. We propose DabLog, a LSTM-based Deep Autoencoder-Based anomaly detection method for discrete event Logs. The fundamental difference is that, rather than predicting upcoming events, our approach determines whether a sequence is normal or abnormal by analyzing (encoding) and reconstructing (decoding) the given sequence. Our evaluation results show that our new methodology can significantly reduce the numbers of FPs, hence achieving a higher F1 score.
papers.abstract_zh: 入侵检测领域最具挑战性的问题之一是离散事件日志的异常检测。虽然大多数早期工作侧重于将无监督学习应用于工程特征，但最近的工作已经开始通过将深度学习方法应用于离散事件条目的抽象来解决这一挑战。受自然语言处理的启发，提出了基于LSTM的异常检测模型。他们试图预测即将发生的事件，并在预测不符合特定标准时发出异常警报。然而，这种预测下一个事件的方法有一个基本的限制:事件预测可能无法充分利用序列的独特特征。这种限制会导致很高的误报率(FPs)。检查序列的结构和单个事件之间的双向因果关系也很重要。为此，我们提出了一种新的方法:重组事件序列作为异常检测。我们提出了DabLog，一种基于LSTM的深度自动编码器的离散事件日志异常检测方法。根本的区别在于，我们的方法不是预测即将发生的事件，而是通过分析(编码)和重构(解码)给定的序列来确定序列是正常还是异常。我们的评估结果表明，我们的新方法可以显著减少FPs的数量，从而获得更高的F1分数。
papers.title_zh: 重新组建事件序列与预测下一个事件：一种新型的异常检测方法，用于离散事件日志

papers.title: Robust Roadside Physical Adversarial Attack Against Deep Learning in Lidar Perception Modules
papers.authors: Kaichen Yang, Tzungyu Tsai, Honggang Yu, Max Panoff, Tsung-Yi Ho, Yier Jin
papers.abstract: As Autonomous Vehicles (AVs) mature into viable transportation solutions, mitigating potential vehicle control security risks becomes increasingly important. Perception modules in AVs combine multiple sensors to perceive the surrounding environment. As such, they have been the focus of efforts to exploit the aforementioned risks due to their critical role in controlling autonomous driving technology. Despite extensive and thorough research into the vulnerability of camera-based sensors, vulnerabilities originating from Lidar sensors and their corresponding deep learning models in AVs remain comparatively untouched. Being aware that small roadside objects can be occasionally incorrectly identified as vehicles through on-board deep learning models, we propose a novel adversarial attack inspired by this phenomenon in both white-box and black-box scenarios. The adversarial attacks proposed in this paper are launched against deep learning models that perform object detection tasks through raw 3D points collected by a Lidar sensor in an autonomous driving scenario. In comparison to existing works, our attack creates not only adversarial point clouds in simulated environments, but also robust adversarial objects that can cause behavioral reactions in state of the art autonomous driving systems. Defense methods are then proposed and evaluated against this type of adversarial objects.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着自动驾驶汽车(AVs)成熟成为可行的交通解决方案，减轻潜在的车辆控制安全风险变得越来越重要。AVs中的感知模块结合多个传感器来感知周围环境。因此，由于它们在控制自动驾驶技术中的关键作用，它们一直是利用上述风险的努力的焦点。尽管对基于相机的传感器的脆弱性进行了广泛而彻底的研究，但源自激光雷达传感器及其在AVs中相应的深度学习模型的脆弱性仍然相对未受影响。意识到路边的小物体有时会通过车载深度学习模型被错误地识别为车辆，我们在白盒和黑盒场景中提出了一种受这种现象启发的新的对抗性攻击。本文提出的对抗性攻击是针对深度学习模型发起的，这些模型通过激光雷达传感器在自动驾驶场景中收集的原始3D点来执行对象检测任务。与现有的作品相比，我们的攻击不仅在模拟环境中创建了敌对的点云，而且还创建了健壮的敌对对象，这些对象可以在最先进的自动驾驶系统中引起行为反应。然后提出防御方法，并针对这种类型的敌对对象进行评估。
papers.title_zh: 强大的路边物理对抗攻击对激光雷达感知模块中的深度学习

papers.title: DeepSweep: An Evaluation Framework for Mitigating DNN Backdoor Attacks using Data Augmentation
papers.authors: Han Qiu, Yi Zeng, Shangwei Guo, Tianwei Zhang, Meikang Qiu, Bhavani Thuraisingham
papers.abstract: Public resources and services (e.g., datasets, training platforms, pre-trained models) have been widely adopted to ease the development of Deep Learning-based applications. However, if the third-party providers are untrusted, they can inject poisoned samples into the datasets or embed backdoors in those models. Such an integrity breach can cause severe consequences, especially in safety- and security-critical applications. Various backdoor attack techniques have been proposed for higher effectiveness and stealthiness. Unfortunately, existing defense solutions are not practical to thwart those attacks in a comprehensive way. In this paper, we investigate the effectiveness of data augmentation techniques in mitigating backdoor attacks and enhancing DL models' robustness. An evaluation framework is introduced to achieve this goal. Specifically, we consider a unified defense solution, which (1) adopts a data augmentation policy to fine-tune the infected model and eliminate the effects of the embedded backdoor; (2) uses another augmentation policy to preprocess input samples and invalidate the triggers during inference. We propose a systematic approach to discover the optimal policies for defending against different backdoor attacks by comprehensively evaluating 71 state-of-the-art data augmentation functions. Extensive experiments show that our identified policy can effectively mitigate eight different kinds of backdoor attacks and outperform five existing defense methods. We envision this framework can be a good benchmark tool to advance future DNN backdoor studies.
papers.abstract_zh: 公共资源和服务(例如，数据集、训练平台、预训练模型)已经被广泛采用来简化基于深度学习的应用的开发。但是，如果第三方提供商不可信，他们可以将有毒样本注入数据集或在这些模型中嵌入后门。这种完整性破坏会导致严重的后果，尤其是在安全性和安全性至关重要的应用中。已经提出了各种后门攻击技术来获得更高的有效性和隐蔽性。不幸的是，现有的防御解决方案无法以全面的方式阻止这些攻击。在本文中，我们研究了数据增强技术在减轻后门攻击和增强DL模型健壮性方面的有效性。为实现这一目标，引入了一个评估框架。具体来说，我们考虑一个统一的防御解决方案，它(1)采用数据增强策略来微调受感染的模型，并消除嵌入式后门的影响；(2)使用另一个扩充策略来预处理输入样本，并在推断期间使触发器无效。我们提出了一个系统的方法，通过综合评估71个最先进的数据增强函数来发现防御不同后门攻击的最佳策略。大量的实验表明，我们提出的策略可以有效地缓解八种不同类型的后门攻击，并优于现有的五种防御方法。我们设想这个框架可以成为推进未来DNN借壳研究的一个很好的基准工具。
papers.title_zh: DeepSweep：使用数据增强来减轻DNN后门攻击的评估框架

papers.title: Morshed: Guiding Behavioral Decision-Makers towards Better Security Investment in Interdependent Systems
papers.authors: Mustafa Abdallah, Daniel Woods, Parinaz Naghizadeh, Issa Khalil, Timothy N. Cason, Shreyas Sundaram, Saurabh Bagchi
papers.abstract: We model the behavioral biases of human decision-making in securing interdependent systems and show that such behavioral decision-making leads to a suboptimal pattern of resource allocation compared to non-behavioral (rational) decision-making. We provide empirical evidence for the existence of such behavioral bias model through a controlled subject study with 145 participants. We then propose three learning techniques for enhancing decision-making in multi-round setups. We illustrate the benefits of our decision-making model through multiple interdependent real-world systems and quantify the level of gain compared to the case in which the defenders are behavioral. We also show the benefit of our learning techniques against different attack models. We identify the effects of different system parameters (e.g., the defenders' security budget availability and distribution, the degree of interdependency among defenders, and collaborative defense strategies) on the degree of suboptimality of security outcomes due to behavioral decision-making.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们对人类决策在保护相互依赖的系统中的行为偏差进行了建模，并表明与非行为(理性)决策相比，这种行为决策导致了次优的资源分配模式。我们通过一项有145名参与者的受控受试者研究为这种行为偏差模型的存在提供了经验证据。然后，我们提出了三个学习技巧，以加强多轮设置中的决策。我们通过多个相互依赖的现实世界系统说明了我们的决策模型的好处，并量化了与防御者是行为的情况相比的收益水平。我们还展示了我们的学习技术对不同攻击模型的好处。我们确定了不同系统参数(例如，防御者的安全预算可用性和分配、防御者之间的相互依赖程度以及协作防御策略)对行为决策导致的安全结果次优程度的影响。
papers.title_zh: MORSHED：指导行为决策者在相互依存的系统中更好地进行安全投资

papers.title: Analyzing the Overhead of File Protection by Linux Security Modules
papers.authors: Wenhui Zhang, Peng Liu, Trent Jaeger
papers.abstract: Over the years, the complexity of the Linux Security Module (LSM) is keeping increasing (e.g. 10,684 LOC in Linux v2.6.0 vs. 64,018 LOC in v5.3), and the count of the authorization hooks is nearly doubled (e.g. 122 hooks in v2.6.0 vs. 224 hooks in v5.3). In addition, the computer industry has seen tremendous advancement in hardware (e.g., memory and processor frequency) in the past decade. These make the previous evaluation on LSM, which was done 18 years ago, less relevant nowadays. It is important to provide up-to-date measurement results of LSM for system practitioners so that they can make prudent trade-offs between security and performance. This work evaluates the overhead of LSM for file accesses on Linux v5.3.0. We build a performance evaluation framework for LSM. It has two parts, an extension of LMBench2.5 to evaluate the overhead of file operations for different security modules, and a security module with tunable latency for policy enforcement to study the impact of the latency of policy enforcement on the end-to-end latency of file operations. In our evaluation, we find opening a file would see about 87% (Linux v5.3) performance drop when the kernel is integrated with SELinux hooks (policy enforcement disabled) than without, while the figure was 27% (Linux v2.4.2). We found that the performance of the above downgrade is affected by two parts, policy enforcement, and hook placement. To further investigate the impact of policy enforcement and hook placement respectively, we build a Policy Testing Module, which reuses hook placements of LSM, while alternating latency of policy enforcement. With this module, we are able to quantitatively estimate the impact of the latency of policy enforcement on the end-to-end latency of file operations by using a multiple linear regression model and count policy authorization frequencies for each syscall. We then discuss and justify the evaluation results with static analysis on syscalls' call graphs.
papers.abstract_zh: 多年来，Linux安全模块(LSM)的复杂性不断增加(例如，Linux v2.6.0中的10，684个LOC对v5.3中的64，018个LOC)，授权挂钩的数量几乎翻了一番(例如，v2.6.0中的122个挂钩对v5.3中的224个挂钩)。此外，在过去十年中，计算机行业在硬件(例如，存储器和处理器频率)方面取得了巨大进步。这些使得18年前对LSM的评估变得不那么相关了。为系统从业者提供最新的LSM测量结果非常重要，以便他们能够在安全性和性能之间做出审慎的权衡。这项工作评估了LSM在Linux 5 . 3 . 0上的文件访问开销。我们为LSM构建了一个性能评估框架。它由两部分组成，一部分是对LMBench2.5的扩展，用于评估不同安全模块的文件操作开销，另一部分是用于策略执行的可调延迟安全模块，用于研究策略执行延迟对文件操作端到端延迟的影响。在我们的评估中，我们发现当内核集成了SELinux hooks(禁用策略执行)时，打开一个文件会比没有集成时性能下降87% (Linux v5.3)，而这个数字是27% (Linux v2.4.2)。我们发现，上述降级的性能受两个部分的影响，策略执行和挂钩位置。为了进一步研究策略实施和挂钩放置的影响，我们构建了一个策略测试模块，该模块重用LSM的挂钩放置，同时交替策略实施的延迟。借助此模块，我们可以使用多元线性回归模型定量评估策略实施延迟对文件操作端到端延迟的影响，并统计每个系统调用的策略授权频率。然后，我们通过对系统调用的调用图进行静态分析来讨论和验证评估结果。
papers.title_zh: 通过Linux安全模块分析文件保护的开销

papers.title: Security Analysis on Practices of Certificate Authorities in the HTTPS Phishing Ecosystem
papers.authors: Doowon Kim, Haehyun Cho, Yonghwi Kwon, Adam Doupé, Sooel Son, Gail-Joon Ahn, Tudor Dumitras
papers.abstract: Phishing attacks are causing substantial damage albeit extensive effort in academia and industry. Recently, a large volume of phishing attacks transit toward adopting HTTPS, leveraging TLS certificates issued from Certificate Authorities (CAs), to make the attacks more effective. In this paper, we present a comprehensive study on the security practices of CAs in the HTTPS phishing ecosystem. We focus on the CAs, critical actors under-studied in previous literature, to better understand the importance of the security practices of CAs and thwart the proliferating HTTPS phishing. In particular, we first present the current landscape and effectiveness of HTTPS phishing attacks comparing to traditional HTTP ones. Then, we conduct an empirical experiment on the CAs' security practices in terms of the issuance and revocation of the certificates. Our findings highlight serious conflicts between the expected security practices of CAs and reality, raising significant security concerns. We further validate our findings using a longitudinal dataset of abusive certificates used for real phishing attacks in the wild. We confirm that the security concerns of CAs prevail in the wild and these concerns can be one of the main contributors to the recent surge of HTTPS phishing attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 尽管学术界和工业界付出了巨大的努力，但网络钓鱼攻击正在造成巨大的损失。最近，大量网络钓鱼攻击转向采用HTTPS，利用证书颁发机构(ca)颁发的TLS证书，使攻击更加有效。在本文中，我们对HTTPS网络钓鱼生态系统中的CAs安全实践进行了全面的研究。为了更好地理解CAs安全实践的重要性并阻止HTTPS网络钓鱼的蔓延，我们将重点放在ca上，这是以前文献中研究不足的关键因素。特别是，我们首先介绍了与传统HTTP攻击相比，HTTPS网络钓鱼攻击的现状和有效性。然后，我们从证书的颁发和撤销方面对ca的安全实践进行了实证实验。我们的发现强调了CAs的预期安全实践与现实之间的严重冲突，提出了重大的安全问题。我们进一步验证了我们的发现使用一个纵向数据集的滥用证书用于真正的网络钓鱼攻击在野外。我们确认，ca的安全问题普遍存在，这些问题可能是最近HTTPS网络钓鱼攻击激增的主要原因之一。
papers.title_zh: HTTPS网络钓鱼生态系统中证书授权的实践的安全分析

papers.title: ARGUS: Assessing Unpatched Vulnerable Devices on the Internet via Efficient Firmware Recognition
papers.authors: Wei Xie, Chao Zhang, Pengfei Wang, Zhenhua Wang, Qiang Yang
papers.abstract: Assessing unpatched devices affected by a specified vulnerability is a vital but unsolved issue. Using a proof-of-concept tool on the Internet is illegal, while identifying vulnerable device models and firmware versions via fingerprints is a safer method. However, device search engines such as Shodan do not claim to accurately identify device models or versions, and existing works on firmware online recognition neglect the efficiency challenge of scanning redundant fingerprints. Consequently, this fingerprint-checking method has few real-world verifications on the Internet. We propose ARGUS, a simple but practical framework to identify device models and firmware versions. At its core is a heuristic fingerprint crush saga (FCS) scheme inspired by the phone game "Candy Crush Saga". It can improve efficiency by an average of 156 times compared to scanning fingerprints of all web files by default. This efficiency improvement enables us to widely assess the proportion of unpatched devices affected by 176 CVE vulnerabilities, which is 64.3% on average on the Internet. This result quantitatively proves that the majority of users do not periodically update device firmware.
papers.abstract_zh: 评估受特定漏洞影响的未打补丁的设备是一个重要但尚未解决的问题。在互联网上使用概念验证工具是非法的，而通过指纹识别易受攻击的设备型号和固件版本是一种更安全的方法。然而，Shodan等设备搜索引擎并没有声称可以准确识别设备型号或版本，现有的固件在线识别工作忽略了扫描冗余指纹的效率挑战。因此，这种指纹检查方法在互联网上很少得到现实世界的验证。我们提出ARGUS，一个简单但实用的框架来识别设备型号和固件版本。其核心是一个启发式指纹粉碎传奇(FCS)方案，灵感来自手机游戏“糖果粉碎传奇”。与默认扫描所有web文件的指纹相比，它可以将效率平均提高156倍。这种效率提升使我们能够广泛评估受176个CVE漏洞影响的未打补丁设备的比例，在互联网上平均为64.3%。这个结果定量地证明了大多数用户不定期更新设备固件。
papers.title_zh: Argus：通过有效的固件识别来评估Internet上未列出的弱势设备

papers.title: Filtering DDoS Attacks from Unlabeled Network Traffic Data Using Online Deep Learning
papers.authors: Wesley Joon-Wie Tann, Jackie Tan Jin Wei, Joanna Purba, Ee-Chien Chang
papers.abstract: DDoS attacks are simple, effective, and still pose a significant threat even after more than two decades. Given the recent success in machine learning, it is interesting to investigate how we can leverage deep learning to filter out application layer attack requests. There are challenges in adopting deep learning solutions due to the ever-changing profiles, the lack of labeled data, and constraints in the online setting. Offline unsupervised learning methods can sidestep these hurdles by learning an anomaly detector N from the normal-day traffic N. However, anomaly detection does not exploit information acquired during attacks, and their performance typically is not satisfactory. In this paper, we propose two approaches that utilize both the historic N and the mixture M traffic obtained during attacks, consisting of unlabeled requests. First, our proposed approach, inspired by statistical methods, extends an unsupervised anomaly detector N to solve the problem using estimated conditional probability distributions. We adopt transfer learning to apply N on N and M separately and efficiently, combining the results to obtain an online learner. Second, we formulate a specific loss function more suited for deep learning and use iterative training to solve it in the online setting. On publicly available datasets, such as the CICIDS2017, our online learners achieve an average of 90.6% accuracy rates compared to the baseline detection method, which achieves around 60.0% accuracy. In the offline setting, our approaches on unlabeled data achieve competitive accuracy compared to classifiers trained on labeled data.
papers.abstract_zh: DDoS攻击简单、有效，甚至在二十多年后仍构成重大威胁。鉴于最近在机器学习方面的成功，研究我们如何利用深度学习来过滤应用层攻击请求是一件有趣的事情。由于不断变化的概况、标记数据的缺乏以及在线设置的限制，采用深度学习解决方案存在挑战。离线无监督学习方法可以通过从正常日流量N中学习异常检测器N来绕过这些障碍。然而，异常检测不利用攻击期间获得的信息，并且它们的性能通常不令人满意。在本文中，我们提出了两种方法，利用了在攻击过程中获得的历史N和混合M流量，由未标记的请求组成。首先，我们提出的方法，受统计方法的启发，扩展了一个无监督的异常检测器N来解决使用估计的条件概率分布的问题。我们采用迁移学习来分别有效地将N应用于N和M，合并结果以获得在线学习器。其次，我们制定了一个更适合深度学习的特定损失函数，并使用迭代训练在在线设置中求解它。在公开可用的数据集上，如CICIDS2017，我们的在线学习者平均达到90.6%的准确率，而基线检测方法的准确率约为60.0%。在离线设置中，我们对未标记数据的方法与对标记数据训练的分类器相比获得了竞争的准确性。
papers.title_zh: 使用在线深度学习从未标记的网络流量数据中过滤DDOS攻击

papers.title: Bypassing Push-based Second Factor and Passwordless Authentication with Human-Indistinguishable Notifications
papers.authors: Mohammed Jubur, Prakash Shrestha, Nitesh Saxena, Jay Prakash
papers.abstract: Second factor (2FA) or passwordless authentication based on notifications pushed to a user's personal device (e.g., a phone) that the user can simply approve (or deny) has become widely popular due to its convenience. In this paper, we show that the effortlessness of this approach gives rise to a fundamental design vulnerability. The vulnerability stems from the fact that the notification, as shown to the user, is not uniquely bound to the user's login session running through the browser, and thus if two notifications are sent around the same time (one for the user's session and one for an attacker's session), the user may not be able to distinguish between the two, likely ending up accepting the notification of the attacker's session. Exploiting this vulnerability, we present HIENA, a simple yet devastating attack against such "one-push" 2FA or passwordless schemes, which can allow a malicious actor to login soon after the victim user attempts to login triggering multiple near-concurrent notifications that seem indistinguishable to the user. To further deceive the user into accepting the attacker-triggered notification, HIENA can optionally spoof/mimic the victim's client machine information (e.g., the city from which the victim logs in, by being in the same city) and even issue other third-party notifications (e.g., email or social media) for obfuscation purposes. In case of 2FA schemes, we assume that the attacker knows the victim's password (e.g., obtained via breached password databases), a standard methodology to evaluate the security of any 2FA scheme. To evaluate the effectiveness of HIENA, we carefully designed and ran a human factors lab study where we tested benign and adversarial settings mimicking the user interface designs of well-known one-push 2FA and passwordless schemes. Our results show that users are prone to accepting attacker's notification in HIENA with high rates, about 83% overall and about 99% upon using spoofed information, which is almost similar to the rates of acceptance of benign login sessions. Even for the non-spoofed sessions (our primary attack), the attack success rates are about 68%, which go up to about 90-97% if the attack attempt is repeated 2-3 times. While we did not see a statistically significant effect of using third-party notifications on attack success rate, in real-life, the use of such obfuscation can be quite effective as users may only see one single 2FA notification (corresponding to attacker's session) on top of the notifications list which is most likely to be accepted. We have verified that many widely deployed one-push 2FA schemes (e.g., Duo Push, Authy OneTouch, LastPass, Facebook's and OpenOTP) seem directly vulnerable to our attack.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于推送到用户的个人设备(例如，电话)的通知的第二因素(2FA)或无密码认证，用户可以简单地批准(或拒绝)，由于其便利性而变得广泛流行。在本文中，我们表明，这种方法的努力导致了一个基本的设计漏洞。该漏洞源于这样一个事实，即向用户显示的通知并不唯一地绑定到用户通过浏览器运行的登录会话，因此，如果大约同时发送两个通知(一个针对用户会话，一个针对攻击者会话)，用户可能无法区分这两个通知，最终可能会接受攻击者会话的通知。利用这一漏洞，我们提出了HIENA，这是一种针对这种“一推式”2FA或无密码方案的简单而毁灭性的攻击，它可以允许恶意参与者在受害用户尝试登录后立即登录，从而触发用户看似无法区分的多个近乎并发的通知。为了进一步欺骗用户接受攻击者触发的通知，HIENA可以选择性地欺骗/模仿受害者的客户端机器信息(例如，受害者登录的城市，在同一城市)，甚至发布其他第三方通知(例如，电子邮件或社交媒体)以达到混淆目的。在2FA方案的情况下，我们假设攻击者知道受害者的密码(例如，通过被攻破的密码数据库获得)，这是评估任何2FA方案的安全性的标准方法。为了评估HIENA的有效性，我们精心设计并运行了一项人为因素实验室研究，在该研究中，我们模拟众所周知的一键2FA和无密码方案的用户界面设计，测试了良性和对抗性设置。我们的结果表明，在HIENA中，用户倾向于以较高的比率接受攻击者的通知，总体约为83%,在使用欺骗信息时约为99%,这几乎与良性登录会话的接受率相似。即使对于非欺骗会话(我们的主要攻击)，攻击成功率也约为68%，如果攻击尝试重复2-3次，成功率会上升到约90-97%。虽然我们没有看到使用第三方通知对攻击成功率的统计显著影响，但在现实生活中，使用这种混淆可能非常有效，因为用户可能只会在最有可能被接受的通知列表顶部看到一个2FA通知(对应于攻击者的会话)。我们已经证实，许多广泛部署的单推2FA方案(例如，Duo Push、Authy OneTouch、LastPass、脸书和OpenOTP)似乎直接容易受到我们的攻击。
papers.title_zh: 绕过基于推动的第二个因素和无密码的身份验证

papers.title: Click This, Not That: Extending Web Authentication with Deception
papers.authors: Timothy Barron, Johnny So, Nick Nikiforakis
papers.abstract: With phishing attacks, password breaches, and brute-force login attacks presenting constant threats, it is clear that passwords alone are inadequate for protecting the web applications entrusted with our personal data. Instead, web applications should practice defense in depth and give users multiple ways to secure their accounts. In this paper we propose login rituals, which define actions that a user must take to authenticate, and web tripwires, which define actions that a user must not take to remain authenticated. These actions outline expected behavior of users familiar with their individual setups on applications they use often. We show how we can detect and prevent intrusions from web attackers lacking this familiarity with their victim's behavior. We design a modular and application-agnostic system that incorporates these two mechanisms, allowing us to add an additional layer of deception-based security to existing web applications without modifying the applications themselves. Next to testing our system and evaluating its performance when applied to five popular open-source web applications, we demonstrate the promising nature of these mechanisms through a user study. Specifically, we evaluate the detection rate of tripwires against simulated attackers, 88% of whom clicked on at least one tripwire. We also observe web users' creation of personalized login rituals and evaluate the practicality and memorability of these rituals over time. Out of 39 user-created rituals, all of them are unique and 79% of users were able to reproduce their rituals even a week after creation.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着网络钓鱼攻击、密码泄露和暴力登录攻击不断带来威胁，很明显，单靠密码不足以保护托管我们个人数据的web应用程序。相反，web应用程序应该进行深度防御，并为用户提供多种方法来保护他们的帐户。在本文中，我们提出了登录习惯，它定义了用户进行身份验证必须采取的行动，以及web tripwires，它定义了用户为保持身份验证而不得采取的行动。这些操作概述了熟悉他们经常使用的应用程序的个人设置的用户的预期行为。我们展示了如何检测和防止缺乏对受害者行为了解的网络攻击者的入侵。我们设计了一个模块化的、与应用程序无关的系统，它结合了这两种机制，允许我们在不修改应用程序本身的情况下，向现有的web应用程序添加一个额外的基于欺骗的安全层。接下来测试我们的系统并评估其在应用于五个流行的开源web应用程序时的性能，我们通过用户研究展示了这些机制的前景。具体来说，我们评估了针对模拟攻击者的绊网检测率，其中88%的攻击者至少点击了一条绊网。我们还观察了网络用户创建的个性化登录习惯，并随着时间的推移评估这些习惯的实用性和可记忆性。在39个用户创建的仪式中，所有的都是独一无二的，79%的用户能够在创建一周后重现他们的仪式。
papers.title_zh: 单击此，不是：扩展Web身份验证使用欺骗

papers.title: Analyzing Spatial Differences in the TLS Security of Delegated Web Services
papers.authors: Joonhee Lee, Hyunwoo Lee, Jongheon Jeong, Doowon Kim, Ted Taekyoung Kwon
papers.abstract: To provide secure content delivery, Transport Layer Security (TLS) has become a de facto standard over a couple of decades. However, TLS has a long history of security weaknesses and drawbacks. Thus, the security of TLS has been enhanced by addressing security problems through continuous version upgrades. Meanwhile, to provide fast content delivery globally, websites (or origin web servers) need to deploy and administer many machines in globally distributed environments. They often delegate the management of machines to web hosting services or content delivery networks (CDNs), where the security configurations of distributed servers may vary spatially depending on the managing entities or locations. Based on these spatial differences in TLS security, we find that the security level of TLS connections (and their web services) can be lowered. After collecting the information of (web) domains that exhibit different TLS versions and cryptographic options depending on clients' locations, we show that it is possible to redirect TLS handshake messages to weak TLS servers, which both the origin server and the client may not be aware of.
