However, the training of the models has been historically limited to only those features available at runtime. In this paper, we consider an alternate learning approach that trains models using privileged information--features available at training time but not at runtime--to improve the accuracy and resilience of detection systems. In particular, we adapt and extend recent advances in knowledge transfer, model influence, and distillation to enable the use of forensic or other data unavailable at runtime in a range of security domains. An empirical evaluation shows that privileged information increases precision and recall over a system with no privileged information: we observe up to 7.7% relative decrease in detection error for fast-flux bot detection, 8.6% for malware traffic detection, 7.3% for malware classification, and 16.9% for face recognition. We explore the limitations and applications of different privileged information techniques in detection systems. Such techniques provide a new means for detection systems to learn from data that would otherwise not be available at runtime.
papers.abstract_zh: 超过四分之一世纪以来，检测系统一直由从真实或模拟环境中收集的输入特征中学习的模型驱动。人工产物(例如，网络事件、潜在恶意软件样本、可疑电子邮件)基于其与运行时学习到的模型的相似性被视为恶意或非恶意。然而，模型的训练在历史上仅限于运行时可用的那些特征。在本文中，我们考虑了一种替代学习方法，该方法使用特权信息(在训练时可用但在运行时不可用的特征)来训练模型，以提高检测系统的准确性和弹性。特别是，我们调整并扩展了知识转移、模型影响和提炼方面的最新进展，以支持在一系列安全领域中使用运行时不可用的取证或其他数据。经验评估表明，与没有特权信息的系统相比，特权信息提高了精确度和召回率:我们观察到fast-flux bot检测的检测错误相对减少了7.7%，恶意软件流量检测的相对减少了8.6%，恶意软件分类的相对减少了7.3%，人脸识别的相对减少了16.9%。我们探讨了不同的特权信息技术在检测系统中的限制和应用。这种技术为检测系统提供了一种新的手段来从运行时无法获得的数据中学习。
papers.title_zh: 在特权信息下检测

papers.title: Entwining Sanitization and Personalization on Databases
papers.authors: Sébastien Gambs, Julien Lolive, Jean-Marc Robert
papers.abstract: In the last decade, a lot of research has been done to prevent the illegal distribution of digital content, % in the context in which the proprietary content is a medium such as musical works and movies. However, only few works have tackled this problem for databases, and even less for databases containing personal and sensitive information (\emphe.g, a medical database). In this work, we address this latter issue by proposing øuralgo\ (for Sanitization and Personalization of Databases ), an approach in which the owner of a database personalizes it before distributing it to ensure that a malicious buyer can be traced back in case of an illegal redistribution. Our novel solution entwines the personalization step with a sanitization mechanism to prevent the leak of personal information and limit the privacy risks. Thus, our objective is to release a sanitized and personalized database, both to protect the privacy of the concerned individuals and to prevent the illegal redistribution, even from a collusion of malicious buyers.
papers.abstract_zh: 在过去的十年中，在专有内容是诸如音乐作品和电影之类的媒体的情况下，已经进行了许多研究来防止数字内容的非法分发。然而，只有很少的作品针对数据库解决了这个问题，针对包含个人和敏感信息的数据库(例如，医学数据库)就更少了。在这项工作中，我们通过提出“数据库的净化和个性化”来解决后一个问题，这是一种数据库所有者在分发数据库之前对其进行个性化的方法，以确保在非法再分发的情况下可以追踪到恶意购买者。我们的新颖解决方案将个性化步骤与净化机制结合在一起，以防止个人信息泄露并限制隐私风险。因此，我们的目标是发布一个经过净化的个性化数据库，既保护相关个人的隐私，又防止非法再分发，甚至防止恶意购买者的共谋。
papers.title_zh: 将消毒和个性化在数据库上

papers.title: Large-Scale Privacy-Preserving Statistical Computations for Distributed Genome-Wide Association Studies
papers.authors: Oleksandr Tkachenko, Christian Weinert, Thomas Schneider, Kay Hamacher
papers.abstract: We present privacy-preserving solutions for Genome-Wide Association Studies (GWAS) based on Secure Multi-Party Computation (SMPC). Using SMPC, we protect the privacy of patients when medical institutes collaborate for computing statistics on genomic data in a distributed fashion. Previous solutions for this task lack efficiency and/or use inadequate algorithms that are of limited practical value. Concretely, we optimize and implement multiple algorithms for the χ^2 $-, G-, and P-test in the ABY framework (Demmler et al., NDSS»15) and evaluate them in a distributed GWAS scenario. Statistical tests generally require advanced mathematical operations. For operations that cannot be calculated in integer arithmetic, we make use of the existing IEEE 754 floating point arithmetic implementation in ABY (Demmler et al., CCS»15). To improve performance, we extend the mixed-protocol capabilities of ABY by optimizing and implementing the integer to floating point conversion protocols of Aliasgari et al.\ (NDSS»13), which may be of independent interest. Furthermore, we consider extended contingency tables for the χ^2$- and G-test that use codeword counts instead of counts for only two alleles, thereby allowing for advanced, realistic analyses. Finally, we consider an outsourcing scenario where two non-colluding semi-trusted third parties process secret-shared input data from multiple institutes. Our extensive evaluation shows, compared to the prior art of Constable et al.\ (BMC Medical Informatics and Decision Making»15), an improved run-time efficiency of the χ^2 $-test by up to factor 37x. We additionally demonstrate practicality in scenarios with millions of participants and hundreds of collaborating institutes.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了基于安全多方计算(SMPC)的全基因组关联研究(GWAS)的隐私保护解决方案。通过使用SMPC，当医疗机构以分布式方式协作计算基因组数据的统计数据时，我们保护了患者的隐私。针对该任务的先前解决方案缺乏效率和/或使用了实用价值有限的不适当的算法。具体来说，我们在ABY框架(Demmler等人，NDSS 15)中优化并实现了χ^2 ＄-、G-和p-测试的多种算法，并在分布式GWAS场景中对它们进行了评估。统计测试通常需要高级数学运算。对于不能用整数算法计算的运算，我们利用ABY现有的IEEE 754浮点算法实现(Demmler等人，CCS 15)。为了提高性能，我们通过优化和实现Aliasgari等人(NDSS 13)的整数到浮点转换协议来扩展ABY的混合协议能力，这可能是独立的利益。此外，我们考虑扩展χ^2$-和g-检验的列联表，使用码字计数而不是仅两个等位基因的计数，从而允许高级的、现实的分析。最后，我们考虑一个外包场景，其中两个非共谋的半可信第三方处理来自多个机构的秘密共享输入数据。我们的广泛评估表明，与Constable等人的现有技术(BMC医学信息学和决策制定15)相比，χ^2检验的运行效率提高了37倍。我们还在有数百万参与者和数百个合作机构的场景中展示了实用性。
papers.title_zh: 针对分布式基因组关联研究的大规模保护隐私统计计算

papers.title: Secure Similar Sequence Query on Outsourced Genomic Data
papers.authors: Ke Cheng, Yantian Hou, Liangmin Wang
papers.abstract: The growing availability of genomic data is unlocking research potentials on genomic-data analysis. It is of great importance to outsource the genomic-analysis tasks onto clouds to leverage their powerful computational resources over the large-scale genomic sequences. However, the remote placement of the data raises personal-privacy concerns, and it is challenging to evaluate data-analysis functions on outsourced genomic data securely and efficiently. In this work, we study the secure similar-sequence-query (SSQ) problem over outsourced genomic data, which has not been fully investigated. To address the challenges of security and efficiency, we propose two protocols in the mixed form, which combine two-party secure secret sharing, garbled circuit, and partial homomorphic encryptions together and use them to jointly fulfill the secure SSQ function. In addition, our protocols support multi-user queries over a joint genomic data set collected from multiple data owners, making our solution scalable. We formally prove the security of protocols under the semi-honest adversary model, and theoretically analyze the performance. We use extensive experiments over real-world dataset on a commercial cloud platform to validate the efficacy of our proposed solution, and demonstrate the performance improvements compared with state-of-the-art works.
papers.abstract_zh: 基因组数据可用性的增长释放了基因组数据分析的研究潜力。将基因组分析任务外包到云上以利用其在大规模基因组序列上的强大计算资源是非常重要的。然而，数据的远程放置引发了个人隐私问题，并且安全有效地评估外包基因组数据的数据分析功能具有挑战性。在这项工作中，我们研究了外包基因组数据的安全相似序列查询(SSQ)问题，这还没有被充分调查。为了解决安全和效率的挑战，我们提出了两个混合形式的协议，它们将两方安全秘密共享、乱码电路和部分同态加密结合在一起，共同实现安全SSQ功能。此外，我们的协议支持多用户查询从多个数据所有者收集的联合基因组数据集，使我们的解决方案具有可扩展性。我们在半诚实敌手模型下形式化地证明了协议的安全性，并从理论上分析了协议的性能。我们在商业云平台上的真实数据集上进行了大量实验，以验证我们提出的解决方案的有效性，并展示了与最先进的作品相比的性能改进。
papers.title_zh: 在外包基因组数据上确保类似的序列查询

papers.title: A Linear Distinguisher and its Application for Analyzing Privacy-Preserving Transformation Used in Verifiable (Outsourced) Computation
papers.authors: Liang Zhao, Liqun Chen
papers.abstract: A distinguisher is employed by an adversary to explore the privacy property of a cryptographic primitive. If a cryptographic primitive is said to be private, there is no distinguisher algorithm that can be used by an adversary to distinguish the encodings generated by this primitive with non-negligible advantage. Recently, two privacy-preserving matrix transformations first proposed by Salinas et al. have been widely used to achieve the matrix-related verifiable (outsourced) computation in data protection. Salinas et al. proved that these transformations are private (in terms of indistinguishability). In this paper, we first propose the concept of a linear distinguisher and two constructions of the linear distinguisher algorithms. Then, we take those two matrix transformations (including Salinas et al.$'$s original work and Yu et al.$'$s modification) as example targets and analyze their privacy property when our linear distinguisher algorithms are employed by the adversaries. The results show that those transformations are not private even against passive eavesdropping.
papers.abstract_zh: 对手使用区分器来探索加密原语的隐私属性。如果说一个加密原语是私有的，那么对手就无法使用任何区分算法来以不可忽略的优势区分该原语生成的编码。最近，Salinas等人首先提出的两种隐私保护矩阵变换被广泛用于实现数据保护中的矩阵相关可验证(外包)计算。萨利纳斯等人证明了这些转换是私有的(就不可区分性而言)。在本文中，我们首先提出了线性鉴别器的概念和线性鉴别器算法的两种构造。然后，我们以这两种矩阵变换(包括Salinas等人的原始工作和Yu等人的修改)为例，分析了当我们的线性鉴别算法被对手利用时它们的隐私性。结果表明，即使在被动窃听的情况下，这些变换也不是私有的。
papers.title_zh: 线性区分及其用于分析可验证（外包）计算中使用的隐私转换的应用

papers.title: FBSleuth: Fake Base Station Forensics via Radio Frequency Fingerprinting
papers.authors: Zhou Zhuang, Xiaoyu Ji, Taimin Zhang, Juchuan Zhang, Wenyuan Xu, Zhenhua Li, Yunhao Liu
papers.abstract: Fake base station (FBS) crime is a type of wireless communication crime that has appeared recently. The key to enforcing the laws on regulating FBS based crime is not only to arrest but also to convict criminals effectively. Much work on FBS discovering, localization, and tracking can assist the arresting, but the problem of collecting evidence accurately to support a proper conviction has not been addressed yet. To fill in the gap of enforcing the laws on FBS crimes, we design FBSleuth, an FBS crime forensics framework utilizing "radio frequency (RF) fingerprints'', e.g., the unique characteristics of the FBS transmitters embedded in the electromagnetic signals. Essentially, such fingerprints stem from the imperfections in hardware manufacturing and thus represent a consistent bond between an individual FBS device and its committed crime. We model the RF fingerprint from the subtle variance of the modulation errors, instantaneous frequency, and phases of the RF signals. Our validation of FBSleuth on six FBSes from four cities over more than 5 months shows that FBSleuth can achieve over 99% precision, 96.4% recall, and 97.94% F1 score in a dynamic wild environment.
papers.abstract_zh: 伪基站犯罪是近年来出现的一种无线通信犯罪。执行管制基于FBS的犯罪的法律的关键不仅在于逮捕，而且在于有效地将罪犯定罪。许多关于FBS发现、定位和跟踪的工作可以帮助逮捕，但是准确收集证据以支持适当定罪的问题还没有解决。为了填补FBS犯罪执法方面的空白，我们设计了FBSleuth，这是一个利用“射频(RF)指纹”的FBS犯罪取证框架，例如嵌入电磁信号中的FBS发射器的独特特征。本质上，这种指纹源于硬件制造中的缺陷，因此代表了单个FBS设备与其所犯罪行之间的一致联系。我们从RF信号的调制误差、瞬时频率和相位的细微变化来模拟RF指纹。我们对来自四个城市的六个FBS进行了超过5个月的验证，结果表明FBSleuth在动态的野外环境中可以达到99%以上的准确率、96.4%的召回率和97.94%的F1值。
papers.title_zh: FBSLEUTH：假基站取证通过射频指纹识别

papers.title: Augmenting Telephone Spam Blacklists by Mining Large CDR Datasets
papers.authors: Jienan Liu, Babak Rahbarinia, Roberto Perdisci, Haitao Du, Li Su
papers.abstract: Telephone spam has become an increasingly prevalent problem in many countries all over the world. For example, the US Federal Trade Commission's (FTC) National Do Not Call Registry's number of cumulative complaints of spam/scam calls reached 30.9 million submissions in 2016. Naturally, telephone carriers can play an important role in the fight against spam. However, due to the extremely large volume of calls that transit across large carrier networks, it is challenging to mine their vast amounts of call detail records (CDRs) to accurately detect and block spam phone calls. This is because CDRs only contain high-level metadata (e.g., source and destination numbers, call start time, call duration, etc.) related to each phone calls. In addition, ground truth about both benign and spam-related phone numbers is often very scarce (only a tiny fraction of all phone numbers can be labeled). More importantly, telephone carriers are extremely sensitive to false positives, as they need to avoid blocking any non-spam calls, making the detection of spam-related numbers even more challenging. In this paper, we present a novel detection system that aims to discover telephone numbers involved in spam campaigns. Given a small seed of known spam phone numbers, our system uses a combination of unsupervised and supervised machine learning methods to mine new, previously unknown spam numbers from large datasets of call detail records (CDRs). Our objective is not to detect all possible spam phone calls crossing a carrier's network, but rather to expand the list of known spam numbers while aiming for zero false positives, so that the newly discovered numbers may be added to a phone blacklist, for example. To evaluate our system, we have conducted experiments over a large dataset of real-world CDRs provided by a leading telephony provider in China, while tuning the system to produce no false positives. The experimental results show that our system is able to greatly expand on the initial seed of known spam numbers by up to about 250%.
papers.abstract_zh: 电话垃圾邮件已经成为世界上许多国家日益普遍的问题。例如，2016年，美国美国联邦贸易委员会(FTC)全国不要打电话登记处对垃圾邮件/诈骗电话的累计投诉数量达到3090万次。自然，电话运营商可以在打击垃圾邮件的斗争中发挥重要作用。然而，由于在大型运营商网络中传输的呼叫量非常大，因此挖掘其大量的呼叫详细记录(cdr)以准确检测和阻止垃圾电话呼叫是一项挑战。这是因为cdr仅包含高级元数据(例如，源号码和目的号码、呼叫开始时间、呼叫持续时间等。)相关的每一个电话。此外，关于良性和垃圾邮件相关的电话号码的基本事实通常非常稀少(所有电话号码中只有极小一部分可以被标记)。更重要的是，电话运营商对误报非常敏感，因为他们需要避免阻止任何非垃圾邮件呼叫，这使得检测垃圾邮件相关号码更加困难。在本文中，我们提出了一种新颖的检测系统，旨在发现垃圾邮件活动中涉及的电话号码。给定一小部分已知的垃圾电话号码，我们的系统使用无监督和有监督的机器学习方法的组合，从大量的呼叫详细记录(cdr)数据集中挖掘新的、以前未知的垃圾电话号码。我们的目标不是检测运营商网络中所有可能的垃圾电话，而是扩大已知垃圾电话号码的列表，同时实现零误报，以便新发现的号码可以添加到电话黑名单中。为了评估我们的系统，我们在中国一家领先的电话提供商提供的真实世界cdr的大数据集上进行了实验，同时调整系统以不产生误报。实验结果表明，我们的系统能够在已知垃圾邮件数量的初始种子上大大扩展高达大约250%。
papers.title_zh: 通过挖掘大型CDR数据集来增强电话垃圾邮件黑名单

papers.title: Towards Measuring the Role of Phone Numbers in Twitter-Advertised Spam
papers.authors: Payas Gupta, Roberto Perdisci, Mustaque Ahamad
papers.abstract: The telephony channel has become an attractive target for cyber criminals, who are using it to craft a variety of attacks. In addition to delivering voice and messaging spam, this channel is also being used to lure victims into calling phone numbers that are controlled by the attackers. One way this is done is by aggressively advertising phone numbers on social media (e.g., Twitter). This form of spam is then monetized over the telephony channel, via messages/calls made by victims. We refer to this type of attacks as outgoing phone communication (OPC) attacks. By collecting approximately 70M tweets containing over 5,786 phone numbers over a period of 14 months, we are able to measure properties of multiple spam campaigns, including well-known tech support scams. Our contributions include a novel data collection technique that amplifies tweets containing phone numbers, clustering of tweets that are part of a given OPC attack campaign, and brief analysis of particularly interesting campaigns. We also show that some of the campaigns we analyze appear to attempt to avoid account suspension by Twitter, by including reputable URLs in their tweets. In fact, we find that Twitter suspended only about 3.5% of the accounts that participated in the top 15 spam campaigns we measured. Our results not only demonstrate a new kind of abuse exploiting the telephony channel but also show the potential benefits of using phone numbers to fight spam on Twitter.
papers.abstract_zh: 电话信道已经成为网络罪犯的一个有吸引力的目标，他们利用它来策划各种各样的攻击。除了发送语音和垃圾信息，这种渠道还被用来引诱受害者拨打攻击者控制的电话号码。实现这一点的一种方式是通过在社交媒体(例如，Twitter)上大肆宣传电话号码。然后，这种形式的垃圾邮件通过受害者发出的消息/电话，在电话渠道上被货币化。我们将这种类型的攻击称为呼出电话通信(OPC)攻击。通过在14个月内收集约7000万条包含超过5786个电话号码的推文，我们能够衡量多种垃圾邮件活动的性质，包括众所周知的技术支持诈骗。我们的贡献包括一种新颖的数据收集技术，可以放大包含电话号码的推文，对属于特定OPC攻击活动的推文进行聚类，并对特别有趣的活动进行简要分析。我们还表明，我们分析的一些活动似乎试图通过在推文中包含有信誉的URL来避免Twitter暂停帐户。事实上，我们发现Twitter只暂停了大约3.5%参与我们测量的前15名垃圾邮件活动的账户。我们的研究结果不仅展示了一种利用电话渠道的新的滥用，还展示了在Twitter上使用电话号码打击垃圾邮件的潜在好处。
papers.title_zh: 旨在衡量电话号码在Twitter宣传的垃圾邮件中的作用

papers.title: Use-After-FreeMail: Generalizing the Use-After-Free Problem and Applying it to Email Services
papers.authors: Daniel Gruss, Michael Schwarz, Matthias Wübbeling, Simon Guggi, Timo Malderle, Stefan More, Moritz Lipp
papers.abstract: Use-after-free is a type of vulnerability commonly present in software written in memory-unsafe languages like C or C++, where a program frees a memory buffer too early. By placing counterfeit structures at the freed memory location, an attacker can leak information or gain execution control upon subsequent access. In this paper, we show that the concept of use-after-free can be generalized to any environment and situation where resources can be silently exchanged. As an instance of our generalization we demonstrate Use-After-FreeMail attacks. Use-After-FreeMail attacks gather email addresses from publicly available database leaks. The fully automated quantitative analysis brought to light that 33.5% of all free-mail addresses we tested are not valid anymore. In two user studies with 100 and 31 participants we found that 11-19% of users are affected by our attack. In qualitative case studies we investigated what information can be gained in Use-After-FreeMail attacks, e.g., payment information, and how far currently used accounts can be compromised (identity theft). Finally, drawing the connection between mitigations against traditional use-after-free scenarios and the Use-After-FreeMail scenario, we provide a concise list of recommendations to free-mail providers and users as a protection against use-after-free attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 释放后使用(Use-after-free)是用内存不安全语言(如C或C++)编写的软件中常见的一种漏洞，在这种情况下，程序会过早地释放内存缓冲区。通过在释放的内存位置放置伪造的结构，攻击者可以泄漏信息或在后续访问时获得执行控制。在本文中，我们证明了免费后使用的概念可以推广到任何环境和情况下，资源可以无声地交换。作为我们推广的一个实例，我们演示了释放邮件后使用攻击。免费邮件后使用攻击从公开的数据库漏洞中收集电子邮件地址。全自动定量分析显示，我们测试的所有免费邮件地址中有33.5%不再有效。在有100名和31名参与者的两项用户研究中，我们发现11-19%的用户受到我们攻击的影响。在定性案例研究中，我们调查了在免费邮件后使用攻击中可以获得哪些信息，例如支付信息，以及当前使用的帐户可能受到多大程度的危害(身份盗窃)。最后，在针对传统的释放后使用场景和释放后使用场景的缓解措施之间建立联系，我们向免费邮件提供商和用户提供了一个简明的建议列表，作为针对释放后使用攻击的保护。
papers.title_zh: 使用后邮件：概括无用后的问题并将其应用于电子邮件服务

papers.title: Temporal Consistency of Integrity-Ensuring Computations and Applications to Embedded Systems Security
papers.authors: Xavier Carpent, Karim Eldefrawy, Norrathep Rattanavipanon, Gene Tsudik
papers.abstract: Assuring integrity of information (e.g., data and/or software) is usually accomplished by cryptographic means, such as hash functions or message authentication codes (MACs). Computing such integrity-ensuring functions can be time-consuming if the amount of input data is large and/or the computing platform is weak. At the same time, in real-time or safety-critical settings, it is often impractical or even undesirable to guarantee atomicity of computing a time-consuming integrity-ensuring function. Meanwhile, standard correctness and security definitions of such functions assume that input data (regardless of its size) remains consistent throughout computation. However, temporal consistency may be lost if another process interrupts execution of an integrity-ensuring function and modifies portions of input that either or both: (1) were already processed, or (2) were not processed yet. Lack of temporal consistency might yield an integrity result that is non-sensical or simply incorrect. Such subtleties and discrepancies between (implicit) assumptions in definitions and implementations can be a source of inconsistenceies, which might lead to vulnerabilities. In this paper, we systematically explore the notion of temporal consistency of cryptographic integrity-ensuring functions. We show that its lack in implementations of such functions can lead to inconsistent results and security violations in protocols and systems using them, e.g., remote attestation, remote updates and secure resets. We consider several mechanisms that guarantee temporal consistency of implementations of integrity-ensuring functions in embedded systems with a focus on remote attestation. We also assess performance of proposed mechanisms on two commodity hardware platforms: I.MX6-SabreLite and ODROID-XU4.
papers.abstract_zh: 确保信息(例如，数据和/或软件)的完整性通常通过加密手段来实现，例如散列函数或消息认证码(MAC)。如果输入数据量很大和/或计算平台很弱，计算这种完整性保证函数可能很耗时。同时，在实时或安全关键设置中，保证计算耗时的完整性保证函数的原子性通常是不切实际的，甚至是不期望的。同时，这种函数的标准正确性和安全性定义假设输入数据(不管其大小)在整个计算过程中保持一致。然而，如果另一个进程中断完整性保证函数的执行并修改输入的一部分或两者:(1)已经被处理，或(2)还没有被处理，则时间一致性可能丢失。缺乏时间一致性可能会产生无意义或不正确的完整性结果。定义和实现中(隐含的)假设之间的这种微妙和差异可能是不一致的来源，这可能导致漏洞。在本文中，我们系统地探讨了密码完整性保证函数的时间一致性的概念。我们表明，在这些功能的实现中缺乏它会导致不一致的结果和使用它们的协议和系统中的安全违规，例如远程证明、远程更新和安全重置。我们考虑在嵌入式系统中保证完整性保证功能实现的时间一致性的几种机制，重点是远程证明。我们还在两个商用硬件平台上评估了所提出机制的性能:I.MX6-SabreLite和ODROID-XU4。
papers.title_zh: 嵌入式系统安全性的正直计算和应用程序的时间一致性

papers.title: SALAD: Secure and Lightweight Attestation of Highly Dynamic and Disruptive Networks
papers.authors: Florian Kohnhäuser, Niklas Büscher, Stefan Katzenbeisser
papers.abstract: Today, tiny embedded Internet of Things (IoT) devices are increasingly used in safety- and privacy-critical application scenarios. In many of these scenarios, devices perform a certain task collectively as a swarm. Remote attestation is an important cornerstone for the security of these IoT devices, as it allows to verify the integrity of the software on remote devices. Recently proposed collective attestation protocols are able to attest entire device swarms in an efficient way. However, these protocols are inefficient or even inapplicable when devices in the network are mobile or lack continuous connectivity. This work presents SALAD, the first collective attestation protocol for highly dynamic and disruptive networks. SALAD uses a novel distributed approach, where devices incrementally establish a common view on the integrity of all devices in the network. In contrast to existing protocols, SALAD performs well in highly dynamic and disruptive network topologies, increases resilience against targeted Denial of Service (DoS) attacks, and allows to obtain the attestation result from any device. Moreover, SALAD is capable of mitigating physical attacks in an efficient manner, which is achieved by adapting and extending recently proposed aggregation schemes. We demonstrate the security of SALAD and show its effectiveness by providing large-scale simulation results.
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，微型嵌入式物联网(IoT)设备越来越多地用于安全和隐私关键的应用场景。在许多这样的场景中，设备作为一个群体集体执行某个任务。远程证明是这些物联网设备安全性的重要基石，因为它允许验证远程设备上软件的完整性。最近提出的集体证明协议能够以有效的方式证明整个设备群。然而，当网络中的设备是移动的或者缺乏连续连接时，这些协议是低效的或者甚至是不适用的。这项工作提出了沙拉，第一个集体证明协议的高度动态和破坏性的网络。SALAD使用了一种新颖的分布式方法，在这种方法中，设备会逐渐建立一个关于网络中所有设备完整性的公共视图。与现有协议相比，SALAD在高度动态和破坏性的网络拓扑中表现良好，增加了针对目标拒绝服务(DoS)攻击的弹性，并允许从任何设备获得证明结果。此外，沙拉能够以有效的方式减轻物理攻击，这是通过适应和扩展最近提出的聚集方案来实现的。我们演示了沙拉的安全性，并通过提供大规模仿真结果来展示其有效性。
papers.title_zh: 沙拉：高度动态和破坏性网络的安全和轻巧的证明

papers.title: Can You Trust Your Encrypted Cloud?: An Assessment of SpiderOakONE's Security
papers.authors: Anders P. K. Dalskov, Claudio Orlandi
papers.abstract: This paper presents an independent security review of a popular encrypted cloud storage service (ECS) SpiderOakONE. Contrary to previous work analyzing similar programs, we formally define a minimal security requirements for confidentiality in ECS which takes into account the possibility that the ECS actively turns against its users in an attempt to break the confidentiality of the users» data. Our analysis uncovered several serious issues, which either directly or indirectly damage the confidentiality of a user»s files, therefore breaking the claimed Zero- or No-Knowledge property (i.e., the claim that even the ECS itself cannot access the users» data). After responsibly disclosing the issues we found to SpiderOak, most have been fixed.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文对流行的加密云存储服务SpiderOakONE进行了独立的安全评估。与以前分析类似程序的工作相反，我们正式定义了ECS机密性的最低安全要求，它考虑了ECS主动背叛其用户试图破坏用户数据机密性的可能性。我们的分析揭示了几个严重的问题，这些问题直接或间接地破坏了用户文件的机密性，从而打破了声称的零知识或一无所知的属性(即，声称即使是ECS本身也不能访问用户数据)。在负责任地向SpiderOak披露了我们发现的问题后，大多数问题已经得到了解决。
papers.title_zh: 您能相信您的加密云吗？：评估蜘蛛侠的安全性

papers.title: On the Strategy and Behavior of Bitcoin Mining with N-attackers
papers.authors: Hanqing Liu, Na Ruan, Rongtian Du, Weijia Jia
papers.abstract: Selfish mining is a well-known mining attack strategy discovered by Eyal and Sirer in 2014. After that, the attackers' strategy has been further discussed by many other works, which analyze the strategy and behavior of a single attacker. The extension of the strategy research is greatly restricted by the assumption that there is only one attacker in the blockchain network, since, in many cases, a proof of work blockchain has multiple attackers. The attackers can be independent of others instead of sharing information and attacking the blockchain as a whole. In this paper, we will establish a new model to analyze the miners' behavior in a proof of work blockchain with multiple attackers. Based on our model, we extend the attackers' strategy by proposing a new strategy set publish-n. Meanwhile, we will also review other attacking strategies such as selfish mining and stubborn mining in our model to explore whether these strategies work or not when there are multiple attackers. The performances of different strategies are compared using relative stale block rate of the attackers. In a proof of work blockchain model with two attackers, strategy publish-n can beat selfish mining by up to 26.3%.
papers.abstract_zh: 自私挖掘是Eyal和Sirer在2014年发现的一种著名的挖掘攻击策略。在此之后，攻击者的策略被许多其他作品进一步讨论，这些作品分析了单个攻击者的策略和行为。策略研究的扩展受到区块链网络中只有一个攻击者的假设的极大限制，因为在许多情况下，工作证明区块链有多个攻击者。攻击者可以独立于其他人，而不是共享信息和攻击整个区块链。在这篇文章中，我们将建立一个新的模型来分析矿工在一个具有多个攻击者的工作证明区块链中的行为。基于我们的模型，我们通过提出一个新的策略集publish-n来扩展攻击者的策略。同时，我们也将在我们的模型中回顾其他攻击策略，如自私挖掘和顽固挖掘，以探索当有多个攻击者时这些策略是否有效。利用攻击者的相对阻塞率来比较不同策略的性能。在具有两个攻击者的工作证明区块链模型中，策略publish-n可以击败自私挖掘高达26.3%。
papers.title_zh: 关于比特币采矿的策略和行为

papers.title: A Leak-Resilient Dual Stack Scheme for Backward-Edge Control-Flow Integrity
papers.authors: Philipp Zieris, Julian Horsch
papers.abstract: Manipulations of return addresses on the stack are the basis for a variety of attacks on programs written in memory unsafe languages. Dual stack schemes for protecting return addresses promise an efficient and effective defense against such attacks. By introducing a second, safe stack to separate return addresses from potentially unsafe stack objects, they prevent attacks that, for example, maliciously modify a return address by overflowing a buffer. However, the security of dual stacks is based on the concealment of the safe stack in memory. Unfortunately, all current dual stack schemes are vulnerable to information disclosure attacks that are able to reveal the safe stack location, and therefore effectively break their promised security properties. In this paper, we present a new, leak-resilient dual stack scheme capable of withstanding sophisticated information disclosure attacks. We carefully study previous dual stack schemes and systematically develop a novel design for stack separation that eliminates flaws leading to the disclosure of safe stacks. We show the feasibility and practicality of our approach by presenting a full integration into the LLVM compiler framework with support for the x86-64 and ARM64 architectures. With an average of 2.7% on x86-64 and 0.0% on ARM64, the performance overhead of our implementation is negligible.
papers.abstract_zh: 对堆栈上返回地址的操作是对用内存不安全语言编写的程序进行各种攻击的基础。用于保护返回地址的双栈方案保证了对这种攻击的高效和有效的防御。通过引入第二个安全堆栈来将返回地址与潜在的不安全堆栈对象分开，它们可以防止攻击，例如，通过缓冲区溢出来恶意修改返回地址。然而，双栈的安全性是基于安全栈在内存中的隐蔽性。不幸的是，所有当前的双栈方案都容易受到能够泄露安全栈位置的信息泄露攻击，因此实际上破坏了它们承诺的安全属性。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个新的，泄漏弹性双栈方案，能够抵御复杂的信息泄漏攻击。我们仔细研究了以前的双堆栈方案，并系统地开发了一种新的堆栈分离设计，消除了导致安全堆栈泄露的缺陷。我们通过展示与支持x86-64和ARM64架构的LLVM编译器框架的完全集成来展示我们的方法的可行性和实用性。在x86-64上平均为2.7%，在ARM64上平均为0.0%，我们实现的性能开销可以忽略不计。
papers.title_zh: 泄漏弹性的双堆栈方案，用于向后边缘控制完整性

papers.title: CUP: Comprehensive User-Space Protection for C/C++
papers.authors: Nathan Burow, Derrick Paul McKee, Scott A. Carr, Mathias Payer
papers.abstract: Memory corruption vulnerabilities in C/C++ applications enable attackers to execute code, change data, and leak information. Current memory sanitizers do not provide comprehensive coverage of a program»s data. In particular, existing tools focus primarily on heap allocations with limited support for stack allocations and globals. Orthogonally, existing tools focus on the main executable with limited support for system libraries. Existing tools also suffer from both false positives and false negatives. We present Comprehensive User-Space Protection for C/C++, \sysname, an LLVM sanitizer that provides complete spatial and probabilistic temporal memory safety for C/C++ programs on 64-bit architectures (with a prototype implementation for x86\_64). \sysname uses a hybrid metadata scheme that supports all program data including globals, heap, or stack and maintains Application Binary Interface (ABI) compatibility. Existing approaches have false positives and 8%-25% false negatives on the NIST Juliet test suite. In contrast, \sysname has no false negatives or false positives. \sysname instruments all user-space code, including libc and other system libraries, removing these libraries from the trusted computing base. Supporting all of user space allows \sysname to treat a missed check as a failed check, leading to no false negatives for \sysname. The overhead introduced by \sysname is half that of the state-of-the-art full memory protection on benchmarks where both mechanisms run, and imposes 1.58x overhead when compared to baseline on all benchmarks. Consequently, \sysname is intended as a sanitizer for use by system developers, and to protect truly critical systems.
papers.abstract_zh: C/C++应用程序中的内存损坏漏洞使得攻击者能够执行代码、更改数据和泄漏信息。当前的内存清理程序不提供程序数据的全面覆盖。特别是，现有的工具主要关注堆分配，对栈分配和全局的支持有限。正交地，现有的工具关注于主可执行文件，对系统库的支持有限。现有的工具也存在误报和漏报的问题。我们为C/C++提供了全面的用户空间保护，\sysname是一个LLVM杀毒软件，它为64位架构上的C/C++程序提供了完整的空间和概率临时内存安全(具有x86 \u 64的原型实现)。\sysname使用混合元数据方案，支持所有程序数据，包括全局、堆或堆栈，并维护应用程序二进制接口(ABI)兼容性。现有的方法在NIST测试集上有8%-25%的假阳性和假阴性。相比之下，\sysname没有假阴性或假阳性。\sysname检测所有用户空间代码，包括libc和其他系统库，从可信计算基础中删除这些库。支持所有用户空间允许\sysname将遗漏的检查视为失败的检查，从而不会导致\sysname的误判。在两种机制都运行的基准测试中，\sysname引入的开销是最先进的全内存保护的一半，与所有基准测试中的基线相比，开销增加了1.58倍。因此，\sysname是供系统开发人员使用的杀毒软件，用来保护真正关键的系统。
papers.title_zh: 杯子：C/C ++的全面用户空间保护

papers.title: BCD: Decomposing Binary Code Into Components Using Graph-Based Clustering
papers.authors: Vishal Karande, Swarup Chandra, Zhiqiang Lin, Juan Caballero, Latifur Khan, Kevin W. Hamlen
papers.abstract: Complex software is built by composing components implementing largely independent blocks of functionality. However, once the sources are compiled into an executable, that modularity is lost. This is unfortunate for code recipients, for whom knowing the components has many potential benefits, such as improved program understanding for reverse-engineering, identifying shared code across different programs, binary code reuse, and authorship attribution. A novel approach for decomposing such source-free program executables into components is here proposed. Given an executable, the approach first statically builds a decomposition graph, where nodes are functions and edges capture three types of relationships: code locality, data references, and function calls. It then applies a graph-theoretic approach to partition the functions into disjoint components. A prototype implementation, BCD, demonstrates the approach's efficacy: Evaluation of BCD with 25 C++ binary programs to recover the methods belonging to each class achieves high precision and recall scores for these tested programs.
papers.abstract_zh: 复杂的软件是通过组合实现大量独立功能块的组件来构建的。然而，一旦源代码被编译成可执行文件，模块性就丧失了。这对于代码接受者来说是不幸的，对他们来说，知道组件有许多潜在的好处，例如改进对逆向工程的程序理解，识别不同程序之间的共享代码，二进制代码重用，以及作者归属。这里提出了一种新颖的方法，用于将这种无源代码程序可执行文件分解成组件。给定一个可执行文件，该方法首先静态构建一个分解图，其中节点是函数，边捕获三种类型的关系:代码局部性、数据引用和函数调用。然后，它应用图论方法将功能划分为不相交的组件。一个原型实现BCD展示了该方法的有效性:用25个C++二进制程序评估BCD以恢复属于每个类的方法，对于这些测试程序实现了高精度和高召回分数。
papers.title_zh: BCD：使用基于图的群集将二进制代码分解为组件

papers.title: To Intercept or Not to Intercept: Analyzing TLS Interception in Network Appliances
papers.authors: Louis Waked, Mohammad Mannan, Amr M. Youssef
papers.abstract: Many enterprise-grade network appliances host a TLS proxy to facilitate interception of TLS-protected traffic for various purposes, including malware scanning, phishing detection, and preventing data exfiltration. When deployed, the TLS proxy acts as the security validating client for external TLS web servers, on behalf of the original requesting client; on the other hand, the proxy acts as the web server to the client. Consequently, TLS proxies must maintain a reliable level of security, at least, at the same level as modern web browsers and properly configured TLS servers. Failure to do so increases the attack surface of all the proxied clients served the network appliance. We develop a framework for testing TLS inspecting appliances, combining and extending tests from existing work on client-end and network-based interception. Utilizing this framework, we analyze six representative network appliances, and uncover several security issues regarding TLS version and certificate parameters mapping, CA trusted stores, private keys, and certificate validation tests. For instance, we found that two appliances perform no certificate validation at all, exposing their end-clients to trivial Man-in-the-Middle attacks. The remaining appliances that perform certificate validation, still do not follow current best practices, and thus making them vulnerable against certain attacks. We also found that all the tested appliances deceive the requesting clients, by offering TLS parameters that are different from the proxy-to-server TLS parameters, such as the TLS versions, hashing algorithms, and RSA key sizes. We hope that this work bring focus on the risks and vulnerabilities of using TLS proxies that are being widely deployed in many enterprise and government environments, potentially affecting all their users and systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 许多企业级网络设备托管TLS代理，以便出于各种目的拦截受TLS保护的流量，包括恶意软件扫描、网络钓鱼检测和防止数据泄漏。部署时，TLS代理代表原始请求客户端充当外部TLS web服务器的安全验证客户端；另一方面，代理充当客户端的web服务器。因此，TLS代理必须保持可靠的安全级别，至少与现代web浏览器和正确配置的TLS服务器处于同一级别。否则会增加服务于网络设备的所有代理客户端的攻击面。我们开发了一个测试TLS检测设备的框架，结合并扩展了现有的客户端和基于网络的拦截的测试。利用该框架，我们分析了六个有代表性的网络设备，并揭示了几个关于TLS版本和证书参数映射、CA可信存储、私钥和证书验证测试的安全问题。例如，我们发现两个设备根本不执行证书验证，从而将它们的终端客户端暴露给微不足道的中间人攻击。其余执行证书验证的设备仍然没有遵循当前的最佳实践，因此容易受到某些攻击。我们还发现，所有经过测试的设备都会通过提供不同于代理服务器TLS参数的TLS参数来欺骗请求客户端，例如TLS版本、哈希算法和RSA密钥大小。我们希望这项工作能够关注使用TLS代理的风险和漏洞，这些代理在许多企业和政府环境中广泛部署，可能会影响所有用户和系统。
papers.title_zh: 拦截还是不拦截：分析网络设备中的TLS截距

papers.title: Software-Defined Firewall: Enabling Malware Traffic Detection and Programmable Security Control
papers.authors: Shang Gao, Zecheng Li, Yuan Yao, Bin Xiao, Songtao Guo, Yuanyuan Yang
papers.abstract: Network-based malware has posed serious threats to the security of host machines. When malware adopts a private TCP/IP stack for communications, personal and network firewalls may fail to identify the malicious traffic. Current firewall policies do not have a convenient update mechanism, which makes the malicious traffic detection difficult. In this paper, we propose Software-Defined Firewall (SDF), a new security design to protect host machines and enable programmable security policy control by abstracting the firewall architecture into control and data planes. The control plane strengthens the easy security control policy update, as in the SDN (Software-Defined Networking) architecture. The difference is that it further collects host information to provide application-level traffic control and improve the malicious traffic detection accuracy. The data plane accommodates all incoming/outgoing network traffic in a network hardware to avoid malware bypassing it. The design of SDF is easy to be implemented and deployed in today's network. We implement a prototype of SDF and evaluate its performance in real-world experiments. Experimental results show that SDF can successfully monitor all network traffic (i.e., no traffic bypassing) and improves the accuracy of malicious traffic identification. Two examples of use cases indicate that SDF provides easier and more flexible solutions to today's host security problems than current firewalls.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于网络的恶意软件对主机的安全构成了严重威胁。当恶意软件采用私有TCP/IP堆栈进行通信时，个人和网络防火墙可能无法识别恶意流量。当前的防火墙策略没有便捷的更新机制，使得恶意流量检测变得困难。在本文中，我们提出了软件定义的防火墙(SDF)，这是一种新的安全设计，通过将防火墙架构抽象为控制和数据平面来保护主机并实现可编程的安全策略控制。控制平面加强了简单的安全控制策略更新，如在SDN(软件定义网络)架构中。不同的是，它进一步收集主机信息，以提供应用程序级别的流量控制，并提高恶意流量检测的准确性。数据平面在网络硬件中容纳所有传入/传出的网络流量，以避免恶意软件绕过它。SDF的设计易于在当今的网络中实现和部署。我们实现了一个SDF原型，并在真实实验中评估了它的性能。实验结果表明，SDF能够成功监测所有网络流量(即没有流量旁路)，提高了恶意流量识别的准确率。两个用例示例表明，与当前的防火墙相比，SDF为当今的主机安全问题提供了更简单、更灵活的解决方案。
papers.title_zh: 软件定义的防火墙：启用恶意软件流量检测和可编程安全控制

papers.title: Where's Wally?: How to Privately Discover your Friends on the Internet
papers.authors: Panagiotis Papadopoulos, Antonios A. Chariton, Elias Athanasopoulos, Evangelos P. Markatos
papers.abstract: Internet friends who would like to connect with each other (e.g., VoIP, chat) use point-to-point communication applications such as Skype or WhatsApp. Apart from providing the necessary communication channel, these applications also facilitate contact discovery, where users upload their address-book and learn the network address of their friends. Although handy, this discovery process comes with a significant privacy cost: users are forced to reveal to the service provider every person they are socially connected with, even if they do not ever communicate with them through the app. In this paper, we show that it is possible to implement a scalable User Discovery service, without requiring any centralized entity that users have to blindly trust. Specifically, we distribute the maintenance of the users» contact information, and allow their friends to query for it, just as they normally query the network for machine services. We implement our approach in PROUD: a distributed privacy-preserving User Discovery service, which capitalizes on DNS. The prevalence of DNS makes PROUD immediately applicable, able to scale to millions of users. Preliminary evaluation shows that PROUD provides competitive performance for all practical purposes, imposing an overhead of less than 0.3 sec per operation.
papers.abstract_zh: 希望相互联系(例如VoIP、聊天)的互联网朋友使用点对点通信应用程序，如Skype或WhatsApp。除了提供必要的通信渠道之外，这些应用程序还促进了联系人发现，用户上传他们的地址簿并了解他们朋友的网络地址。虽然很方便，但这一发现过程也带来了巨大的隐私成本:用户被迫向服务提供商透露他们在社交上联系的每个人，即使他们从未通过应用程序与他们交流。在本文中，我们展示了实现可伸缩的用户发现服务是可能的，而不需要用户必须盲目信任的任何集中式实体。具体来说，我们分发用户联系信息的维护，并允许他们的朋友查询它，就像他们正常查询机器服务的网络一样。我们在PROUD中实现了我们的方法:一个利用DNS的分布式隐私保护用户发现服务。DNS的流行使得PROUD立即适用，能够扩展到数百万用户。初步评估表明，PROUD为所有实际用途提供了有竞争力的性能，每次操作的开销不到0.3秒。
papers.title_zh: 沃利在哪里？：如何在互联网上私下发现您的朋友

papers.title: You Are Your Photographs: Detecting Multiple Identities of Vendors in the Darknet Marketplaces
papers.authors: Xiangwen Wang, Peng Peng, Chun Wang, Gang Wang
papers.abstract: Darknet markets are online services behind Tor where cybercriminals trade illegal goods and stolen datasets. In recent years, security analysts and law enforcement start to investigate the darknet markets to study the cybercriminal networks and predict future incidents. However, vendors in these markets often create multiple accounts (\em i.e., Sybils), making it challenging to infer the relationships between cybercriminals and identify coordinated crimes. In this paper, we present a novel approach to link the multiple accounts of the same darknet vendors through photo analytics. The core idea is that darknet vendors often have to take their own product photos to prove the possession of the illegal goods, which can reveal their distinct photography styles. To fingerprint vendors, we construct a series deep neural networks to model the photography styles. We apply transfer learning to the model training, which allows us to accurately fingerprint vendors with a limited number of photos. We evaluate the system using real-world datasets from 3 large darknet markets (7,641 vendors and 197,682 product photos). A ground-truth evaluation shows that the system achieves an accuracy of 97.5%, outperforming existing stylometry-based methods in both accuracy and coverage. In addition, our system identifies previously unknown Sybil accounts within the same markets (23) and across different markets (715 pairs). Further case studies reveal new insights into the coordinated Sybil activities such as price manipulation, buyer scam, and product stocking and reselling.
papers.abstract_zh: 暗网市场是Tor背后的在线服务，网络罪犯在这里交易非法商品和窃取的数据集。近年来，安全分析师和执法部门开始调查暗网市场，以研究网络犯罪网络并预测未来事件。但是，这些市场中的供应商通常会创建多个帐户(\em，即Sybils)，这使得推断网络罪犯之间的关系和识别协同犯罪变得非常困难。在本文中，我们提出了一种新的方法，通过照片分析来链接相同暗网供应商的多个帐户。其核心思想是，暗网商贩往往要拍摄自己的产品照片，以证明非法商品的拥有，这可以揭示他们鲜明的摄影风格。对于指纹供应商，我们构建了一系列深度神经网络来建模摄影风格。我们将迁移学习应用于模型训练，这使我们能够使用有限数量的照片准确地识别供应商。我们使用来自3个大型暗网市场的真实数据集(7，641个供应商和197，682张产品照片)来评估该系统。地面实况评估表明，该系统实现了97.5%的准确性，在准确性和覆盖范围上都优于现有的基于风格测量的方法。此外，我们的系统还可以识别相同市场(23个)和不同市场(715对)中以前未知的Sybil账户。进一步的案例研究揭示了协调Sybil活动的新见解，如价格操纵，买方骗局，产品库存和转售。
papers.title_zh: 您是您的照片：在Darknet市场中检测供应商的多个身份

papers.title: Investigating Web Defacement Campaigns at Large
papers.authors: Federico Maggi, Marco Balduzzi, Ryan Flores, Lion Gu, Vincenzo Ciancaglini
papers.abstract: Website defacement is the practice of altering the web pages of a website after its compromise. The altered pages, calleddeface pages, can negatively affect the reputation and business of the victim site. Previous research has focused primarily on detection, rather than exploring the defacement phenomenon in depth. While investigating several defacements, we observed that the artifacts left by the defacers allow an expert analyst to investigate the actors' modus operandi and social structure, and expand from the single deface page to a group of related defacements (i.e., acampaign ). However, manually performing such analysis on millions of incidents is tedious, and poses scalability challenges. From these observations, we propose an automated approach that efficiently builds intelligence information out of raw deface pages. Our approach streamlines the analysts job by automatically recognizing defacement campaigns, and assigning meaningful textual labels to them. Applied to a comprehensive dataset of 13 million defacement records, from Jan. 1998 to Sept. 2016, our approach allowed us to conduct the first large-scale measurement on web defacement campaigns. In addition, our approach is meant to be adopted operationally by analysts to identify live campaigns on the field. We go beyond confirming anecdotal evidence. We analyze the social structure of modern defacers, which includes lone individuals as well as actors that cooperate with each others, or with teams, which evolve over time and dominate the scene. We conclude by drawing a parallel between the time line of World-shaping events and defacement campaigns, representing the evolution of the interests and orientation of modern defacers.
papers.abstract_zh: 网站污损是指在网站受损后更改其网页的行为。被改变的网页，称为正面网页，会对受害网站的声誉和业务产生负面影响。以前的研究主要集中在检测上，而不是深入探索污损现象。在调查几个污损时，我们观察到污损者留下的人工制品允许专家分析师调查行为者的操作方式和社会结构，并从单个污损页面扩展到一组相关的污损(即广告)。然而，对数百万起事件手动执行这种分析是乏味的，并且带来了可扩展性挑战。根据这些观察，我们提出了一种自动的方法，有效地从原始的污损页面中构建情报信息。我们的方法通过自动识别污损活动，并为其分配有意义的文本标签，简化了分析师的工作。应用于从1998年1月到2016年9月的1300万污损记录的综合数据集，我们的方法使我们能够对网络污损活动进行首次大规模测量。此外，我们的方法旨在由分析师在操作上采用，以识别现场的实时活动。我们不仅仅是确认轶事证据。我们分析了现代丑化者的社会结构，其中包括孤独的个体以及相互合作的演员，或与团队合作的演员，他们随着时间的推移而演变并主导着场景。最后，我们在塑造世界的事件和丑化运动的时间线之间画了一条平行线，代表了现代丑化者的兴趣和取向的演变。
papers.title_zh: 调查整个网络污损广告系列

papers.title: Hardware Performance Counters Can Detect Malware: Myth or Fact?
papers.authors: Boyou Zhou, Anmol Gupta, Rasoul Jahanshahi, Manuel Egele, Ajay Joshi
papers.abstract: The ever-increasing prevalence of malware has led to the explorations of various detection mechanisms. Several recent works propose to use Hardware Performance Counters (HPCs) values with machine learning classification models for malware detection. HPCs are hardware units that record low-level micro-architectural behavior, such as cache hits/misses, branch (mis)prediction, and load/store operations. However, this information does not reliably capture the nature of the application, i.e. whether it is benign or malicious. In this paper, we claim and experimentally support that using the micro-architectural level information obtained from HPCs cannot distinguish between benignware and malware. We evaluate the fidelity of malware detection using HPCs. We perform quantitative analysis using Principal Component Analysis (PCA) to systematically select micro-architectural events that have the most predictive powers. We then run 1,924 programs, 962 benignware and 962 malware, on our experimental setups. We achieve 83.39%, 84.84%, 83.59%, 75.01%, 78.75%, and 14.32% F1-score (a metric of detection rates) of Decision Tree (DT), Random Forest (RF), K Nearest Neighbors (KNN), Adaboost, Neural Net (NN), and Naive Bayes, respectively. We cross-validate our models 1,000 times to show the distributions of detection rates in various models. Our cross-validation analysis shows that many of the experiments produce low F1-scores. The F1-score of models in DT, RF, KNN, Adaboost, NN, and Naive Bayes is 80.22%, 81.29%, 80.22%, 70.32%, 35.66%, and 9.903%, respectively. To further highlight the incapability of malware detection using HPCs, we show that one benignware (Notepad++) infused with malware (ransomware) cannot be detected by HPC-based malware detection.
papers.abstract_zh: 恶意软件的日益流行导致了对各种检测机制的探索。最近的几项工作提出将硬件性能计数器(HPCs)值与机器学习分类模型一起用于恶意软件检测。HPC是记录低级微架构行为的硬件单元，例如缓存命中/未命中、分支(错误)预测和加载/存储操作。然而，该信息不能可靠地捕获应用程序的性质，即它是良性的还是恶意的。在本文中，我们声称并通过实验证明，使用从HPCs获得的微架构级别信息无法区分良性软件和恶意软件。我们使用HPCs评估恶意软件检测的保真度。我们使用主成分分析(PCA)进行定量分析，系统地选择最具预测能力的微结构事件。然后，我们在实验装置上运行1924个程序，962个良性软件和962个恶意软件。我们分别实现了决策树(DT)、随机森林(RF)、K近邻(KNN)、Adaboost、神经网络(NN)和朴素贝叶斯的83.39%、84.84%、83.59%、75.01%、78.75%和14.32%的F1得分(检测率的度量)。我们交叉验证我们的模型1000次，以显示各种模型中检测率的分布。我们的交叉验证分析表明，许多实验产生的F1分数很低。DT、RF、KNN、Adaboost、NN和朴素贝叶斯模型的F1值分别为80.22%、81.29%、80.22%、70.32%、35.66%和9.903%。为了进一步强调使用HPC无法检测恶意软件，我们展示了一个注入了恶意软件(勒索软件)的benignware (Notepad++)无法被基于HPC的恶意软件检测检测到。
papers.title_zh: 硬件性能计数器可以检测恶意软件：神话还是事实？

papers.title: le-git-imate: Towards Verifiable Web-based Git Repositories
papers.authors: Hammad Afzali, Santiago Torres-Arias, Reza Curtmola, Justin Cappos
papers.abstract: Web-based Git hosting services such as GitHub and GitLab are popular choices to manage and interact with Git repositories. However, they lack an important security feature - the ability to sign Git commits. Users instruct the server to perform repository operations on their behalf and have to trust that the server will execute their requests faithfully. Such trust may be unwarranted though because a malicious or a compromised server may execute the requested actions in an incorrect manner, leading to a different state of the repository than what the user intended. In this paper, we show a range of high-impact attacks that can be executed stealthily when developers use the web UI of a Git hosting service to perform common actions such as editing files or merging branches. We then propose le-git-imate, a defense against these attacks which provides security guarantees comparable and compatible with Git's standard commit signing mechanism. We implement le-git-imate as a Chrome browser extension. le-git-imate does not require changes on the server side and can thus be used immediately. It also preserves current workflows used in Github/GitLab and does not require the user to leave the browser, and it allows anyone to verify that the server's actions faithfully follow the user's requested actions. Moreover, experimental evaluation using the browser extension shows that le-git-imate has comparable performance with Git's standard commit signature mechanism. With our solution in place, users can take advantage of GitHub/GitLab's web-based features without sacrificing security, thus paving the way towards verifiable web-based Git repositories.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于Web的Git托管服务，如GitHub和GitLab，是管理和与Git存储库交互的流行选择。然而，它们缺少一个重要的安全特性——签署Git提交的能力。用户指示服务器代表他们执行存储库操作，并且必须相信服务器会忠实地执行他们的请求。然而，这种信任可能是没有保证的，因为恶意的或受损的服务器可能以不正确的方式执行所请求的动作，从而导致存储库的状态与用户预期的不同。在本文中，我们展示了一系列高影响力的攻击，当开发人员使用Git托管服务的web UI来执行编辑文件或合并分支等常见操作时，这些攻击可能会被悄悄执行。然后，我们提出了le-git-imate，这是一种针对这些攻击的防御方法，它提供了与git的标准提交签名机制相当和兼容的安全保证。我们将le-git-imate实现为一个Chrome浏览器扩展。le-git-imate不需要在服务器端进行修改，因此可以立即使用。它还保留了Github/GitLab中使用的当前工作流，并且不需要用户离开浏览器，它允许任何人验证服务器的操作是否忠实地遵循了用户请求的操作。此外，使用浏览器扩展的实验评估表明，le-git-imate具有与git的标准提交签名机制相当的性能。有了我们的解决方案，用户可以利用GitHub/GitLab基于web的特性，而不会牺牲安全性，从而为可验证的基于web的Git库铺平了道路。
papers.title_zh: LE-GIT-MITATE：朝向基于Web的GIT存储库

papers.title: NoisePrint: Attack Detection Using Sensor and Process Noise Fingerprint in Cyber Physical Systems
papers.authors: Chuadhry Mujeeb Ahmed, Martín Ochoa, Jianying Zhou, Aditya P. Mathur, Rizwan Qadeer, Carlos Murguia, Justin Ruths
papers.abstract: An attack detection scheme is proposed to detect data integrity attacks on sensors in Cyber-Physical Systems (CPSs). A combined fingerprint for sensor and process noise is created during the normal operation of the system. Under sensor spoofing attack, noise pattern deviates from the fingerprinted pattern enabling the proposed scheme to detect attacks. To extract the noise (difference between expected and observed value) a representative model of the system is derived. A Kalman filter is used for the purpose of state estimation. By subtracting the state estimates from the real system states, a residual vector is obtained. It is shown that in steady state the residual vector is a function of process and sensor noise. A set of time domain and frequency domain features is extracted from the residual vector. Feature set is provided to a machine learning algorithm to identify the sensor and process. Experiments are performed on two testbeds, a real-world water treatment (SWaT) facility and a water distribution (WADI) testbed. A class of zero-alarm attacks, designed for statistical detectors on SWaT are detected by the proposed scheme. It is shown that a multitude of sensors can be uniquely identified with accuracy higher than 90% based on the noise fingerprint.
papers.abstract_zh: 提出了一种攻击检测方案来检测信息物理系统中传感器的数据完整性攻击。在系统的正常操作期间，产生传感器和过程噪声的组合指纹。在传感器欺骗攻击下，噪声模式偏离指纹模式，使得所提出的方案能够检测攻击。为了提取噪声(期望值和观察值之间的差异),导出系统的代表性模型。卡尔曼滤波器用于状态估计的目的。通过从真实系统状态中减去状态估计，获得残差向量。结果表明，在稳态下，残差向量是过程和传感器噪声的函数。从残差向量中提取一组时域和频域特征。特征集被提供给机器学习算法以识别传感器和过程。实验在两个试验台上进行，一个是真实世界的水处理(SWaT)设备，另一个是配水(WADI)试验台。一类为SWaT上的统计检测器设计的零报警攻击被该方案检测到。结果表明，基于噪声指纹，可以以高于90%的准确度唯一地识别多个传感器。
papers.title_zh: Noiseprint：使用传感器和过程噪声指纹在网络物理系统中的攻击检测

papers.title: Electromagnetic Induction Attacks Against Embedded Systems
papers.authors: Jayaprakash Selvaraj, Gökçen Yilmaz Dayanikli, Neelam Prabhu Gaunkar, David Ware, Ryan M. Gerdes, Mani Mina
papers.abstract: Embedded and cyber-physical systems are critically dependent on the integrity of input and output signals for proper operation. Input signals acquired from sensors are assumed to correspond to the phenomenon the system is monitoring and responding to. Similarly, when such systems issue an actuation signal it is expected that the mechanism being controlled will respond in a predictable manner. Recent work has shown that sensors can be manipulated through the use of intentional electromagnetic interference (IEMI). In this work, we demonstrate thatboth input and output signals, analog and digital, can be remotely manipulated via the physical layer---thus bypassing traditional integrity mechanisms. Through the use of specially crafted IEMI it is shown that the physical layer signaling used for sensor input to, and digital communications between, embedded systems may be undermined to an attacker's advantage. Three attack scenarios are analyzed and their efficacy demonstrated. In the first scenario the analog sensing channel is manipulated to produce arbitrary sensor readings, while in the second it is shown that an attacker may induce bit flips in serial communications. Finally, a commonly used actuation signal is shown to be vulnerable to IEMI. The attacks are effective over appreciable distances and at low power.
papers.abstract_zh: 嵌入式和信息物理系统的正常运行严重依赖于输入和输出信号的完整性。假设从传感器获取的输入信号对应于系统正在监控和响应的现象。类似地，当这种系统发出致动信号时，预期被控制的机构将以可预测的方式响应。最近的工作表明，可以通过使用有意电磁干扰(IEMI)来操纵传感器。在这项工作中，我们证明了输入和输出信号，模拟和数字，可以通过物理层远程操纵，从而绕过传统的完整性机制。通过使用特制的IEMI，可以看出，用于嵌入式系统的传感器输入和数字通信的物理层信号可能会被破坏，从而对攻击者有利。分析了三种攻击场景，并演示了它们的有效性。在第一种情况下，模拟感测通道被操纵以产生任意传感器读数，而在第二种情况下，攻击者可能会在串行通信中引发比特翻转。最后，一个常用的激励信号容易受到IEMI的影响。这些攻击在可观的距离和低功率下是有效的。
papers.title_zh: 电磁诱导攻击针对嵌入式系统

papers.title: Sensor CON-Fusion: Defeating Kalman Filter in Signal Injection Attack
papers.authors: Shoei Nashimoto, Daisuke Suzuki, Takeshi Sugawara, Kazuo Sakiyama
papers.abstract: In recent years, information systems have become increasingly able to interact with the real world by using relatively cheap connected embedded devices. In such systems, sensors are crucial components because systems can observe the real world only through sensors. Recently, there have been emerging threats to sensors, which involve the injection of false information in the physical/analog domain. To counter such attacks, sensor fusion is considered a promising approach because the robustness of a measurement can be improved by combining data from redundant sensors. However, sensor fusion algorithms were not originally designed to consider security, and thus their effectiveness is unclear. For this reason, in this paper, we evaluate in detail the security of sensor fusion. Notably, we consider a sensor fusion scenario that involves measuring inclination, with a combination of an accelerometer, gyroscope, and magnetometer using Kalman filter. Based on a theoretical analysis of the algorithm, two concrete attacks that defeat the sensor fusion are proposed. The feasibility of the proposed attacks is verified by performing experiments in emulated and real environments. We also propose a countermeasure that thwarts the new attacks. Furthermore, we logically prove that the proposed countermeasure detects all possible attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，通过使用相对便宜的连接嵌入式设备，信息系统越来越能够与现实世界进行交互。在这样的系统中，传感器是至关重要的组件，因为系统只能通过传感器来观察真实世界。最近，出现了对传感器的威胁，包括在物理/模拟域中注入错误信息。为了对抗这种攻击，传感器融合被认为是一种有前途的方法，因为可以通过组合来自冗余传感器的数据来提高测量的鲁棒性。然而，传感器融合算法最初并没有考虑安全性，因此它们的有效性尚不清楚。为此，本文对传感器融合的安全性进行了详细的评估。值得注意的是，我们考虑一个传感器融合场景，其中涉及使用卡尔曼滤波器结合加速度计、陀螺仪和磁力计来测量倾斜度。基于对算法的理论分析，提出了两种挫败传感器融合的具体攻击。通过在仿真和真实环境中进行实验，验证了所提出攻击的可行性。我们还提出了阻止新攻击的对策。此外，我们从逻辑上证明了所提出的对策可以检测到所有可能的攻击。
papers.title_zh: 传感器融合：在信号注射攻击中击败卡尔曼过滤器

papers.title: TABOR: A Graphical Model-based Approach for Anomaly Detection in Industrial Control Systems
papers.authors: Qin Lin, Sridhar Adepu, Sicco Verwer, Aditya Mathur
papers.abstract: Industrial Control Systems (ICS) such as water and power are critical to any society. Process anomaly detection mechanisms have been proposed to protect such systems to minimize the risk of damage or loss of resources. In this paper, a graphical model-based approach is proposed for profiling normal operational behavior of an operational ICS referred to as SWaT (Secure Water Treatment). Timed automata are learned as a model of regular behaviors shown in sensors signal like fluctuations of water level in tanks. Bayesian networks are learned to discover dependencies between sensors and actuators. The models are used as a one-class classifier for process anomaly detection, recognizing irregular behavioral patterns and dependencies. The detection results can be interpreted and the abnormal sensors or actuators localized due to the interpretability of the graphical models. This approach is applied to a dataset collected from SWaT. Experimental results demonstrate the model's superior performance on both precision and run-time over methods including support vector machine and deep neural networks. The underlying idea is generic and applicable to other industrial control systems such as power and transportation.
papers.abstract_zh: 水电等工业控制系统(ICS)对任何社会都至关重要。已经提出了进程异常检测机制来保护这样的系统，以最小化资源损坏或损失的风险。本文提出了一种基于图形模型的方法来描述一个被称为SWaT(安全水处理)的运行ICS的正常运行行为。时间自动机被学习为传感器信号中显示的规则行为的模型，如水箱中水位的波动。贝叶斯网络被学习来发现传感器和致动器之间的依赖性。这些模型用作流程异常检测的单类分类器，识别不规则的行为模式和依赖性。由于图形模型的可解释性，可以解释检测结果并定位异常传感器或致动器。这种方法应用于从SWaT收集的数据集。实验结果表明，该模型在精度和运行时间上都优于支持向量机和深度神经网络等方法。基本思想是通用的，并适用于其他工业控制系统，如电力和运输。
papers.title_zh: 塔博尔：一种基于图形模型的工业控制系统异常检测方法

papers.title: SecSAKE: Towards Secure and Efficient Outsourcing of Clinical MRI Reconstruction
papers.authors: Zihao Shan, Zhan Qin, Leslie Ying, Kui Ren
papers.abstract: Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) is a widely used technique to help form images of internal body structures for medical diagnosis. Recently, the Simultaneous Auto-calibrating and K-space Estimation (SAKE) becomes one of the most popular rapid imaging reconstruction methods to restore key information from scanned MRI data. This technique intrinsically requires a fair amount of high-resolution MRI data to accommodate the need of accurate diagnosis and imposes vast computational overhead onto resource-constrained clinics. To solve this problem, the practitioners start seeking the help of cloud computing platform to utilize its robust and economical computation power. However, the privacy concerns with outsourcing patients' private data to public cloud servers are ignited and hinder those practitioners from enjoying the benefits of cloud computing Motivated by this practical need, we investigate the privacy requirements of MRI data and reconstruction process and propose the first secure and efficient clinical MRI reconstruction outsourcing scheme, SecSAKE. Our solution enables a clinic to outsource the most computationally-intensive tasks in SAKE to the resource-abundant cloud servers. In particular, two different protocols are put forward in SecSAKE, with extra emphasis on security and efficiency, respectively. In the first protocol, we carefully enforce a low-complexity matrix transformation in the k-space domain on the clinic end and harness the cloud server to perform iterative computation tasks. The corresponding security analysis shows that the outsourced MRI data are computationally indistinguishable under Chosen Plaintext Attack (CPA). In the second protocol, we largely reduce the computational complexity on the clinic side by leveraging a multi-server architecture of the cloud. The clinic only needs to perform a one-round data transformation to retrieve the reconstructed MRI data. Moreover, we conduct thorough privacy and efficiency analysis and extensive experiments over real-world image benchmark to evaluate the performance of the proposed designs. Compared with the original SAKE, the experimental results demonstrate that the proposed privacy-preserving mechanism can provide significant reconstruction time savings while achieving comparative performance on the quality of reconstructed images.
papers.abstract_zh: 磁共振成像(MRI)是一种广泛使用的技术，用于帮助形成用于医学诊断的内部身体结构的图像。最近，同步自动校准和K空间估计(SAKE)成为从扫描的MRI数据中恢复关键信息的最流行的快速成像重建方法之一。这种技术本质上需要相当数量的高分辨率MRI数据来适应精确诊断的需要，并且给资源受限的诊所带来巨大的计算开销。为了解决这个问题，从业者开始寻求云计算平台的帮助，以利用其强大而经济的计算能力。然而，将患者的私人数据外包给公共云服务器引发的隐私问题阻碍了这些从业者享受云计算的好处。在这种实际需求的推动下，我们研究了MRI数据和重建过程的隐私需求，并提出了第一个安全高效的临床MRI重建外包方案SecSAKE。我们的解决方案使诊所能够将SAKE中计算最密集的任务外包给资源丰富的云服务器。特别地，在SecSAKE中提出了两个不同的协议，分别额外强调了安全性和效率。在第一个协议中，我们在诊所端仔细实施k空间域中的低复杂度矩阵变换，并利用云服务器来执行迭代计算任务。相应的安全性分析表明，外包MRI数据在选择明文攻击下是计算不可区分的。在第二个协议中，我们通过利用云的多服务器架构，极大地降低了诊所方面的计算复杂性。诊所只需要执行一轮数据转换来检索重建的MRI数据。此外，我们进行了全面的隐私和效率分析，并在真实世界的图像基准上进行了广泛的实验，以评估所提出的设计的性能。实验结果表明，与原始的SAKE算法相比，提出的隐私保护机制可以显著地节省重建时间，同时在重建图像质量上取得相当的性能。
papers.title_zh: SECSAKE：临床MRI重建的安全有效外包

papers.title: Highly-Efficient Fully-Anonymous Dynamic Group Signatures
papers.authors: David Derler, Daniel Slamanig
papers.abstract: Group signatures are a central tool in privacy-enhancing cryptography, which allow members of a group to anonymously produce signatures on behalf of the group. Consequently, they are an attractive means to implement privacy-friendly authentication mechanisms. Ideally, group signatures are dynamic and thus allow to dynamically and concurrently enroll new members to a group. For such schemes, Bellare et al. (CT-RSA»05) proposed the currently strongest security model (BSZ model). This model, in particular, ensures desirable anonymity guarantees. Given the prevalence of the resource asymmetry in current computing scenarios, i.e., a multitude of (highly) resource-constrained devices are communicating with powerful (cloud-powered) services, it is of utmost importance to have group signatures that are highly-efficient and can be deployed in such scenarios. Satisfying these requirements in particular means that the signing (client) operations are lightweight. We propose a novel, generic approach to construct dynamic group signature schemes, being provably secure in the BSZ model and particularly suitable for resource-constrained devices. Our results are interesting for various reasons: We can prove our construction secure without requiring random oracles. Moreover, when opting for an instantiation in the random oracle model (ROM) the so obtained scheme is extremely efficient and outperforms the fastest constructions providing anonymity in the BSZ model - which also rely on the ROM - known to date. Regarding constructions providing a weaker anonymity notion than BSZ, we surprisingly outperform the popular short BBS group signature scheme (CRYPTO»04; also proven secure in the ROM) and thereby even obtain shorter signatures. We provide a rigorous comparison with existing schemes that highlights the benefits of our scheme. On a more theoretical side, we provide the first construction following the "without encryption" paradigm introduced by Bichsel et al. (SCN»10) in the strong BSZ model.
papers.abstract_zh: 群签名是增强隐私的密码学中的一个核心工具，它允许一个群的成员匿名地代表这个群产生签名。因此，它们是实现隐私友好认证机制的有吸引力的手段。理想地，群签名是动态的，因此允许动态地和并发地将新成员注册到群中。对于这样的方案，Bellare等人(CT-RSA 05)提出了目前最强的安全模型(BSZ模型)。特别是，这种模式确保了理想的匿名保证。考虑到当前计算场景中资源不对称的普遍存在，即大量(高度)资源受限的设备与强大的(云驱动的)服务进行通信，具有高效且可部署在这种场景中的群签名至关重要。满足这些需求尤其意味着签名(客户端)操作是轻量级的。我们提出了一种新的、通用的方法来构造动态群签名方案，该方案在BSZ模型下是可证明安全的，并且特别适用于资源受限的设备。我们的结果很有趣，原因有很多:我们可以证明我们的构造是安全的，不需要随机预言。此外，当选择随机预言模型(ROM)中的实例化时，如此获得的方案是极其有效的，并且优于迄今已知的在BSZ模型中提供匿名性的最快构造-其也依赖于ROM。关于提供比BSZ更弱的匿名概念的构造，我们出人意料地优于流行的短BBS群签名方案(CRYPTO 04在ROM中也被证明是安全的),从而甚至获得更短的签名。我们提供了与现有方案的严格比较，突出了我们的方案的好处。在一个更理论的方面，我们提供了遵循Bichsel等人(SCN 10)在强BSZ模型中引入的“无加密”范例的第一个构造。
papers.title_zh: 高效的全匿名动态组签名

papers.title: Direct Anonymous Attestation with Efficient Verifier-Local Revocation for Subscription System
papers.authors: Vireshwar Kumar, He Li, Noah Luther, Pranav Asokan, Jung-Min "Jerry" Park, Kaigui Bian, Martin B. H. Weiss, Taieb Znati
papers.abstract: For a computing platform that is compliant with the Trusted Platform Module (TPM) standard, direct anonymous attestation (DAA) is an appropriate cryptographic protocol for realizing an anonymous subscription system. This approach takes advantage of a cryptographic key that is securely embedded in the platform's hardware, and enables privacy-preserving authentication of the platform. In all of the existing DAA schemes, the platform suffers from significant computational and communication costs that increase proportionally to the size of the revocation list. This drawback renders the existing schemes to be impractical when the size of the revocation list grows beyond a relatively modest size. In this paper, we propose a novel scheme called Lightweight Anonymous Subscription with Efficient Revocation (LASER) that addresses this very problem. In LASER, the computational and communication costs of the platform's signature are multiple orders of magnitude lower than the prior art. LASER achieves this significant performance improvement by shifting most of the computational and communication costs from the DAA's online procedure (i.e., signature generation) to its offline procedure (i.e., acquisition of keys/credentials). We have conducted a thorough analysis of LASER's performance related features. We have implemented LASER on a laptop with an on-board TPM. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first implementation of a DAA scheme on an actual TPM cryptoprocessor that is compliant with the most recent TPM specification, viz., TPM 2.0.
papers.abstract_zh: 对于符合可信平台模块(TPM)标准的计算平台，直接匿名证明(DAA)是用于实现匿名订阅系统的合适的加密协议。这种方法利用了安全嵌入平台硬件中的密钥，并实现了平台的隐私保护认证。在所有现有的DAA方案中，平台遭受显著的计算和通信成本，这些成本与撤销列表的大小成比例地增加。当撤销列表的大小超过相对适中的大小时，这个缺点使得现有的方案不切实际。在本文中，我们提出了一个新的方案，称为轻量级匿名订阅与有效撤销(LASER ),解决了这个问题。在LASER中，平台签名的计算和通信成本比现有技术低多个数量级。LASER通过将大部分计算和通信成本从DAA的在线过程(即，签名生成)转移到其离线过程(即，获取密钥/凭证)来实现这一显著的性能改进。我们对激光器的性能相关特征进行了全面的分析。我们已经在具有板载TPM的笔记本电脑上实现了LASER。据我们所知，这是DAA方案在实际TPM密码处理器上的第一次实现，它符合最新的TPM规范，即。，TPM 2.0。
papers.title_zh: 直接匿名证明订阅系统有效的验证者 - 局部撤销

papers.title: Single Trace Attack Against RSA Key Generation in Intel SGX SSL
papers.authors: Samuel Weiser, Raphael Spreitzer, Lukas Bodner
papers.abstract: Microarchitectural side-channel attacks have received significant attention recently. However, while side-channel analyses on secret key operations such as decryption and signature generation are well established, the process of key generation did not receive particular attention so far. Especially due to the fact that microarchitectural attacks usually require multiple observations (more than one measurement trace) to break an implementation, one-time operations such as key generation routines are often considered as uncritical and out of scope. However, this assumption is no longer valid for shielded execution architectures, where sensitive code is executed - in the realm of a potential attacker - inside hardware enclaves. In such a setting, an untrusted operating system can conduct noiseless controlled-channel attacks by exploiting page access patterns. In this work, we identify a critical vulnerability in the RSA key generation procedure of Intel SGX SSL (and the underlying OpenSSL library) that allows to recover secret keys from observations of a single execution. In particular, we mount a controlled-channel attack on the binary Euclidean algorithm (BEA), which is used for checking the validity of the RSA key parameters generated within an SGX enclave. Thereby, we recover all but 16 bits of one of the two prime factors of the public modulus. For an 8192-bit RSA modulus, we recover the remaining 16 bits and thus the full key in less than 12 seconds on a commodity PC. In light of these results, we urge for careful re-evaluation of cryptographic libraries with respect to single trace attacks, especially if they are intended for shielded execution environments such as Intel SGX.
papers.abstract_zh: 微体系结构旁道攻击最近受到了极大的关注。然而，虽然对诸如解密和签名生成之类的秘密密钥操作的旁道分析早已确立，但密钥生成过程迄今为止并未受到特别关注。特别是由于微体系结构攻击通常需要多次观察(不止一次测量跟踪)来破坏实施，诸如密钥生成例程之类的一次性操作通常被认为是不重要的和超出范围的。然而，这种假设对于屏蔽执行架构不再有效，在屏蔽执行架构中，敏感代码在潜在攻击者的领域中在硬件飞地内执行。在这种情况下，不受信任的操作系统可以通过利用页面访问模式进行无噪声的受控通道攻击。在这项工作中，我们发现了英特尔SGX SSL(和底层OpenSSL库)的RSA密钥生成过程中的一个关键漏洞，该漏洞允许从单次执行的观察中恢复密钥。特别是，我们对二进制欧几里德算法(BEA)进行了一次受控信道攻击，该算法用于检查在SGX飞地内生成的RSA密钥参数的有效性。因此，我们恢复了公共模数的两个质因数之一的除16位之外的所有位。对于一个8192位的RSA模数，我们可以在不到12秒的时间内在商用PC上恢复剩余的16位，从而恢复完整的密钥。鉴于这些结果，我们强烈要求针对单一跟踪攻击对加密库进行仔细的重新评估，尤其是如果它们是针对英特尔SGX等屏蔽执行环境的。
papers.title_zh: Intel SGX SSL中针对RSA密钥生成的单个跟踪攻击

papers.title: Automated Detection, Exploitation, and Elimination of Double-Fetch Bugs using Modern CPU Features
papers.authors: Michael Schwarz, Daniel Gruss, Moritz Lipp, Clémentine Maurice, Thomas Schuster, Anders Fogh, Stefan Mangard
papers.abstract: Double-fetch bugs are a special type of race condition, where an unprivileged execution thread is able to change a memory location between the time-of-check and time-of-use of a privileged execution thread. If an unprivileged attacker changes the value at the right time, the privileged operation becomes inconsistent, leading to a change in control flow, and thus an escalation of privileges for the attacker. More severely, such double-fetch bugs can be introduced by the compiler, entirely invisible on the source-code level. We propose novel techniques to efficiently detect, exploit, and eliminate double-fetch bugs. We demonstrate the first combination of state-of-the-art cache attacks with kernel-fuzzing techniques to allow fully automated identification of double fetches. We demonstrate the first fully automated reliable detection and exploitation of double-fetch bugs, making manual analysis as in previous work superfluous. We show that cache-based triggers outperform state-of-the-art exploitation techniques significantly, leading to an exploitation success rate of up to 97%. Our modified fuzzer automatically detects double fetches and automatically narrows down this candidate set for double-fetch bugs to the exploitable ones. We present the first generic technique based on hardware transactional memory, to eliminate double-fetch bugs in a fully automated and transparent manner. We extend defensive programming techniques by retrofitting arbitrary code with automated double-fetch prevention, both in trusted execution environments as well as in syscalls, with a performance overhead below 1%.
papers.abstract_zh: 双重获取错误是一种特殊类型的竞争条件，在这种情况下，非特权执行线程能够在特权执行线程的检查时间和使用时间之间改变内存位置。如果无特权的攻击者在适当的时候更改了该值，特权操作就会变得不一致，从而导致控制流的改变，进而提升攻击者的特权。更严重的是，这种双重获取错误可能是由编译器引入的，在源代码级别上是完全看不见的。我们提出了新的技术来有效地检测、利用和消除双重提取错误。我们展示了最先进的高速缓存攻击与内核模糊技术的首次结合，以允许全自动识别双重提取。我们展示了第一个全自动可靠检测和利用双重提取错误，使手动分析像在以前的工作是多余的。我们发现，基于缓存的触发器明显优于最先进的利用技术，利用成功率高达97%。我们改进的fuzzer自动检测双重提取，并自动将双重提取错误的候选集缩小到可利用的错误。我们提出了第一个基于硬件事务存储器的通用技术，以完全自动化和透明的方式消除双重提取错误。我们通过在可信执行环境和系统调用中对任意代码进行自动双重读取保护，扩展了防御性编程技术，性能开销低于1%。
papers.title_zh: 使用现代CPU功能自动检测，剥削和消除双提示错误

papers.title: Leveraging Hardware Transactional Memory for Cache Side-Channel Defenses
papers.authors: Sanchuan Chen, Fangfei Liu, Zeyu Mi, Yinqian Zhang, Ruby B. Lee, Haibo Chen, XiaoFeng Wang
papers.abstract: A program's use of CPU caches may reveal its memory access pattern and thus leak sensitive information when the program performs secret-dependent memory accesses. In recent studies, it has been demonstrated that cache side-channel attacks that extract secrets by observing the victim program's cache uses can be conducted under a variety of scenarios, among which the most concerning are cross-VM attacks and those against SGX enclaves. In this paper, we propose a mechanism that leverages hardware transactional memory (HTM) to enable software programs to defend themselves against various cache side-channel attacks. We observe that when the HTM is implemented by retrofitting cache coherence protocols, as is the case of Intel's Transactional Synchronization Extensions, the cache interference that is necessary in cache side-channel attacks will inevitably terminate hardware transactions. We provide a systematic analysis of the security requirements that a software-only solution must meet to defeat cache attacks, propose a software design that leverages HTM to satisfy these requirements and devise several optimization techniques in our implementation to reduce performance impact caused by transaction aborts. The empirical evaluation suggests that the performance overhead caused by the HTM-based solution is low.
papers.abstract_zh: 程序对CPU缓存的使用可能会暴露其内存访问模式，从而在程序执行秘密相关的内存访问时泄漏敏感信息。最近的研究表明，通过观察受害程序的缓存使用来提取秘密的缓存旁路攻击可以在各种场景下进行，其中最令人担忧的是跨虚拟机攻击和针对SGX飞地的攻击。在本文中，我们提出了一种利用硬件事务内存(HTM)的机制，使软件程序能够抵御各种缓存旁路攻击。我们观察到，当HTM通过改造高速缓存一致性协议来实现时，例如英特尔的事务同步扩展，高速缓存旁路攻击中必要的高速缓存干扰将不可避免地终止硬件事务。我们对纯软件解决方案必须满足的安全要求进行了系统分析，提出了一种利用HTM来满足这些要求的软件设计，并在我们的实施中设计了几种优化技术来降低事务中止所造成的性能影响。经验评估表明，基于HTM的解决方案导致的性能开销很低。
papers.title_zh: 利用硬件交易记忆用于缓存侧通道防御

papers.title: Cybercrime After the Sunrise: A Statistical Analysis of DNS Abuse in New gTLDs
papers.authors: Maciej Korczynski, Maarten Wullink, Samaneh Tajalizadehkhoob, Giovane C. M. Moura, Arman Noroozian, Drew Bagley, Cristian Hesselman
papers.abstract: To enhance competition and choice in the domain name system, ICANN introduced the new gTLD program, which added hundreds of new gTLDs (e.g. .nyc, .io) to the root DNS zone. While the program arguably increased the range of domain names available to consumers, it might also have created new opportunities for cybercriminals. To investigate that, we present the first comparative study of abuse in the domains registered under the new gTLD program and legacy gTLDs (18 in total, such as .com, .org). We combine historical datasets from various sources, including DNS zone files, WHOIS records, passive and active DNS and HTTP measurements, and 11 reputable abuse feeds to study abuse across gTLDs. We find that the new gTLDs appear to have diverted abuse from the legacy gTLDs: while the total number of domains abused for spam remains stable across gTLDs, we observe a growing number of spam domains in new gTLDs which suggests a shift from legacy gTLDs to new gTLDs. Although legacy gTLDs had a rate of 56.9 spam domains per 10,000 registrations (Q4 2016), new gTLDs experienced a rate of 526.6 in the same period-which is almost one order of magnitude higher. In this study, we also analyze the relationship between DNS abuse, operator security indicators and the structural properties of new gTLDs. The results indicate that there is an inverse correlation between abuse and stricter registration policies. Our findings suggest that cybercriminals increasingly prefer to register, rather than hack, domain names and some new gTLDs have become a magnet for malicious actors. ICANN is currently using these results to review the existing anti-abuse safeguards, evaluate their joint effects and to introduce more effective safeguards before an upcoming new gTLD rollout.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了加强域名系统的竞争和选择，ICANN引入了新的gTLD计划，增加了数百个新的通用顶级域名(例如纽约市。io)到根DNS区域。虽然该计划可以说增加了消费者可以使用的域名范围，但它也可能为网络罪犯创造了新的机会。为了对此进行调查，我们首次对新gTLD计划和传统gtld(共18个，如)下注册的域名滥用情况进行了比较研究。com，。org)。我们综合了各种来源的历史数据集，包括DNS区域文件、WHOIS记录、被动和主动DNS和HTTP测量以及11个著名的滥用源，以研究跨gTLDs的滥用情况。我们发现，新gtld似乎转移了对传统gtld的滥用:虽然在各gtld中滥用垃圾邮件的域名总数保持稳定，但我们观察到新gtld中垃圾邮件域名的数量不断增加，这表明从传统gtld向新gtld的转移。尽管传统gtld的垃圾邮件域名比例为每10，000注册56.9个(2016年第4季度)，但同期新gtld的垃圾邮件域名比例为526.6个，几乎高出一个数量级。在本研究中，我们还分析了DNS滥用、运营商安全指标和新gTLDs结构属性之间的关系。结果表明，滥用和更严格的登记政策之间存在着反比关系。我们的调查结果表明，网络犯罪分子越来越喜欢注册域名，而不是侵入域名，一些新gTLDs已经成为吸引恶意行为者的磁石。ICANN目前正在使用这些结果来审查现有的反滥用保护措施，评估它们的联合效果，并在即将到来的新gTLD推出之前引入更有效的保护措施。
papers.title_zh: 日出之后的网络犯罪：新GTLD中DNS滥用的统计分析

papers.title: Who is knocking on the Telnet Port: A Large-Scale Empirical Study of Network Scanning
papers.authors: Hwanjo Heo, Seungwon Shin
papers.abstract: Network scanning is the primary procedure preceding many network attacks. Until recently, network scanning has been widely studied to report a continued growth in volume and Internet-wide trends including the underpinning of distributed scannings by lingering Internet worms. It is, nevertheless, imperative to keep us informed with the current state of network scanning, for factual and comprehensive understanding of the security threats we are facing, and new trends to serve as the presage of imminent threats. In this paper, we analyze the up-to-date connection-level log data of a large-scale campus network to study the recent scanning trends in breadth. We find, most importantly, the scanning landscape is greatly shifted, predominantly by an unprecedented rise in Telnet service scannings. Furthermore, not only are the scan sources comprehensively identified in terms of targeted services and geographical/network locations, but also their characteristics, such as being responsible in scanning and their connection-level behavior, are studied.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络扫描是许多网络攻击之前的主要程序。直到最近，网络扫描已被广泛研究，以报告数量的持续增长和互联网范围的趋势，包括由挥之不去的互联网蠕虫对分布式扫描的支持。然而，我们必须随时了解网络扫描的当前状态，以便全面、真实地了解我们面临的安全威胁，以及预示即将到来的威胁的新趋势。本文通过分析一个大规模校园网络的最新连接级日志数据来研究最近的扫描趋势。我们发现，最重要的是，扫描格局发生了巨大的变化，主要是Telnet服务扫描的空前增长。此外，不仅根据目标服务和地理/网络位置全面识别扫描源，而且研究它们的特征，例如负责扫描和它们的连接级行为。
papers.title_zh: 谁在敲门端口：网络扫描的大规模实证研究

papers.title: Towards Sustainable Evolution for the TLS Public-Key Infrastructure
papers.authors: Taeho Lee, Christos Pappas, Pawel Szalachowski, Adrian Perrig
papers.abstract: Motivated by the weaknesses of today's TLS public-key infrastructure (PKI), recent studies have proposed numerous enhancements to fortify the PKI ecosystem. Deploying one particular enhancement is no panacea, since each one solves only a subset of the problems. At the same time, the high deployment barrier makes the benefit-cost ratio tilt in the wrong direction, leading to disappointing adoption rates for most proposals. As a way to escape from this conundrum, we propose a framework that supports the deployment of multiple PKI enhancements, with the ability to accommodate new, yet unforeseen, enhancements in the future. To enable mass adoption, we enlist the cloud as a "centralized" location where multiple enhancements can be accessed with high availability. Our approach is compatible with existing protocols and networking practices, with the ambition that a few changes will enable sustainable evolution for PKI enhancements. We provide extensive evaluation to show that the approach is scalable, cost-effective, and does not degrade communication performance. As a use case, we implement and evaluate two PKI enhancements.
papers.abstract_zh: 受当今TLS公钥基础设施(PKI)的弱点的推动，最近的研究提出了许多增强来巩固PKI生态系统。部署一个特定的增强功能并不是万能的，因为每个增强功能只能解决问题的一个子集。与此同时，高部署障碍使效益成本比向错误的方向倾斜，导致大多数提议的采用率令人失望。作为摆脱这个难题的一种方法，我们提出了一个支持部署多种PKI增强的框架，能够适应未来新的、不可预见的增强。为了实现大规模采用，我们将云作为一个“集中式”位置，在这里可以高可用性地访问多个增强功能。我们的方法与现有的协议和网络实践相兼容，我们的目标是通过一些改变来实现PKI增强的可持续发展。我们提供了广泛的评估，以表明该方法是可扩展的，具有成本效益，并且不会降低通信性能。作为一个用例，我们实现并评估了两个PKI增强。
papers.title_zh: 迈向TLS公共基础设施的可持续发展

papers.title: No One In The Middle: Enabling Network Access Control Via Transparent Attribution
papers.authors: Jeremy Erickson, Qi Alfred Chen, Xiaochen Yu, Erinjen Lin, Robert Levy, Zhuoqing Morley Mao
papers.abstract: Commodity small networks typically rely on NAT as a perimeter defense, but are susceptible to a variety of well-known intra-network attacks, such as ARP spoofing. With the increased prevalence of oft-compromised Internet-of-Things (IoT) devices now taking up residence in homes and small businesses, the potential for abuse has never been higher. In this work, we present a novel mechanism for strongly attributing local network traffic to its originating principal, fully-compatible with existing legacy devices. We eliminate Man-in-the-Middle attacks at both the link and service discovery layers, and enable users to identify and block malicious devices from direct attacks against other endpoints. Despite the prevalence of prior work with similar goals, previous solutions have either been unsuited to non-Enterprise environments or have broken compatibility with existing network devices and therefore failed to be adopted. Our prototype imposes negligible performance overhead, runs on an inexpensive commodity router, and retains full compatibility with modern and legacy devices.
papers.abstract_zh: 商用小型网络通常依靠NAT作为边界防御，但容易受到各种众所周知的网络内攻击，如ARP欺骗。随着经常受损的物联网(IoT)设备越来越普遍地出现在家庭和小型企业中，滥用的可能性从未像现在这样高。在这项工作中，我们提出了一种新颖的机制，用于将本地网络流量强有力地归因于其发起主体，与现有的传统设备完全兼容。我们消除了链路层和服务发现层的中间人攻击，使用户能够识别和阻止恶意设备对其他端点的直接攻击。尽管具有类似目标的先前工作很普遍，但是先前的解决方案要么不适合非企业环境，要么破坏了与现有网络设备的兼容性，因此未能被采用。我们的原型强加了可以忽略的性能开销，运行在廉价的商用路由器上，并保持了与现代和传统设备的完全兼容性。
papers.title_zh: 中间没有人：通过透明归因启用网络访问控制

papers.title: Achieving Flexibility for ABE with Outsourcing via Proxy Re-Encryption
papers.authors: Zuoxia Yu, Man Ho Au, Rupeng Yang, Junzuo Lai, Qiuliang Xu
papers.abstract: Outsourcing the decryption of attribute-based encryption (ABE) ciphertext is a promising way to tackle the question of how users can perform decryption efficiently. However, existing solutions require the type of the target ciphertext to be determined at the setup of the outsourcing scheme. As such, making the target cryptosystems (or the clients) to be versatile becomes an issue that warrants investigations. In this paper, the problem we wish to tackle is to transform an ABE ciphertext to any client who is using the same, or possibly different, public-key encryption (PKE) system with the sender. The problem is of practical interest since it is hard to require all clients to use the same PKE, especially in the case of remote and cross-system data sharing.
